project_description: OverviewGCN Brindavan is one of the well-known projects of GCN projects Pvt. Ltd. This attention-grabbing project is thoughtfully developed by GCN Group and it consists of 3 towers with only 4 floors (ground+3 floors). Offering 136 well ventilated units of 2 and 3 BHK configurations, this project is legally approved.  Located in Whitefield, Bangalore, the current status of this project is ongoing and the price list of GCN Brindavan ranges between Rs. 39.0 Lac 47.0 Lac.About the projectThe GCN group is a trustworthy name in real estate market as the GCN group review is on the positive side. GCN Brindavan floor plan offers various abodes that are spacious as well as well-ventilated. Measuring 2 acres, this well planned project offers spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments spread across an area that varies from 1045 sqft to 1225 sqft. Each apartment of this project is constructed as an independent unit hence the apartments have three side open space. Enjoying abundant natural sunlight and fresh air, the apartments of GCN Brindavan does not share common walls. The society is tucked with all the modern amenities like huge clubhouse, multipurpose hall, high-end security, park, swimming pool, badminton court, indoor games room, aerobics room, jogging and strolling track, lift, gym, kids play pool, meditation area and so on.HighpointsCentrally located in Whitefield, Bangalore, this project offers smooth connectivity to KR Puram railway station, metro station, Lake Montfort, SJES, Sea Education Trust, Amarajyothi Venkateshwara, KR Puram Super Speciality, Sairam Nursing Home and Divya Montessori. Apart from this, other well-known malls, schools, colleges, banks etc., are also easily accessible within a short distance.You can also go through the GCN Brindavan reviews and photos, which will help you to get a clear idea. Book an apartment now in GCN Brindavan as it provides an oasis of comfort, tranquility and luxury.

project_description: Overview Raheja Residency by Raheja Builders is a beautiful residential society with completely ready-to-move-in apartments. Situated in one of finest address of Koramangala, Bangalore, this society offers 560 residential units distributed among total 8 towers. Raheja Residency offers a wide range of 1,2 & 3-bedroom flats with area size starting from 600sqft to 1600sqft. The flats of Raheja Residency are up for sale with a price tag ranging between Rs1.05 Cr – Rs1.65 Cr.  Project Details All the homes of this society have been designed carefully to provide maximum space and comfort to its residents. 1BHK Flats of this society measure 600 sqft, 2BHK homes are available with dimensions of 1195 sqft whereas the 3BHK units are spread across 1600 sqft. These units are crafted by skilled engineers and have brilliant floor plans. Well-lit with lots of sunlight and blessed with fresh breeze, the well-ventilated residential apartments of this society are perfect place to dwell in. Raheja Residency Koramangala, Bangalore is a well-planned residential development and offers an array of modern amenities to offer the residents all the aspects of urban living. The amenities provided include clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, kids play area, meditation area and many more. Ample parking space, 24hour security, power backup and 24hour water supply facilities are also provided by the builders. Highpoints Attractive with stunning tree-lined boulevards and housing several luxurious commercial & residential establishments – Koramangala is considered as one of the affluent neighbourhood of Bangalore City. Easy connectivity to public transport facilities has immensely helped the residents with good conveyance. Koramangala also have numerous good schools & hospitals like National Public School, Bethany High School, Bangalore Public School, Apollo Spectra Hospitals and ESI Hospital to name a few. Popular shopping malls like Gopalan Innovation, Mega Mart and Max Fashion are also available in this area.

Mahaveer Promenade in Whitefield is a wonderfully created project featuring 11 floors matching international standards and modern demand. There are 2 BHK flats available in carpet area ranging between 1169 sqft to 1274 sqft having vitrified flooring across the rooms and balcony adorned with ceramic tiles while toilet has anti-skid ceramic tiles, main door teak wood frame with BST shutters, internal door features Sal wood frames with moulded/flush shutters, sanitary fittings and accessories in toilet are from top brands, fixtures and fittings used are premium quality from top-notch brands.These extravagantly designed residential apartments in Mahaveer Promenade, Whitefield are Vaastu compliant and offers a myriad of fascinating modern amenities like Club House, Jogging & Strolling Track, Cycling Track, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift Service, Security, Parking for both residents & visitors, Intercom Facility, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, Aerobics Room, Flower Gardens, Library And Business Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Multipurpose Courts and much more.HighpointsEach floor in Mahaveer Promenade boasts skilfully designed apartments with pioneering facilities to augment lifestyle of its residents. project_description: Overview:G Corp Residences is 234-units project by G Corp Group. It is based in Koramangala, Bangalore. G Corp Residences project is still under construction and offers 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments with a price range of 1.77 Cr - 3.20 Cr. About the Project:G Corp Residences is a Koramangala, Bangalore based project by G Corp Group. It offers 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments with a price range of 1.77 Cr - 3.20 Cr and area range of 1647sqft to 2612sqft for 3BHK and area of 2831sqft for 4BHK residential apartments. It provides utmost luxury in the form of interiors, exteriors and amenities. Located in the upmarket Koramangala, G Corp Residences has all the necessary facilities nearby. Talking about the in-house facilities, the project offers all the basic and many luxurious facilities like gym, aerobics room, swimming pool etc. The residential apartments have open glass fecades through which one can gaze at the greenery of G Corp Residences.The floors of the G Corp apartments’ kitchens are installed with vitrified tiles and the living rooms with imported marble. The bedrooms features laminated wooden flooring and the toilet, imported marble flooring. Highpoints:G Corp Residences has many components which separates it from the rest. One of them is a swimming pool with Jacuzzi on the eighth floor of the building. It definitely takes your life to the next level. Moreover, the project features a banquet hall where the residential flat owners can conduct their major events.A meditation room is constructed to promote serenity amongst the people and sculptured gardens are installed which are a blend of art and beauty. With all its amenities, G Corp Residences ensures a lavish and peaceful lifestyle.

project_description: Prestige Pine Wood is a project by Prestige Estate Projects located in Koramangala, Bengaluru offering aesthetically designed currently under construction 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments consisting of 256 units and 3 towers. Prestige Pine Wood price rate starts at Rs. 1.4 Cr onward.Project Details:Prestige Pine Wood located in Koramangala, Bengaluru is a project by Prestige Estate Projects offering spaciously designed currently under construction 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. Prestige Pine Wood plot areas for its 2 BHK flat ranges from 1249 sq. ft. to 1385 sq. ft.; 3 BHK flat areas range from 1839 sq. ft. to 1866 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2462 sq. ft. to 2503 sq. ft.The project has designed the apartments with anti skid tiles in the balcony and toilet, vitrified tiles flooring in all the other rooms, decorative main door, etc.Prestige Pine Wood is a RERA Certified Project. Prestige Pine Wood is also integrated with numerous amenities like power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, services & goods lift, visitor parking,  intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room,  kids play area, DTH television facility, library, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, meditation area, waste disposal, conference room and fire fighting equipment.Highpoints:Prestige Pine Wood is located in the greenery and beautiful location of Koramangala, Bengaluru. Special amenities of the project include a club house, jogging & strolling track and cycling & jogging track. Prestige Pine Wood is in close proximity to Forum mall, Oasis Mall, EGL and Flipkart office. It also has excellent connectivity to the Outer Ring Road and M. G. Road. Nearest utilities in the vicinity include Jn Of 80 And 100 Feet Road, Tibet Mall, EuroKids, Apollo Spectra Hospitals, Syndicate Bank ATM etc.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Strategically located in Residential area with close proximity to malls ( Forum mall, Oasis mall ) and office ( EGL, Flipkart ). Good connectivity to outer ring road and M.G road.Project USP:-Prestige Pine Wood is a High-Rise Residential Development in the midst of a well-established and sought after location, at Koramangala (Jakkasandara) Bangalore. Koramangala, located at the heart of the city has good proximity to IT hub and recreational zones. Prestige Pine Wood consist of 256 premium apartments and offers a combination of 2, 2.5, 3 and 4 bedroom units, and sits on a prime land of 2.5 acres and is placed in such a way that it provides maximum natural light and ventilation.

project_description: Bollineni Silas is a pristine and brand new residential development by the well known BSCPL Infrastructure Limited Developers at Whitefield, in the vicinity of Bangalore. The Bollineni Silas offers a choice of 2 and 3 BHK flats with vast open spaces at a budgeted price starting from Rs. 43.4 Lakhs. Bollineni Silas dwelling is carefully designed with a world class design and constructional features.Project detailsThe 499 housing units are sprawled across an area of 10 acres and the floor plan of this project comprises of 2 and 3 BHK flats which are very spacious and designed as per the latest architectural features. The possession of these flats which are spread across 1060 to 1600 sqft area is slated in December 2018.Bollineni Silas provides an extensive range of facilities to the residents like yoga and aerobics, squash court, indoor badminton court, card room, carom, table tennis, pool table, children's play area and club house. There are also provisions for the intercom, 24 x 7 security, power backup and maintenance staff. This RERA Certified project is a home that everyone dreamt to be lived in. Most importantly it provides you a space that liberates and sets you comfortable and free.HighpointsAt, Bollineni Silas you will discover the pleasure of world class living. One of the major advantages of this project is the location. You are never truly far from a hospital, school, hotel, a cinema, a mall or even any recreational centers when living in Whitefield. Also, Bollineni Silas enjoys fantastic connectivity to the surrounding MNC Companies.All these above features make this project stand apart from the regular lot of projects offered by developers. To experience beauty and perfection like never before all you have to do right now is book a flat of your choice.

Since its inception in 1975, Puravankara has believed that there is only one mantra for success: Quality. This credo combined with uncompromising values, customer-centricity, robust engineering, and transparency in business operations, has placed it among the most preferred real estate brands in both residential and commercial segments

The Company has grown from strength to strength, having successfully completed 48 residential projects and 2 commercial projects spanning 23.54 million square feet (PPLs economic interest –20.93 m sq ft). Currently, it has 24.87 million square feet, 17,895 units (PPLs economic interest – 22.03 m sq ft, 16,188 units) of projects under development, with an additional 22.73 million square feet(PPL’s economic interest – 18.98 m sq ft) in projected development. An ISO 9001 certification by DNV in 1998 and a DA2+ rating by CRISIL are testament to Puravankaras reputation as a real estate developer of the highest quality and reliability standards.

The Group commenced operations in Mumbai and has established significant presence in the metropolitan cities of Bangalore, Kochi, Chennai, Coimbatore, Hyderabad, Mysore and overseas in Dubai, Colombo and Saudi-Arabia.

project_description: Prestige Acropolis, introduced by Prestige Construction, is a residential township located at Koramangala, Bangalore. Priced between Rs. 2.20 crores and Rs. 3.88 crores (price per sq-ft ranging from Rs. 8333 to Rs. 13000), this project has 2 and 3 BHK multi-storey apartments covering areas from 2292 sq-ft to 3600 sq-ft.Prestige Acropolis in Koramangala is one of the most popular residential projects located at a distance of 6.26 kilometers from the Ulsoor Metro Station. Equipped with the most basic as well as the most advanced amenities like piped gas, air-conditioning, intercom facilities, waste disposal, maintenance staff, elevators, power backup, RO water system, internet or Wi-Fi connectivity, water storage, and visitors car parking, Prestige Acropolis looks after all the needs of its residents. Vaastu compliance, banquet halls, conference room, strolling and jogging track, bar/lounge, goods and service lift, food court or cafeteria, reserved car parking space for the residents, parks, laundry service, swimming pools, gymnasium, rain water harvesting and club house make every resident of Prestige Acropolis comfortable and proud.Situated at a distance of only 2.29 kilometers from the prestigious Indian Institute of Planning and Management, 2.24 kilometers from the AP Aparan Hospital, 2.62 kilometers from the Mattasans Super Market, and just a few meters from the HDFC Bank, Prestige Acropolis is well-connected with every kind of convenience and benefit close by.

project_description: Projected across 2.80 acres of beautiful land, Sobha Morzaria Grandeur by the famous builders Sobha Ltd is an attractive residential project located in Koramangala, Bangalore. This is RERA certified project featuring 129 units distributed among 2 towers. These units are available with 2,3 & 4 BHK configurations and the flat rates of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur are priced within the range of Rs. 1.50 Cr – Rs. 4.95 Cr. Project details Well-equipped with all the desirable modern amenities, these luxurious homes are designed with complete precision. The spectacular interiors and the exquisite exteriors, crafted under the guidance of expert artisans will surely impress you. The dynamic floor plan of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur has been applauded with confident reviews by thousands of happy home-buyers. Exclusively planned, all these homes draw plenty of natural light & fresh breeze. Also available for immediate rent, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Sobha Morzaria Grandeur are indeed worth consideration. The phase I is fully completed and the flats are absolutely ready for possession whereas Sobha Morzaria Grandeur Phase II is still under-construction. Wide range of plush amenities such as party hall, squash court, gym, swimming pool, children’s play area and much more promise a smooth and lavish lifestyle. Prime facilities like 24hours water supply, round the clock power supply and 24x7 manned security at the main entrance make this residential estate a true haven. Highpoints Replete with well-developed social infrastructures, Koramangala is one of the best residential place to settle in Bangalore. Public transport connectivity has immensely helped the residents with good conveyance to nearby places and adjoining areas. Another plus point of this residence is the effortless connectivity to IT companies such as Oracle, Accenture, Honeywell, etc. If you are hunting for a high-end accommodation, then Sobha Morzaria Grandeur is an ultimate option. So, walk in and book a flat now.
about_project_details: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

about_project_details: The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure and Hospitality sectors.Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead.

project_description: OverviewRaheja Pebble Bay is a sprawling luxury enclave developed by The Advantage Raheja Group. An inspirational residency, this project comprises of flats that are surely worth consideration. Located in Koramangala, Bangalore and spread over 6.11 acres, it consists of 288 luxury units in 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom configurations featuring all modern amenities and sophisticated interiors.Project detailsRaheja Pebble Bay in Koramangala, Bangalore is indeed a good option to reside in. The price of these 1, 2, 3 and 4 BHK Flats ranges between Rs. 1.09 Cr - 1.73 Cr and covers an area which varies from 617 sqft to 2495 sqft. The floor plans and the price list of the project are attached for your kind perusal and positive consideration.Amenities offered in Raheja Pebble Bay are as follows landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gym, jogging track, meditation hall, children’s play area, tennis court, clubhouse, library and basketball court. This RERA certified project at Koramangala is an under construction project and the possession will be given in June-2019. HighpointsRaheja Pebble Bay exudes a positive aura. The residency is located at a prime location offering ease and convenience to the residents. It is centrally located considering its proximity to Hosur road/Electronic City, Sarjapur ORR/Whitefield, BTM Layout. The CBD & the entire desired social infrastructure are accessible within a few minutes from here.The locality has many software companies and is thus a popular residential destination for IT and corporate professionals.There are many schools, colleges and hospitals in the locality. Koramangala is considered a premium area to stay in and commands one of the highest property values in the city. All the flats in Raheja Pebble Bay are up for sale therefore book your flat now and own best of the best flat.

project_description: Kumari Amaranthine is built by Kumari Builders and Developers, a leading group in real-estate market in Bangalore. It offers spacious and dexterously designed 2BHK and 3BHK apartments spread across 9 floors.Project detailsRERA Certified - Kumari Amaranthine offers 2BHK and 3BHK Apartments of many sizes. The magnitude of area included in this project varies depending on the number of BHK. The master plan of Kumari Amaranthine is designed in such a way that these apartments comprises of extensive space with appropriate freshening at every corner of the house. The interiors are delightfully crafted with fashionable tiled floor, granite counter slab in kitchen, modern sanitary fittings in the bathroom and huge windows for apposite daylight.Spanning across 2.00 acres Kumari Amaranthine consists of 99 units in one ingenious tower. The 2 BHK apartments are spread across an area that varies between 1130 - 1190 sqft whereas the area of 3 BHK apartments ranges between 1270 - 1530 sqft.Kumari Amaranthine at Bellandur in Bangalore allows only the best for its inhabitants and is fully furnished with up-to-date facilities for you to experience a wholesome and healthy life. The inviting flats have well-designed floor plans and modern specifications.HighpointsKumari Amaranthine is strategically located and provides direct connectivity to nearly all other major points in and around Bangalore. It is one of the most reputable addresses of the city with easy access to many famed schools, shopping areas, hospitals, recreational areas, public gardens and several other public facilities.Numeral tech parks and IT companies like Embassy Tech Square, Wipro Corporate Office, Salarpuria Tech Park, Prestige Cessna Business Park, Infosys etc exist in the vicinity; thereby resulting in an incursion of a lot of residents, investors and real estate developers here. Don't miss this chance without any delay book a flat now Kumari Amaranthine.

project_description: An epitome of luxury amidst natures bliss, the Orchid Lakeview is a lavishly built real estate project consisting of two main blocks of 15 storeys. Orchid Lakeview is built by Goyal and Co. in the vicinity of Bellandur Lake, a prime beauty in Bangalore that is close to the Bellandur railway station, the Apollo Clinic hospital, educational institutions and the airport. The Orchid Lakeview property has an 8 meter driveway that encircles the 2 wide blocks. Vehicles can access this motorway and drive around the blocks, which have an approximate 30,000 sq-ft area of open, green spread between the driveway and the compound wall. The space can be used for jogging or walking or simply relaxing on a park bench. The project is huge with 2 and 3 bedroom apartments spread over an area between 1270 sq-ft and 1800 sq-ft. The two main blocks of Orchid Lakeview has a Podium in between its stretch, which serves as an epicentre of infinite amenities. This includes a swimming pool with a toddler pool attached to it, a play area, a gymnasium, a multi-purpose hall, a resting area for the elderly, a party hall, beautiful garden terrace for multi-use purpose and a clubhouse with exciting indoor activities. The ground floor has expansive garden area spread outside the blocks with a basketball court and multipurpose court for entertainment. Each tower comprises of two automatic lifts and electric supply is constant with 100 percent backup for lifts, pumps etc.

project_description: SMR Vinay Estella is a high rise residential project by SMR Holdings located in the prime area of Yelahanka, Bangalore offering simply planned luxurious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is currently under construction and will develop 315 units spread over 3 lavish towers. SMR Vinay Estella Bangalore price rate starts at Rs. 44.3 Lac onward.  Project Details: SMR Vinay Estella, a project located primly in Yelahanka, Bangalore by the well experienced SMR Holdings is offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. SMR Vinay Estella plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1230 sq. ft. to 1460 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1615 sq. ft. to 2010 sq. ft. SMR Vinay Estella features best in quality world class amenities and facilities such as cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, private terrace & garden, swimming pool, park, multipurpose hall, dance studio, gymnasium kids play area, aerobics room, flower gardens, canopy walk, multipurpose courts, meditation area, conference room, premium branded fittings, sky deck, earthquake resistant, health club, large open space, multipurpose hall, solar energy, kids play pool with water slides and event space & amphitheatre etc. among others for its residents. SMR Vinay Estella apartments are well designed with high standard interior features, premium quality fittings and fixtures and concealed wiring and plumbing etc. throughout every flat.  Highpoints:    SMR Vinay Estella is a fabulously designed residential venture located in the midst of nature equipped with the best amenities and architectural features. SMR Vinay Estella Bangalore locality is booming and has utilities in close vicinity like Sri Sri Ravishankar Vidya Mandir, Vinayaka Nagar Bus Stop, Aveksha Hospital, Syndicate Bank, Apollo Pharmacy, Galaxy Cinemas, Chikkabettahalli Lake, and Indian Oil Fuel Pump etc. are available for the residents.

Indeed, we have been reckoned as one of the leading construction houses in South India and we have been emphatically positioning ourselves to contribute to our customers by giving our best. The most significant factor considered while building beautiful homes is the conviction; as we take great pride in our integrity and commitment. We adhere to all the important factors involved and have an eye for intricate details. At SMR, we believe not just in the details but also in the comprehensive process, with focus on project management and quality control, we have been giving our customers world-class spaces to live in.

project_description: Overview:Sovereign Unnathi is a project by Sovereign Developers. It is located in Kalkere, Bengaluru with 25 towers and 1600 units with 2, 3 and 5BHK apartments spread across 12.50 acres. The project offers luxurious, spacious and aesthetically designed apartments, equipped with all basic amenities and in close proximity to all civic utilities. Sovereign Unnathi is an urban look on housing for the simple yet luxurious. Project details:Sovereign Unnathi located in Kalkere, Bengaluru is a project by Sovereign Developers, established in 2005, which offers housing with spacious and skilfully designed 2, 3 and 5BHK apartments with state-of-the-art amenities to fulfil every home-owners lavish lifestyle. The flats have an area ranging from 856-3400 sq. ft.The 2BHK ranges in 856 sq. ft; 3BHK is 1585 sq. ft. and the 5BHK is 3400 sq. ft. They are designed to support the comfortable living for the residents that the project promises.The numerous amenities include lifts, water supply, power backup, fire fighting systems, security, intercoms, car parking, gymnasium, club house and children’s play area. Other special lifestyle amenities include badminton court, indoor games, lawn tennis court, spa, swimming pool, toddler pool, garbage disposal, landscape garden, paved compound, rain water harvesting, sewage treatment, internal street lights, library, shopping centre, visitors parking, letter box panel at stilt floor, party lawn etc. among other things. Highpoints:Sovereign Unnathi is strategically place in a small residential area of Kalkere with a well developed road and railway network.It is in close proximity to NMPC Hospital, 1 km from Horamavu Main Road, 9 km from Columbia Asia Hospital etc among others.3 km from Podar International School, 3 km from National Highway – 44 etcPopular landmarks near the property include Koshys, Sri Chaitanya Techno School, HDFC Bank, Gopalan Signature Mall, and Suvee Boutique Hotel

project_description: OverviewDeveloped by one of the reputed names in the real estate world, Prestige Kew Gardens from Prestige Group is a marvellous project located in Yemalur, Bangalore. Nestled amidst verdant greenery, this project is designed to offer 979 residential apartments in the configuration of 1BHK, 2BHK, 2.5BHK and 3BHK units. Modern & classy, the residential apartments are sized between 615 to 1607sq.ft. About The ProjectNo matter how big or small your family is, this well planned project boasts spectacular homes ranging from cosy 1BHKs to spacious 3BHKs. Devised as per Vaastu rules, these well ventilated apartments are a true blessing for every occupant. 15 acres of prime land is dotted 979 elegantly designed residences that are tucked away into 16 low rise towers and stunning landscapes. Enriched with high-end specifications & fixtures and tastefully done with premier flooring for a timeless look Prestige Kew Gardens flats will certainly make you fall in love with them. Flooded with lots of fresh air and natural light, these flats are best to live and experience a blissful life with your family. Prestige Kew Gardens Yemalur, Bangalore offers easy & smooth connectivity to a number of IT Parks and MNCs such as HP, ITPL, Brigade Tech Park and much more. Presence of lots of prominent schools and world-class medical facilities make Prestige Kew Gardens Yemalur indeed one of the best residential dwelling places. Owing to its excellent connectivity and the well-established social infrastructures, Yemalur in Bangalore also promises good price appreciation in the near future. HighpointsLoaded with top-notch amenities like clubhouse, swimming pool, various sporting facilities and other recreational provisions investing into this project is surely a worthy decision. Turn your dream of owning a happy home by booking a flat in Prestige Kew Gardens, Yemalur.

Presently the group has 53 ongoing residential & commercial projects covering 54 million sqft. There are 35 forthcoming projects with over 48 million sqft of top-notch property area.

project_description: Eternity Astral is a project by Eternity Structures Private Limited located in Bellandur Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 1 Acre encompassing 76 units across 2 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles, Ceramic Tiles and Anti Skid Tiles.  Eternity Astral comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has area 840 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has a range of area from 980 Sq-ft to 1145 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1385 Sq-ft to 1565 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in December 2013, Eternity Astral offers Ready To Move properties. The project is approved by Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL and SBI. The major Amenities in the project are  Earth quake resistant. Lift and Multipurpose Hall. Multipurpose Courts. Large Clubhouse and Premium branded fittings. .

project_description: OverviewPrestige Agusta Golf Village situated in Horamavu, Bangalore is a elegantly developed project by Prestige Group. Prestige Agusta Golf Village floor plan is designed to feature 3 and 4 BHK villas. The price list of Prestige Agusta Golf Village ranges in between 1.91 to 3.10 crores. The areas of these villas lie in the range of 2400 sqft to 4300 sqft area. Prestige Agusta Golf Village comprises of 460 villas. Have a look at Prestige Agusta Golf Village photos for brief overview.Project DetailsThe project is titled after Golfs most popular shrines and is a dream come true to every golfer. It is an ultimate impression of todays lifestyle. Prestige Agusta Golf Village presents exquisitely designed villas each being a symbol of sophistication and elegance. The residential villas in Prestige Agusta Golf Village are well ventilated and also blessed with natural light all day long. The villas here are capacious enough and space is effectively utilized. The villas in this project are impeccably crafted in terms of vaastu principles always ensuring positivity among the residents. project_description: With an aim to provide luxurious home at a very unbeatable price, Vasathi Housing presents Vasathi Avante at the prime area of Hebbal, Bangalore. Laid out across 5-acres of land parcel, this residential project features 3 towers with total 380 units. Choose from a wide range of well-designed 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom apartments measuring from 1053 sqft to 1460 sqft. The flat rates of Vasathi Avante Hebbal are priced starting from Rs. 52.6 Lacs to Rs. 85.0 Lacs. Project details Well-placed just behind Manyata Embassy Business Park, Vasathi Avante Hebbal is an ongoing residential development with possession by December-2017.  Every apartment is brilliantly designed, so that fresh air & sunlight peeps in from every nook & corner. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Vasathi Avante Hebbal with brilliant floor plans are surely worth considering. All the apartments of this RERA certified residential project has been devised as per vaastu science, to promote a healthy and prosperous living. Acknowledged with lots of positive reviews, Vasathi Avante Hebbal also offers numerous the residential apartments. Some of the well-known amenities provided include swimming pool, air-conditioned gymnasium, jogging track, tennis court, children’s play area, wellness center and much more. The society is also self-sustained with library, supermarket, shopping center, playschool, fast food center, bank, ATM and a pharmacy to offer a smooth & comfortable living. Highpoints Easy access to numerous software companies and MNCs is indeed one of the highpoint to make Vasathi Avante Hebbal a preferred residential destination. This project is Green Home certified affiliated to the norms of IGBC with Gold ratings. Connectivity to public transport facilities is an added advantage. Vibgyor High, Federal Public School and B G National Public School are situated within just 5kms. Book a flat now in Vasathi Avante Hebbal, Bangalore and discover a whole new world of luxurious living.

project_description: It is said There is Something European about South Bangalore. Uber Corp Infrastructure proudly launches Uber Paxina in Jaynagar near Ashok Pillar. The project houses intelligently planned and luxuriously laid out homes in a single tower of four floors. You can choose between 2 BHK or 3 BHK well laid out, spacious and airy apartments. Uber Paxina is located just 0.8 kms from the coveted West gate of Lal Bagh. The property is within easy reach of well reputed schools, hospitals, shopping areas, and entertainment hubs.
about_project_details: In 2015 an elite team of individuals join hands to create Uber Corp infrastructure with a focus to develop quality buildings with an emphasis on affordable luxury and spacious homes. The company has been now evolved into a dynamic organisation rapidly developing projects in Bengaluru and other parts of South India. Before founding Uber Corp, the core team members have been a part of a well-known real estate and consulting firms. From refined residential properties and conversant commercial spaces to eloquent spas, they created some of the most iconic landmarks in Bengaluru. As a team that has worked together for years, they comprehend and complement each others strengths, the reason behind the seamless functioning and project management. The teams passion for good design, their sound technical knowledge, commitment to quality and business ethics translates into Intelligent and beautiful living spaces in Urban Bengaluru.

project_description: Embassy Lake Terraces is the home that you have always wanted. A home without compromises set in the heart of new Bangalore. A home for people, who have lived, worked or travelled across the globe and experienced the best. It is a virtual ocean of peace and tranquility-amidst the hustle and bustle of one of North Bangalore emerging hubs.
about_project_details: Embassy Group, a leading development firm in real estate commenced its operations in 1993 led by Jitendra Virwani, Chairman and Managing Director of the group. The establishment has developed 37 MN SFT of Commercial, Residential, Retail, Hospitality and Industrial Warehouse spaces and holds an extensive land bank of 1,700 acres across the country. The operation spans across Indian and international markets that include Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, Coimbatore, Serbia in Eastern Europe and Malaysia.

project_description: Developed by Prestige Group - Prestige Gulmohar is an ongoing residential project situated in the thriving locality of Horamavu, Bangalore. This project consists of 5 towers with total of 404 well-planned residential units spread across 3.27 acres of vibrant greenery. The apartments are available with 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom configurations with the varying area size from 1169 sqft to 1752 sqft. The flat rates of Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu, Bangalore are currently priced starting from Rs. 65 Lacs onwards. Project details For a plush living, all the well-planned residential units of this magnificent project are crafted with premium quality construction and are loaded with top notch amenities. The attractive floor plans of Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu will surely impress you. Well-located with all the prime facilities in close proximity, this residential project is an ultimate choice if you are seeking perfect home for your family. This project is nearing completion and the possession of Prestige Gulmohar residential apartments will begin very soon. Clubhouse, swimming pool, indoor games room, kid’s play area and a well-equipped gymnasium are some of the alluring amenities available to keep you entertained in your leisure time. This gated community assures a complete worry-free environment to live with 24x7 security surveillance. Highpoints This is a RERA certified project enclosed within the landscaped greenery, thus providing a serene atmosphere to live a healthier life. Within just 5-6kms, you can locate a number of good schools like Sri Chaitanya, New Baldwin International Residential, Vibgyor High and Sinclairs High.NMPC Hospital, ESI Hospital and Srivijaya Hospital are situated within close proximity. Great connectivity to public transport facilities is one of the primary factor to make this area a perfect dwelling place. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Prestige Gulmohar Horamavu, Bangalore and enjoy all the colors of luxurious living with complete bliss.

project_description: OverviewSNN Clermont, a Stunning and magnificently designed luxury residential project. SNN Clermont, which is synonymous with sheer splendor has been located in Hebbal, in the suburbs of Bangalore city. SNN Clermont is offering well-crafted 3BHK and 4BHK extra-spacious residential flats sprawled majestically on a serene area amidst nature’s grandeur. SNN Clermont is presently under construction and it has been constructed and conceptualized by renowned SNN Builders. SNN Clermont price range starts at Rs.1.92 Crores Onwards. Project DetailsSNN Clermont, a splendid and well- ventilated LEED Gold Rated residential project by SNN Builders has been embellished by several primary& modern amenities. SNN Clermont is smartly located in Hebbal in India’s Silicon Valley i.e Bangalore. SNN Clermont is providing 3BHK and 4BHK spacious flats facing mesmerizing Nagawara Lake. SNN Clermont’s 3BHK flat area ranges between 2466-2526 sqft and it is also offering spacious 4BHK apartments that bear an area between 3067 –5260 sqft.In SNN Clermont Bangalore there is never ending sports and Fitness utilities like Badminton, Basketball, Lawn Tennis Courts.It also has a well-maintained Swimming and Toddler Pool.Together with Physical Health, you can ensure your Sound Mental Health in Yoga, Meditation Area.SNN Clermont, a secured gated community features Top-Notch Amenities and basic facilities like Automatic Lift, Power Backup, ample space for Reserved and Visitors Parking and much more.For Comfort, Entertainment and Socialisation of its residents  SNN Clermont has Community Hall, Party Lawn, Barbeque-Pit accompanied by a long list ahead.High PointsThe U.S.P of SNN Clermont is its location advantage with the settings of perfectly harmonious natural grandeur and cool breeze from the nearby lake. SNN Clermont also bears facilities like ICICI Bank ATM, Nilgiri’s Grocery, Prithvi Theatre, Medplus etc nearby. To give you a fancy life full of zest and sparkle, SNN Clermont Residential project is offering lavish yet thoughtfully designed apartments which are located in an area which is a preferable place to invest as well as reside.

project_description: To help you create a home that expresses your own unique style. Conveniently located just 1.5 km from the Hebbal Flyover on the KIAL Road, Century Ethos is destined to be a Bangalore landmark. Our architects, HOK of USA, have pored over every detail, ensuring you get only the best: from imported marble floors to a home automation suite. And, there's more to explore outside your home.
about_project_details: Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalores urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore's landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asias fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated townships spread across South India.

project_description: Overview: This architectural masterpiece by House of Hiranandani is being offered in Hebbal, Bangalore. Glen Gate is under construction, however, you can always visit Hiranandani official website for Glen Gate photos as well as Glen Gate floor plans. Spanning across 3 beautiful as well as huge towers, these towers comprise of 576 aesthetically designed apartment units which are priced at the range of Rs 90.3 Lac - 1.10 Cr which is an added advantage. Glen Gate flats offers mesmerising view of the Hebbal lake located upfornt, while offering a range of apartment spaces to choose from 1245 sq. ft. to 1810 sq. ft. About the project :  One of the best features of investing into this project is because of the Hiranandani Glen Gate reviews which are positive and favourable. Hiranandani Glen Gate Hebbal is one of the posh and high-end projects, with all the necessities at hand, this project is absolutely commendable. Hiranandani Glen Gate address is certainly where you should reside in, if classy yet luxurious lifestyle is what you desire. Glen Gate floor plans are beautifully planned with loads of natural light seeping in the entire abode, brightening your day and getting sun-kissed.              Presenting a perfect fusion of 2 and 3 BHK apartment units, with sizes ranging from 1245 sq. ft. to 1440 sq. ft. for 2 BHK units while the 3 BHK units sized from 1630 sq. ft. to 1820 sq. ft., these dwellings are well designed with conveniences like never before. Adding value to its name and brand, this project, offers comfort in every level of a standard lifestyle. Highpoints: Central locality is what this project has to offer with all the necessities at hand and recreational amenities in pocket, Glen Gate offers close proximity to Bangalore Baptist Hospital, Megamart Stores and Sukrupa School are all located within close proximity, with all these comforts how can you miss this opportunity? Book now!!!
about_project_details: For the last three decades, the Hiranandanis have been single-handedly altering the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. The group has built multi-use developments in India on a large scale and have introduced retail, hospitality, healthcare, education and entertainment into their developments. With a unique approach to engineering, planning and design, the Hiranandanis invest heavily in research and development to ensure they remain at the forefront of value engineering and design.Through the environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, their focus has been on converting suburban sprawls into well-planned urban communities such as the Powai and Thane townships which have won several awards for outstanding urban development. These self-sufficient, integrated communities have become aspirational addresses for Mumbaiites. The group has established various schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through trusts. Their clubhouses and community spaces have earned international repute and success.All these experiences and expertise are encompassed under the House of Hiranandani, a conglomerate that is set to create new benchmarks for the real estate industry by continuing to break new ground and incorporate path-breaking technology into their design, to create future-ready and intelligent spaces. The House of Hiranandani brings to its customers and stakeholders the benefit of years of experience under one roof, thereby creating a platform from which it will continue its pioneering innovations and set the standard for real estate development in India.

KSR Cordelia floor plan for its 2 BHK flat areas range from 1035 sq. ft. to 1256 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1367 sq. ft. to 1462 sq. ft. KSR Cordelia Bangalore features modern day amenities such as jogging track, cycling track, club house, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility for every unit, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids club, flower gardens, laundry service, air conditioned, multipurpose courts, meditation area, vaastu compliant and fire fighting equipment etc. to name a few.KSR Cordelia apartments designed and developed with key interior specifications such as vitrified tiles flooring in living and dining area, wooden flooring in all bedrooms, teak wood frame main doors with polish finish teak wood panel shutter, sal wood frame internal doors with flush shutter and paint finish, fire resistant concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter with stainless steel sink and drain board, etc. Highpoints:  KSR Cordelia Bangalore locality is very easily accessible from the other parts of the city. The close vicinity includes utilities like Sriramapura Cross Bus Stop, Vidya Niketan School, Columbia Asia Hospital, Divya Pharmacy, Body Tone Fitness Gym and Kotak Mahindra Bank ATM etc. You can find KSR Cordelia photos on magicbricks.

project_description: Overview Strategically placed in the midst of happening locality flourished with IT Parks, schools & hospitals – Godrej Platinum is an ambitious residential project by the famous Godrej Properties. Located in Hebbal – Bangalore, this gorgeous residence spread across 2-acres of property offers 135 residential units distributed among 2 towers. The project offers 3 & 4 BHK flats and penthouses with the area size ranging from 2,893 - 3,915 sqft. The flat rates of Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs 2.63 Cr. About the Project These residential homes are perfectly ready-to-move-in and can be either purchased or rented as per your requirement. The mesmerising views of the shimmering Hebbal Lake from every apartment is the main attraction of this Godrej Platinum. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore are bright & airy, thus creating a friendly home ambiance. Designed to upgrade your lifestyle and offer you a perfect home, every abode of this project has been tailored by professional engineers & artisans. Some of the eco-friendly measures like solar panels for electricity generation, rain water harvesting and low E-glazed windows has earned this project a pre-certification from IGBC with ‘Gold' ratings. So, if you wish a green home for precious family where they are able to breathe fresh air, book a flat now in Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore. This gorgeous residential project also offers a series of modern amenities like temperature controlled indoor swimming pool, gymnasium, mini theatre and is also self-contained with a cafeteria. Highpoints Easy connectivity to public transport facilities, adjoining areas and various IT companies has ranked Godrej Platinum Hebbal, Bangalore higher among the search list of home buyers. Heritage School, Elements Mall and Colombia Asia Hospital are some of the prominent landmarks to Godrej Platinum. It merely takes a 15minutes short drive to reach NH-44 from Godrej Platinum.

project_description: OverviewHiranandani Glen Classic is a project by House of Hiranandani, located at Hebbal, Bangalore. Hiranandani is a leading real estate brand in the market. The Group majorly focuses on superior quality and excellent services in architecture. Hiranandani Glen Classic, a RERA certified project, offers quality home at affordable prices. The starting range for the apartments is 52 lakhs and varies up to 1.35 crore. About the ProjectHiranandani Glen Classic consists of 288 units, 3 towers and 19 floors. The project is currently under construction and covers an area stretched over to 6050 per square feet to 8108 per square feet. The project has its base at Hebbal, Bangalore. Many famous educational institutions, business centers and hospitals surround the area. The project is located in North Bangalore and is connected with the Outer Ring Road and Bellary Road. Thus, the location is quite central. The project offers 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments with different floor plans. The build –up area for the same is 655 square feet, 1270-1295 square feet and 1650-1821 square feet respectively. The designing material used for the apartments is ultra-fashionable. Teak wood frame and shutters are used for the main doors. The use of vitrified tiles for flooring in the kitchen, bedrooms, balcony, living room and toilet gives a modish look to the apartments. Granite platform with stainless steel sink is used in the kitchen. House of Hiranandani provides facilities such as lift, gymnasium, car parking, fire fighting systems etc. under this project. HighpointsEvery apartment under the Hiranandani Glen Classic project is vastu compliant.Apartments are located at a distance of 400 meters to the Outer Ring Road and 1.5 kilometers to the NH7.Amenities such as Billiards, Card Room and Pool Table are provided for the purpose of entertainment.
about_project_details: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. project_description: Overview:Vaishnavi North 24 is a project by Vaishnavi Group in the strategic location of Hebbal, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It consists of 180 units spanned over 3 towers. Vaishnavi North 24 price rate starts from Rs. 92.2 Lac onward. The project is developing a thoughtfully designed infrastructure on a total project area of 2.74 acres.Project Details:Vaishnavi North 24 is offering lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project aims to provide the best living space in Bangalore. Vaishnavi North 24 plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1170 sq. ft. to 1199 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1639 sq. ft. to 1730 sq. ft.Vaishnavi North 24  spacious infrastructure is designed with vitrified tiles flooring, timber laminated flooring in master bedroom, teak wood frame doors, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, branded fitting and fixtures etc.Vaishnavi North 24 will provide numerous high quality amenities and facilities for its occupants like jogging & strolling track, multipurpose hall, indoor squash & badminton courts, flower gardens, aerobics room, vaastu compliant, children’s play area, indoor games room, gymnasium, swimming pool etc. among others.Highpoints:Vaishnavi North 24 is a 3 side open architecture with world class specifications. The area is very convenient as various basic civic utilities lie in the vicinity and has great connectivity via different types of transportation. Vaishnavi North 24 locality is just 1 km from the Hebbal Flyover. Various utilities and landmarks like Bangalore Cantonment Station, Hosmat Hospital, RBANM's High School, GPO Bus Stop, Big Bazaar, Karnataka Bank ATM, Yasho Pharma, The Oberoi, Inox Cinema, Lalbagh Botanical Garden, Heliport at JW Marriott, The Grand Magrath Hotel, Indian Oil Petrol Pump, etc. are in the vicinity of the property.

project_description: Pavani Oakridge by Pavani Homes is one of the popular residential project in Kundalahalli, Bangalore. It has lavish yet thoughtfully designed 1 tower and 60 residences.
about_project_details: Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one.The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become pioneers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time. with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 14 projects and five projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz. Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore.PAVANI HOMES, backed up by ten years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards. PAVANI HOMES keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI HOMES is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

project_description: Your dream of owning a perfect home is now a reality as the developed named L & T Realty brings to you Raintree Boulevard which is located in Hebbal, Bangalore. It offers spacious and skillfully designed 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments.Project detailsRaintree Boulevard comprises of totally 20 towers out of which 17 towers are under construction and 4 towers i.e First Phase are launched which includes 300 units. The project is legally approved by various banks as well as Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike and is also RERA certified.In this project the 2 BHK Flat covers an area of 1320 sqft with 1 balcony and 2 bathrooms. The area of 3 BHK Flat ranges between 1645 to 1985 sqft consisting 2 balconies and 3 bathrooms. The 4BHK Flats covers an area of 2470 to 2790 sqft with 2/3 balconies and 3/4 bathrooms. The floorings are made of vitrified tiles and ceramic tiles which look very attractive.This prestigious project has been intelligently carved with impressive floor plans and quality construction. Raintree Boulevard is a perfect blend of air-conditioned residential apartments and high-class amenities such as Club House, Gymnasium, Swimming Pool, Indoor Games Room, Banquet Hall and Outdoor Tennis Courts to name a few.HighpointsHebbal is a sought after locality based in the center of Bangalore, enjoys the benefits of being the IT hub in mid of a mesh of easy connectivity facilities. Hebbal is undoubtedly one of the most demanded residential hotspots of the nation. The extremely well-developed infrastructure, connectivity routes that links you with all parts of the city are the major advantages of this locality.If you are planning to buy an abode then Raintree Boulevard is worth considering which is all set to meet your requirements. Book a flat now and be assured of owning a quality home.

project_description: OverviewPrestige misty waters located in Hebbal, Bangalore developed by Prestige Group is built with superior craftsmanship linked to the precision of modern technology. The project is well connected by different modes of transportation and is in close proximity of various civic utilities. About the projectThese residential apartments have been meticulously designed imparting versions in layout to match the personal necessities of the buyers. Well-ventilated apartments are available at an affordable price ranging from Rs.73.7Lakhs to 2.15Crore. Prestige misty waters constitute 4 thoughtfully planned towers which include entirely 558 residential units.Mesmerizing Prestige misty waters comprises of 2, 3 and 4BHK flats. The area of elegant 2BHK flat varies from 1134 to 1141sq.ft. The 3BHK unit is spread across 1987sq.ft area. Whereas the 4BHK flat cover an area of 2375 to 2476sq.ft.Wonderful altitude, world class amenities and a refreshing landscape makes you discover a home where you will wake up each new day with a renewed vigor. Moreover the project provides all the world class amenities such as exclusive jogging and strolling track, etc.HighpointsPrestige misty water is truly the place to live. Its world-class features act as a springboard to happiness, fill your life with incomparable joy and make every sunrise an occasion to look forward to, with renewed enthusiasm. Travelling to close places and areas is completely convenient with exceptional connectivity to public transport facilities.Social infrastructures are to be found at a stone throw distance including Bangalore Baptist Hospital and State Bank of India both are situated at a distance of not more than 1.04Km. Also, Esteem Mall is accessible within 3.28Km radius. What are you waiting for, book a flat right now in Prestige misty water and accomplish your fantasy home.

The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

project_description: Sobha Gateway of Dreams is a project by Sobha Developers located in Panathur, Bangalore, offering skilful and thoughtfully designed currently under construction 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. It consists of 6500 units spanned over 25 floors. Sobha Gateway of Dreams price rate starts from Rs. 58 Lac onward. The project is developing world class apartments equipped with basic amenities in affordable prices for the residents to get a lavish experience.Project Details:Sobha Gateway of Dreams located in Panathur, Bangalore, is a project by Sobha Developers offering currently under construction 1 BHK and 2 BHK apartments. Sobha Gateway of Dreams plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range from 645 sq. ft. to 936 sq. ft. and 2 BHK flat areas range from 1000 sq. ft. to 1210 sq. ft.Sobha Gateway of Dreams apartments are being designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified tiles, ceramic tiles flooring in every room, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter top, branded sanitary CP fittings etc.Sobha Gateway of Dreams is a RERA Certified Project. Sobha Gateway of Dreams provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like 24*7 power backup, swimming pool, security facility, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, library, RO water system, air conditioned, vaastu compliant, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, club house, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts and private terrace & garden etc. and many more.Highpoints:Sobha Gateway of Dreams is being developed in Panathur, Bangalore. Various utilities like Balagere Bus Stop, VIBGYOR High School, Belandur Road Railway Road, Sankara Eye Hospital, Axis Bank ATM, City SuperBazaar, Apollo Pharmacy, The Fat Chef, Mahaprabhu Ramlal Siddhayoga Kendra Yoga Centre, HP Petrol Pump, etc. all lie in very close vicinity of the project.

project_description: OverviewThoughtfully developed by one of the well-known developers SVS Constructions, Trend Square Precioso is a wonderful residential project situated in Horamavu, Bangalore. This project consists of 140 spacious units spread across 2 dazzling towers. Trend Square Precioso price list for these spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK accommodations vary from Rs. 44.2 Lac to 83.7 Lac.Project detailsThe project is approved by various banks like HDFC Bank, Indiabulls, ICICI Bank, State Bank of India etc., and the project is currently in under construction stage. Trend Square Precioso floor plans are excellently planned to impress all the home seekers.The spacious and well ventilated 2 BHK and 3 BHK flats are spread across an area ranging between 930 sqft, 1643 sqft. The residents of this project can enjoy the stunning views of landscape and beautiful surroundings by standing in their spacious balconies.The project is tucked with the modern amenities such as children play area, gym, intercom facility, badminton court, elder's park, landscaped area, tennis court, jogging track, party hall, cricket bowling machine, abundant water supply etc. Also, the security of this project is on the higher side with CCTV surveillance and security guards.HighpointsBeing an unmatched project in the complete city is the main highlight of this project. Trend Square Precioso address also adds to the list of highlights. It just takes 10 minutes from the address of this project to reach Manyata Tech Park, Byappanahalli Metro and Samsung office. Further, some other attractive places like Phoenix mall, Forum value mall and Outer Ring Road are accessible within 3Km radius.Trend Square Precioso photos will help you understand this project in a better way. Altogether discover a whole new style of living by booking a flat now in Trend Square Precioso.

project_description: Sobha Dream Acres is a huge residential township by Sobha Group under their Sobha Dream Series. This is develop on 81 acres of land in Panathur, Bangalore. The project offers plenty of benefits that includes prime location, comfortable and lavish lifestyle, great amenities, healthy surroundings and high return. This project offers 1BHK and 2BHK apartments in different sizes. The master plan is designed in such a way that these Apartments comprises of wide space with proper ventilation.. The interiors are beautifully crafted with designer tiled floor, granite counter slab in kitchen, modern sanitary fittings in the bathroom and huge windows for proper sunlight.Out of the total 81 acres of the project, 80% is open space. This open area provides ample space for recreational facility and designer landscapes. It has 5 luxury club houses with swimming pools and indoor / outdoor sports, Coffee Shop, Open Air Theatre, clinic and many such amenities to give the residents luxury and full their necessities. Panathur is a promising locality of Bangalore that is showing signs that it will become another of Bangalore's entertainment and education hub with many malls and schools being planned and built. Why should I buy?It provides the best quality, world class amenities at affordable price.There is timely delivery, owing to the reliability of the builder group.The project has the location benefit as it is near Marathahalli - Sarjapur outer Ring Road and other IT commercial spaces.Price range and unit details:Sobha Dream Acres is offering 1BHK and 2 BHK flats priced depending upon the area. The total size of the flats range from 645 sqft to 1210 sqft with a price from 33 lac to 62 lacs. The project has 6500 flats in 16 towers. Nearby information, Places of Interest, Landmarks:Sobha Dream Acres is located in the Golden Quadrilateral of Bangalore. This area includes Outer Ring Road (ORR), Sarjapur and Whitefield. Since 2000, this area has become the centre of the IT/ITES business.It is in close proximity to Marathahalli - Sarjapur outer Ring Road, towards the West and ITPL and Varthur.About the builder:Sobha Limited was founded in 1995 and is one of India’s fastest growing and foremost backward integrated real estate company.  Sobha has made a footprint in 24 cities and 13 states across India.The company has all the key competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from its conceptualization to completion. It enjoys success in all the fields like residential, commercial, retail, leisure and hospitality sectors.Other projects by the builder:Sobha has completed 98 real estate projects and 258 contractual projects, covering about 6.31 million square meters of area. It has 49 ongoing residential projects in 24 cities and 13 states across India.Nearby projects:There are several ongoing projects in the area, including Assetz 63 dDegree East, Hara Vijaya Heights, Orchid Whitefield, and many more.
about_project_details: Great 35 years in building-up the exclusive and modern range properties which doesnt denote their work style, in fact, expounds how beautifully they create their projects which are absolutely as per the customers interest and have lot in a single project, its none other than Sobha Builders.Since inception, we have been creating humdinger landmarks which were customer centric along with best engineers, renowned architects, smart planners, etc. that together gives a perfect blend of everything where its easier for buyers to have a property of benefits and a land that has strength to raise the value.They are widely known for delivering best business centres, quality retail spaces, multiplex theatres, food courts, research centres, clubhouses and modern residential homes, with Perfection, Quality, Innovation, Brand, and Trust.They have a big role in transforming the perception of the buyers and investors and give the real product which has no room of troubles. Also their mission to have no shortcuts toquality because they try and test every single thing and then make the real use the marked things, thats why, their projects or any developments are based on high quality and supreme approach.Their first step in 1997, where they launched the residential project Sobha Sapphire in Bangalore, which has pulled the drastic interest of the home buyers and they also like their work as it was up to the expectations of the end-users. And today, in the year, 2015, they served another series in Housing segment- Sobha Dream Series thats impeccable, pristine and over the top.

project_description: Overview: ASN Galaxy is strategically located in Horamavu, Bangalore by the well experienced ASN Developers offering lavish and elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is currently ongoing construction and consists of 72 units spanned over 1 tower. ASN Galaxy price rate starts from Rs. 44 Lac onward. Project Details:ASN Galaxy is an ongoing project by ASN Developers offering aesthetic and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is being precisely designed in the prime location of Horamavu, Bangalore. ASN Galaxy plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1160 sq. ft. to 1255 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1324 sq. ft. to 1350 sq. ft. ASN Galaxy apartments are designed with certain skills and a well thought plan. The structure has a strong foundation and interiors like ceramic tiles flooring in balcony and toilet, laminated wooden flush doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, modular kitchen with granite platform and SS sink, sanitary fittings, and branded fixtures etc.ASN Galaxy amenities and facilities for its residents include a club house, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24*7 security facilities, reserved parking, gym, kids play area, rain water harvesting, vaastu compliant, grand entrance lobby, multipurpose hall etc. and many more in the property adding to the lavish lifestyle. Highpoints:ASN Galaxy is a gated community being constructed by ASN Developers in the happening location of Horamavu, Bangalore. It is well equipped with modern amenities for a pleasurable experience and is closely connected to rest of the city via various modes of transportation. Various utilities like Horamavu Bus Stop, Sri Chaitanya School, Asha Nursing Home, Syndicate Bank ATM, Maruthi Medical, Little Italy, Wolver Home Theatre, Gold's Gym etc. are all in the vicinity.

project_description: A fine creation by SLS Developers, SLS Signature situated at Panathur, Bangalore is an ultimate place to look for both a resale flat or an accommodation for rent. Featuring 4 splendid towers with total 300 units, SLS Signature is successful residential society praised with tons of positive reviews. The society offers a wide mix of 2 & 3 BHK ready-to-move-in apartments for the home-seekers. These homes vary from 1084 sqft to 1375 sqft and are offered at an unbeatable price. Project details Laid out across 3-acres of property, this residential project situated in one of the prime residential address of Bangalore is an ideal for a life-long investment. All the well-ventilated residential apartments of SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore are bestowed with fresh breeze & warm sunshine. Encircled by rich surroundings and brimmed with an array of modern amenities, these abodes invite you live a well-balanced life with your loving family. Celebrate every moment of your life with complete bliss at this residence which are attractive with brighter living spaces, immaculate bathrooms, spacious kitchens and charming balconies that provide incredible views of the surrounding area. Meditation area, indoor games room, kids play area, swimming pool, club house, 24hour security, round the clock water supply and much more promise a stress-free and smooth living which you always desired for. Highpoints SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore is a RERA certified residential project located in one of the favourite residential destination. Good proximity to important areas like Whitefield, Marathahalli & Koramangala is one of the chief advantage of this area. Excellent connectivity to public transport facilities is an additional benefit. Presence of good schools, hospitals, shopping malls and other necessities make this region preferable. If you been looking for a perfect home for your family, then walk in now and book a flat at SLS Signature Panathur, Bangalore

project_description: Pavani Residency is a project by Pavani Group strategically located in Yelahanka Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 4 Acre encompassing 210 units across 8 towers.  Pavani Residency comprises of 2BHK and 3BHK Flat and Builder Floor.  2BHK Flat has range of area from 900 Sq-ft to 1032 Sq-ft having 1 and 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1080 Sq-ft to 1570 Sq-ft and 3 bathroom. 2BHK Builder Floor has area 900 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 2 bathroom.  Launched in August 2010, Pavani Residency offers Ready To Move properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL, HDFC, ICICI, IDBI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI.
about_project_details: Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one. The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become poineers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time, with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 37 projects and 4 projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz.Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore.

Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one. The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.
Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become poineers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time, with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 37 projects and 4 projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz.Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore. 
PAVANI GROUP, backed up by twenty one years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards.PAVANI GROUP keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Backed up by highly and experienced Civil Project Directors with their team of young field engineers, who have completed a number of projects in and around Bangalore, Chennai, Nellore and Hyderabad covering Residential, Commercial Buildings, PAVANI GROUP is never short of concept for timely completion of high quality buildings. While doing so they ensure that they do not end up functional Architectural cul-de-sac.

project_description: Take a moment to stop and look. Inhale a deep lungful of air. Slow down and appreciate life at Mirabilis, a project that will evoke a sense of awe in you. Located just off Horamavu Main Road, one of the hottest destinations in North Bangalore, Mirabilis has seven pristine white towers nestled amidst lush greenery and is close to a natural lake. What is more with unique features like a Tree Atrium, Yoga, Meditation pavilion and Jogging Tracks longed paved greenery, every aspect here has been designed tastefully to encourage community and neighbourly interactions at all levels and age groups. In short, every moment spent in this project is a Mirabilis moment.
about_project_details: Kolte-Patil has been creating landmarks for 25 years.Founded 2 decades ago and guided by a simple yet profound philosophy; Creation, not construction, Kolte-Patil Developers Ltd. is one of the foremost real estate companies which is headquartered in Pune. Listed on NSE and BSE Kolte-Patil is Punes largest developer and has completed 1.3 crore sq. ft. of landmark developments in Pune and Bengaluru. It is also present in Mumbai with some upscale redevelopment projects.Headed by a team of visionaries and dynamic leaders, Kolte-Patil has till date built projects in multiple segments such as residential, commercial, retail, IT parks, and integrated townships. The long standing mission of the company is to dedicate itself to create spaces that blend in with the surroundings and exude vitality and aesthetic appeal, making the spaces present-perfect and future-proof. The core values of the company honesty, innovation, excellence eco-friendliness, technology, sustainability, value and commitment to time schedules are perfectly aligned with the living and working spaces it builds
