project_description: DSR Waterscape by DSR Infrastructure Private Limited is one of the much anticipated residential development located at Horamavu, Bangalore. Planned across 4.06 acres of beautiful land, this project is impressive with 5 wonderful towers sheltering 334 residential units. Scheduled for possession by June 2019, the flat rates of DSR Waterscape are priced reasonably within Rs. 38.9 Lac - 86.5 Lac. Project details Well-located in a peaceful neighborhood, this project upcoming project boasts total 211 two-bedroom flats measuring from 1179 to 1255 sqft and 123 three-bedroom apartments spread across 1435 to 1752 sqft. Surrounded by lots of greenery and brimmed with lots of fresh air, the well-ventilated residential apartments of DSR Waterscape are definitely worth buying to live a contented life. Brilliant design, tons of positive reviews from the investors and the spacious floor of DSR Waterscape make this project a promising investment destination. Robustly constructed, these earthquake resistant structures are beautifully designed with high-end specifications, fancy flooring and vibrant furnishings to provide quality homes with a slice of luxury. Some of the eco-friendly measures like rain water harvesting, water treatment plant, etc., and the project layout with 74% open green spaces make this residency a fine place to settle in. High-class lifestyle is guaranteed with top-notch amenities like a Wi-Fi enabled clubhouse, fitness zone, spa, Jacuzzi, joggers park, yoga court, amphitheatre, cricket pitch, basketball post and much more other noteworthy features. Highpoints Situated just 15 minutes away from Byappanahalli Metro Station, this RERA certified project is just 10kms away from Manyata Tech Park which make DSR Waterscape a boon to professionals working here. Horamavu is one of the calm and serene locality of Bangalore with numerous schools & hospitals within close proximity. A flat in this upcoming project is indeed a worthy decision. So, walk in and book a flat now in DSR Infrastructure.
about_project_details: DSR Group was established more than 2 decades ago in 1988 with the vision of transforming the real estate industry and today after the journey of so many years, its projects stand testimony to the shining excellence and brilliance in execution. Commanding an unparalleled expertise, the group has spread its operations across South India across many real estate verticals, catering to various categories of clients. DSRs repertoire has a wide array of exclusive projects which have been crafted to international standards.With diversified business interests across many portfolios, DSR today has achieved staggering success, thanks to its partners, associates, and employees. The group has several projects underway in Bangalore, Hyderabad, and Chennai catering to the customer with varied needs and tastes. Professional to the core and passionate about standards in construction, the company is moving fast forward into the future.

about_project_details: India's leading Real Estate Developer Established in 1972, Unitech is today a leading real estate developer in India. You can consider buying your dream home in this beautifully crafted building in a peaceful and tranquil living environment. Cumins Genesis, Bangalore is an ideal place, where you can invest in properties and this residential apartments. You can lead a safe and secure life with your family and enjoy the best of everything. The project is also known for its beauty, range of world class amenities and the locational benefits. The apartments in this beautiful society are design is contemporary style yet looks simple and elegant. The lush green garden ensure that each apartments in this beautiful society offer cross-ventilation. The project surroundings is perfect where you can enjoy life at its best. Cumins Genesis price is affordable and the living space in this society has specifications of 2bhk, 3bhk and 4bhk apartments. project_description: Balaji Krupa project is located off Basaveshwara Nagar Yelahanka in the North of Bangalore. North Bangalore is assured to be the next economic centre of Bangalore. Proximity to the International Airport, planned infrastructure such as the Elevated Expressway (Bellary Road), High Speed Rail Link, Bangalore Metro Rail, etc. have been the major growth drivers for residential development in North Bangalore. Also, the Government is aggressively promoting this area for future economic activities. The planned Information Technology Investment Region (ITIR) near Devanhalli, Aerospace SEZ planned near the International Airport and the proposed Devanhalli Business Park are the key drivers for residential development in North Bangalore. Jakkur Main Road is close to Manyata Technology Park, is close to this area with the presence of MNC companies and IT Park. Jakkur is now part of Bruhat Bangalore Mahanagara Palika (BBMP). As the development of Bangalore city towards the new airport continues, many professionals have started inhabiting the area; water supply as well as proper electrical facilities extend through the entire stretch on Jakkur Main Road.

project_description: Ramky One North is one of the popular residential developments in Yelahanka, neighborhood of Bangalore. It is among the ongoing projects of Ramky Estates and Farms Limited which aim to create spaces with subtle design that reverberate with warmth, comfort and luxury.Project detailsRamky One North encompasses each tower of 13 floors with over 754 apartments; Ramky One North offers premium floor plans such as 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments with well-designed living and dining areas. The project aims to provide comfortable and sophisticated apartment enclave accommodating facilities provided for the convenience of the residents.From stylish flooring to spacious balconies, standard kitchen size and high-quality fixtures, every little detail here grants it an attractive look. All the amenities in the brochure are all ready and waiting for you including club house, lift, security, park, swimming pool, intercom facility, reserved parking, etc.HighpointsYelahanka where this project is located is a suburb of Bangalore, originally envisaged as a satellite town of the city. The plus point of the locality is its weather, which is pleasant throughout the year as it is higher in altitude than the rest of the city. Besides, which, it also has several well-maintained lakes. The locality is clean, secure with private security in most gated communities. Yelahanka as an address is a nice locality to stay. This locality is very livable locality with educational institutions. It enjoys good connectivity to grocery shops, super markets, hospitals, schools, banks and ATMs. It is just at 15km away from International Airport as well connected to Bangalore City.A simple home surrounded by nature and filled with the love and beauty is what you'll get at Ramky One North. So what's stopping you, book a flat now and enjoy all the above facilities.

The Division constantly strives to create designs that are both sustainable and green, and which reverberate with warmth, comfort, and luxury. To date, we have successfully delivered 7 million sq.ft. Of living and work spaces, with 6.5 million sq.ft. Under development, and another 30 million sq.ft. Of prime space in the pipeline.

project_description: Overview: Enrich Kempegowda Enclave is a project by Enrich Properties located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering customisable and spacious residential plots. It is currently under construction and will consist of 106 units spread over a large area of land. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave price rate for these plots starts from Rs. 30 Lac onward.Project Details:Enrich Kempegowda Enclave, a residential project based in Yelahanka, Bangalore by Enrich Properties is offering lavish and aesthetically crafted residential plots of different dimensions to meet the potential buyer’s needs. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave plot areas for its residential spaces range from 1161 sq. ft. to 2407 sq. ft.Enrich Kempegowda Enclave features few basic amenities for its occupants such as power back up, 24 hour security facilities, park, children’s play area, reserved parking, internal wide roads with street lights, water and sanitary connection for every plot, gated community, grand entrance with security cabin, water supply, water storage, etc. to name a few.Enrich Kempegowda Enclave plots are carefully and skilfully crafted by the developers so the residents can experience a lifestyle they have never seen before. The residents can customise the plots with their own touch of specifications for their dream abode. They can construct lavish villas with a strong foundation and fully equipped with all sorts of amenities and facilities. Highpoints:Enrich Kempegowda Enclave locality is one of the fastest growing suburb of Bangalore, making this project a good choice for investment by potential buyers or investors. It is a lifestyle gated community and has many great advantages to give to its occupants. Enrich Kempegowda Enclave vicinity includes many basic civic utilities like Bangalore International Airport, Lakshmipura Cross Bus Stop, I Aim Health Care, Karnataka Bank ATM, Nandini Bar And Restaurant, Chikkabettahalli Lake, ESSAR Petrol Bunk, and HeliPad etc. are all part of close proximity.
about_project_details: After understanding the demand nuances of the market and considering the Unique Selling Proposition of the City of Bangalore the group has developed well thought projects that have immediately captured the imagination of potential customers.Each project has been selected by the promoters after considering carefully various criteria for the promotion of the projects. As a result, the group has had instant success in the marketing of each project. The main criteria the promoters have considered are, scenic beauty, proximity to essential facilities such as schools, colleges, medical facilities in Integrated Gated Townships.We, Enrich Properties, have diligently built a credible reputation with our main focus on Real Estate across Bangalore. Having aggregated and developed large tracts of land into BIAAPA, DTCPA and BMRDA approved residential layouts with value-for-money as our foundation. We offer top class finishes, workmanship and quality with transparency in all spheres of business.Our residential projects come with the best finishes, highest specifications, luxurious landscapes and best in line amenities. We offer plotted development with efficient environmental management. We ensure that environment friendly and high safety standards are a common feature in all our projects. We remain committed to deliver world-class projects thanks to the empowered team of highly committed and skilled resources using state-of-the-art technology. We have successfully completed plotted development projects covering around 15 million square feet of plotted area. project_description: Overview:Godrej Avenues offers spacious 2 and 3 BHK flats developed by the famous Godrej Properties, Yelahanka – Bangalore. The price range of the flats in the project is between 44.0 Lac and 84.4 Lac. Godrej Avenues have a total of 600 units divided into 10 expansive towers. The use of latest technology, superior quality materials and equipment to build the homes, makes the project worthy of your consideration. About the Project:The construction of Godrej Avenues spans on an area that has a vast expanse of greenery. The company is an amalgamation of Godrej Properties and MS Ramaiah Group with equivalent shares. Godrej Avenues project spans over an area of 10 million sqft in Yelahanka, a newly evolving retail region of Bangalore. The area has many established commercial enterprises like retails stores and branded stores.Godrej Avenues floor plan shows the amazing architecture planned for the project and will surely encounter maximum buyers attention. The modern amenities provided by the project include broadband internet, club house, intercom, 24 hour backup, play area, security, tennis court, badminton court, basketball court, maintenance staff, community hall, health facilities, swimming pool, cafeteria, indoor games, gymnasium, garden, etc. Your family deserves the best and Godrej Avenues apartments are just the place to gift them for a luxurious life.                                                                                                     Highpoints:The world class amenities along with the glamorous set of smart homes and guaranteed security procedures are the USP of Godrej Avenues. The society is very close to many schools and hospitals such as BMSIT College, Singanayakanahalli and Presidency School etc.More details can be found on the updated Godrej Avenues photos and details on the website. Hurry up and book your flat now. World class homes are waiting for you.
about_project_details: Godrej Properties was established in 1990 as a real estate development company within the Godrej Group of businesses. The company was originally incorporated as Sea Breeze Constructions and Investments Private Limited on February 8, 1985. The companys name was changed to Godrej Properties and Investments Private Limited on July 2, 1990 and subsequently to Godrej Properties Limited on November 23, 2004. Since 1897, customers have trusted Godrej to deliver innovation and excellence across a broad spectrum of services and products. The promise to deliver value drives the organization at every stage of operation. Firstly, the company evaluates the potential of possible locations and is led by a team of qualified managers. Once a location has been identified as a potential development zone, GPL works with only the foremost architects, contractors, and project managers to bring the project to life. GPL knows that its obligation to its customers and partners does not end upon the completion of a project, and therefore, provides post-project professional and accessible support also

project_description: Overview: Embassy Boulevard is a project by embassy group located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering spaciously crafted and exquisitely designed 4 BHK and 5 BHK villas. The development of the project is currently ongoing and will consist of 170 lavish units. Embassy Boulevard price rate starts at Rs. 6.30 Cr onward. Project Details:    Embassy Boulevard, a residential project located in the happening area of Yelahanka, Bangalore by embassy group is offering luxurious and spaciously designed 4 BHK and 5 BHK villas. Embassy Boulevard plot areas for its 4 BHK villa range from 3935 sq. ft. to 4105 sq. ft. and 5 BHK villa areas range from 5900 sq. ft. to 7310 sq. ft.Embassy Boulevard villas are being designed with premium standard interiors such as Italian marble flooring in every room and engineered wooden flooring in bedrooms, teak wood frame doors, concealed PVC copper wiring with modular switches, aluminium powder coated UPVC sliding windows with plain glass, designer bathrooms with good quality CP fittings and good quality paint in every unit etc.Embassy Boulevard Bangalore features numerous amenities such as a club house, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, power backup, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security, park, reserved parking, maintenance staff, multipurpose hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, landscape garden, rain water harvesting, indoor squash & badminton courts, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, conference room, and fire fighting systems etc.Highpoints:Embassy Boulevard is a well designed vibrant integrated township offering exquisite and spacious villas spread over 51 acres of total project area. The layout features several dimensions of its villas to meet the needs of potential buyers or investors. Embassy Boulevard Bangalore locality has access to various basic utilities like Government Lower Primary School, Sathya Sai Hospital, HDFC Bank ATM, Cafe Coffee Day, H A M park 2, Fitness Gym, etc.

project_description: OverviewMN Orchid is a luxurious project that offers world- class living by providing modern, stylish and well- ventilated flats. The MN Orchid in Yelahanka, Bangalore features signature floor plan to offer ample of open spaces so that you do not feel clustered and can spend quality time with your family. The ready to move MN Orchid is designed to offer affordable housing in Yelahanka, Bangalore as apartment price in society starts from Rs. 93.0 lac. There are 2 towers and 104 residential flats that are available for sale in various combinations of 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments. Project detailLoaded with best amenities and facilities, the MN Orchid features premium quality fittings and imported flooring and if you book a flat in MN Orchid, you will live in an environment that lets you relax and prosper. The project is constructed by the M & N Infrastructures that was established in Bangalore in 2013 and is one of the leading real estate developers when it comes to delivering best residential as well as commercial spaces. The residential flats in MN Orchid feature seismic zone II compliant RCC framed structure, RCC retaining walls, concrete solid/hollow block masonry for walls, vitrified flooring for dining room, living room, kitchen and family room, wooden laminated flooring for master bedroom, main door with teak wood frame, veneered flush shutter with melamine finish, other room doors with hard wood frame, concealed fire resistant copper wiring with adequate TV, Telephone, computer points, lights, AC and power point, superior quality emulsion/OBD for internal walls, texture paint for external walls, enamel paint and polish for wood and M.S. surfaces, concealed CPVC plumbing lines with high end sanitary fixtures, 24 hours water supply, overhead tanks in addition to borewell as an auxiliary source.The luxurious society is equipped with modern amenities like landscaped gardens, jogging track, well- equipped children’s play area, basket ball practice board, car parking, swimming pool with separate toddler pool and changing/shower room, table tennis, snooker/pool table, well- equipped children’s play area, multipurpose hall/party hall with rest rooms, rain water harvesting, water softening plant, self- sustained waste management system including STP and a lot more.

project_description: Overview: Pyramid Mahika is a project by Pyramid Builders And Developers located in Yelahanka, Bangalore offering lavishly crafted and meticulously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The infrastructure is ready to move into and consists of 212 units spanned over 4 towers. Pyramid Mahika Bangalore price rate starts at Rs. 36.4 Lac onward.  Project Details:    Pyramid Mahika, a project located in the prime area of Yelahanka, Bangalore by Pyramid Builders And Developers is offering lavishly crafted and meticulously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Pyramid Mahika plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 935 sq. ft. to 1036 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1314 sq. ft. to 1756 sq. ft.Pyramid Mahika apartments are designed with vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, teak wood frame main doors with skin panelled shutters and Sal wood frame internal doors, modular electrical switches and concealed branded wiring, black granite kitchen counter top with SS sink and drain board, three track aluminium powder coated windows, branded CP fittings and good quality white sanitary fixtures etc. Pyramid Mahika features several best in class amenities and facilities for its residents like jogging & strolling track, 24 hour security facilities, power supply, water supply, intercom facility, reserved parking space, children’s play area, CCTV camera surveillance, outdoor tennis courts, and fire fighting equipment etc. among many more. Highpoints: Pyramid Mahika is one of the most prestigious apartment complexes in the fast growing locality of Yelahanka, Bangalore. Pyramid Mahika Bangalore locality is well connected and just 1 km from the International Airport. The vicinity includes numerous basic civic utilities like Shivanahalli Bus Stop, Mallya Aditi International School, Yelahanka Junction, Dr. Agarwal’s Eye Hospital, Corporation Bank ATM, Ganesh Theatre, Café Coffee Day, and Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. for fulfilling the resident’s needs.

project_description: Sobha Clovelly is the signature residential project of Sobha Limited. A premium development, the project features a range of elegantly planned luxury homes with a beautiful natural setting. The project comprises of 2 stunning towers which are spanning across 3.25 Acres of land.Project detailsBeing RERA certified Sobha Clovelly features 23 floors with 137 units of 3 and 4 BHK apartments. Designed as per international standards the apartments are spacious and offer unhindered view and easy ventilation. The 3 BHK Flat covers area that ranges from 1346 to 2353 sqft having 1/2 balconies and 3/4 bathroom while the 4 BHK Flat is spread across an area that varies between 2773 sqft and 4690 sqft with 3 balconies and 3/4 bathrooms.With excellent floor plans Sobha Clovelly is planned to be a blend of well-planned apartments, ingeniously crafted interiors, international standards of quality and a range of exclusive services and recreational amenities. Some of the amenities offered are badminton court, basketball court, lawn tennis court, swimming pool, table tennis, toddler pool, yoga/meditation area and a lot more.HighpointsThe location of Sobha Clovelly is a prime destination for many house seekers in Bangalore which is located in the southern quadrant of the city. The locality is in proximity to the highway leading to Kanakpura Road. The location is excellent and most convenient. All basic facilities are within reach for instance shopping complexes like Big Bazar, Pai Mall are at a stone throw distance. Also, parks, schools, medical centers and banks are easily accessible hence the project is most preferred by many home seekers.This project is under construction hence the possession is slated to given in 2019. Before the opportunity of owning a spacious home is taken away by others, act smart and book a residence of your choice in Sobha Clovelly.
about_project_details: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

project_description: OverviewTata the Promont situated in Banashankari, Bangalore is well planned and developed by Tata Housing Development. This project is spread across 4 towers that consist of 306 residential flats. Tata the Promont price ranges in between 2.30 crores to 3.72 crores. The areas of these flats vary in size ranging from 2376 sqft to 6410 sqft area. Tata the Promont floor plan encompasses 3 and 4 BHK flats.About the ProjectLavishly spanning over 20000 sqft area in 3 levels, The Promont clubhouse gives the best refreshment and enjoyment without needing to step out of your home. Tata the Promont is crafted beautifully with modern architecture. This project provides lavish living with dual height lobbies in each of the towers featuring dual height and terrace gardens in all the residences. Each flat has branded modular kitchen. The bathroom in every 4 BHK unit is fitted with a high end Jacuzzi. The Tata the Promont photos give you a clear idea about the project and its design.The project offers an array of world class amenities to experience the bliss of a luxurious lifestyle. If you love being in water, you’ll enjoy unique outdoor infinity edge pool, temperature controlled pool and a Jacuzzi, a that gives you fabulous and scenic views ofBangalore.  You can Experiment with different routines of workout at the gymnasium. There’s even a squash court for the avid racquet swinger. The project also provides basic facilities like water supply, power backup, security and maintenance staffs.HighpointsThe renowned Sri Chaitanya Techno School is situated within the periphery of 2km. Bhuvaneswari Nagar Bus Stop is situated at a radial distance of 2.5km. State of Bank of India is the banking facility available within the vicinity of 2.8km.
about_project_details: Tata Housing Development Company, a fully owned subsidiary company of Tata Sons, was established in the year 1984 by the legendary JRD Tata. The real estate major has gone strengths from strengths since 2006, developing into a holistic company with many landmark real estate projects across the country to its credit. The company is known for spearheading the cause of low cost housing for the economically weaker section of the country. Tata Housing builders follow the mission to delight thecustomers by provision of quality life spaces stemming from continuous innovation. Recognized for its ethical business practices and superior construction quality, the company has quickly become one of the most preferred real estate developers of India. The awe-inspiring designs of their constructions do not cease to marvel their customers even today also. Their pioneering work in the field of sustainable green development and commitment to low-cost housing has earned acclaim and awards.

The real estate major has gone strengths from strengths since 2006, developing into a holistic company with many landmark real estate projects across the country to its credit. The company is known for spearheading the cause of low cost housing for the economically weaker section of the country. Tata Housing builders follow the mission to delight the
customers by provision of quality life spaces stemming from continuous innovation. Recognized for its ethical business practices and superior construction quality, the company has quickly become one of the most preferred real estate developers of India. The awe-inspiring designs of their constructions do not cease to marvel their customers even today also. Their pioneering work in the field of sustainable green development and commitment to low-cost housing has earned acclaim and awards.

project_description: Prestige South Ridge, introduced by Prestige Group, is a residential township located at Banashankari, Bangalore. Priced between Rs. 2.10 crores and Rs. 2.70 crores (price per sq-ft ranging from Rs. 8076 to Rs. 9310), this project has 3 and 4 BHK multi-storey apartments covering areas from 2600 sq-ft to 2900 sq-ft. Distributed among 9 towers, it has more than 264 spacious houses in 5 residential blocks. Prestige South Ridge in Banashankari has got Mysore Road on the west, J.P. Nagar and Jayanagar on the east, Basavangudi and Hanumanthnagar in the north, Uttarahalli and Padmanabhanagar in the south, and is thus well-connected. The Prestige Group that has built Prestige South Ridge had given Bangalore its first global-standard shopping mall, i.e. The Forum at Koramangala. It is a renowned and trusted group having won many prestigious awards.Prestige South Ridge offers excellent modern amenities like kids play areas and swimming pools, gymnasium and health club, party hall and rentable community space. The landscaped gardens are laced with cobbled paths and shimmering water bodies, thus making the scenic beauty serene. Basic and advanced amenities like power backup, security, elevators, internet and wi-Fi connectivity, library and business center, rain water harvesting, multipurpose courts, recreational pool, and outdoor tennis courts, make Prestige South Ridge, a complete and enjoyable living space.

project_description: One look at Sobha Heritage will establish this fact. This iconic project with 2 and 3 BHK apartments in Banashankari 3rd Stage is a truly unique offering not just because of its strategic location and a setting that is idyllic, but also because everything here is practically accessible within a traffic free drive. What’s more, this project abounds with exceptional features and is blessed with abundant greenery spread around homes. With features like a Juliet window to gaze from, a winding bicycling track and a jogging track to set the heart racing, beautiful French gardens with antique park benches that reminds one of Europe, a charming Fountain in the Plaza, gorgeous Gazebos spread around the project, a Cascading pool with water spouts, lobbies done in the Baroque, Rococo and Neo Classical styles and more, Sobha Heritage seems to have been designed to give a new definition to Community Living, that epitomizes life at its best.
about_project_details: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

project_description: Overview: Godrej Air is an elegant residential project by the quite experienced Godrej Properties located meticulously in Hoodi Circle, Bangalore offering 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project consists of 487 units spanned over 8 high rise towers and is currently ongoing construction. Godrej Air price rate starts at Rs. 42.4 Lac onward. Project Details:    Godrej Air, a project skilfully based in Hoodi Circle, Bangalore by Godrej Properties is offering aesthetically crafted 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Godrej Air plot areas for its 1 BHK flat range from 706 sq. ft. to 716 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 1108 sq. ft. to 1430 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1639 sq. ft. to 1853 sq. ft. Godrej Air Bangalore features many modern amenities and facilities such as a club house, cafeteria, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis court, power back up, security, lift, swimming pool, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, piped gas, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, vaastu compliant, waste disposal, large open space, multipurpose hall, activity deck, and event space etc.Highpoints:Godrej Air is well planned and executed residential project offering lavish and aesthetically luxurious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The residents can enjoy world class amenities and a serene environment over the large open space. Godrej Air Bangalore locality is in close proximity to the leading IT companies, global schools, best-in-class healthcare centers, and malls etc. Various basic civic utilities like Metro Depot, RBANM's High School, Hosmat Hospital, Lido Mall, The Oberoi, Big Bazaar, Dr Batra’s - Homeopathy Clinic, Inox, Kushal Indoor Garden, and Indian Oil Petrol Pump etc. are part of the vicinity.
about_project_details: Godrej Properties Ltd. follows the Godrej Properties Ltd. philosophy of Innovation and Excellence in the real estate industry. Godrej Properties Ltd. is the first real estate company to have achieved ISO Certification. The company is currently developing landmark projects in 12 cities across India. To create landmark structures, Godrej Properties Ltd. collaborates with outstanding associates and reputed names. Over the last few years, Godrej Properties Ltd. has received over 50 awards and recognition's for developing residential, commercial and township projects. The company aims to deliver superior value to all stakeholders through extraordinary and imaginative spaces created out of deep customer focus and insight.

project_description: Mahaveer Turquoise is one of the projects of Mahaveer Group which is for the Youth. It is for the hungry, tech-savvy, financially liberating as well as driven youngsters who want to invest now to reap the benefits for the future. Situated in close proximity to Electronics City, off Hosur Road and to the proposed Basapura Metro station, this property is situated in one of the emerging investment hotspots of South Bangalore.Home-buyers seeking apartments for rent in Electronics City now have an excellent opportunity. Designed to cater to the dynamic and young working class, this project is accessible from the much happening IT suburbs. Electronics city and Sarjapur Road are home to a number of companies, specifically belonging to the information technology industry and have the largest tech parks spread over an estimated 20000 acres of land. Due to a large number of work-spaces in this area, Electronic City has been given access to almost all extremes of the city via the Hosur Road Elevated Expressway. The Expressway, a 10 km long route connects Electronic City all the way to Silk Board as well. Mahaveer Turquoise is also closely located to the proposed airport on Hosur Road and the current International Airport, therefore, enabling easy entry and exit points to the property. Find your dream home at Mahaveer Turquoise, specially built keeping in mind the three important aspects of Luxury, Elegance, and Comfort. This property is set to provide you with unlimited access to all the essentials of a city life while also ensuring you find your peace amidst the chaos.
about_project_details: Mahaveer Group, South India's first and only ISO 9001:2015 real estate company is synonymous with quality homes and landmark projects dotting the cityscape of Bangalore. A flagship initiative of Reddy Structures Pvt. Ltd., Mahaveer has earned a reputation as one of South India's largest and most specialized real estate companies.

project_description: The name says it all. Premia. We've left no stone unturned in defining and designing the ultimate in Premium Living. For you.The Premia Life presents itself through ultra-luxury 3BHK and 4BHK apartments at Banashankari II Stage, one of Bangalore’s finest residential localities. Set to be a new landmark in southern Bangalore, Premia is destined to set a new benchmark in elegance, luxury and sophisticated high-living.
about_project_details: Founded and formed by Mr. BM Jayeshankar and Mr. BM Karunesh, the Adrash Developers was established 28 years ago and got fame as the innovative creator of luxurious lifestyle. Established in Bangalore, the group constructed its first residential property in 1996 and after that there was no looking back. project_description: Hilife Magnifique is a project by Hilife Ventures located in Varthur, Bengaluru offering skilful and aesthetically designed 2 BHK, and 3 BHK apartments. It consists of 96 units and 1 tower. Hilife Magnifique price rate starts from Rs. 81 Lac. OnwardProject Details:Hilife Magnifique located in Varthur, Bengaluru, is a project by Hilife Ventures with 12 years of real estate experience under its belt offering spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Hilife Magnifique plot area for its 2 BHK flats range from 1095 sq. ft. to 1250 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flats range from 1480 sq. ft. to 1605 sq. ft. Hilife Magnifique is designed with high quality interiors and well equipped amenities to meet the lifestyle needs. All the apartments are done with vitrified tiling, teak wood door frame, granite kitchen platform, jaguar CP fittings, etc.Hilife Magnifique is a RERA Certified Project. Hilife Magnifique also has many basic amenities like power back up, swimming pool, lift, security, park, intercom facility, banquet hall, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens, water storage, waste disposal, indoor squash & badminton court, meditation area, conference room, fire fighting equipment etc. Other special amenities include a club house, jogging & strolling track, and cycling & jogging track.Highpoints:Hilife Magnifique is located strategically in Varthur, Bengaluru. The surroundings have all the utilities and facilities required to fulfill the residents necessities. It is 5.7 km from Kalamandir Bus Stop and 7.4 km from Sankara Eye Hospital. The project is just 3 km of close proximity to utilities like CS-Panathur bus stop, VIBGYOR High School, Cosmos Mall, Belandur Road station, and other grocery stores, parks, gyms, restaurants, pharmacy etc. With a great neighbourhood and close proximity to so many utilities, Hilife Magnifique makes for the perfect investment.

about_project_details: Established in 2002, ZIVA VENTURES commenced its operations with a group of developers. Riding on the growth wave of real-estate, the group made a strategic shift into constructions of villas, apartments and Residential plots/sites. From then on it transformed into a new breed of builders and carved an enviable niche for itself in the real estate arena, offering great quality of living spaces at extremely competitive prices. ZIVA VENTURES achieves customer delight by offering unmatched living experience through continued quality consciousness, which is steeped in every aspect and stage of the construction cycle, right from project conception, through execution and delivery.The Company's vision as a real estate development company is to develop self-reliance in our esteemed customers and help them to have a home of their own. Wrapped around this vision is the company's mission to deliver unique, integrated lifestyle, work place environments and planned developments. One of its main focus areas is developing integrated master planned communities wherein the developments have one or more community facilities, including hospitals, schools, retail and commercial buildings enabling a "LIVE, WORK and PLAY" theme within the same development.

SNN Builders property development portfolio is diverse in scope and style, attracting considerable interest from not just end consumers but also from many investors.Since their inception, SNN Builders has made great strides in changing the lifestyle of Bengalureans. Having understood the core philosophy behind comfortable living, they have been innovating constantly to give their customers the best. The key competitive advantages are SNNs sound financial backing, availability of large resources and high level of management expertise. SNNs corporate philosophy is to focus on balancing the evolving needs of a modern city while maintaining and conserving the environment. Most of their ongoing and upcoming projects are located in South and North Bangalore with a range of 1, 2, 3, 4 BHK residential Apartments, Penthouses

project_description: A life in a modern suite is what a person demands from life. Living the life on the edge is another one of the things that one demands. In this ever-growing population of the country, finding such a house which offers you almost all the basic facilities and soothes all your desires are really tough to find, considering that the main aim of the builders is to provide housing facilities and not quality living. But now, Century Infiniti comes to the rescue, giving you all the basic amenities along with a very splendid living experience.One of the things that the builder flaunts about the project is the location. The location being in the Sarjapur in Bangalore. The site is merely 12 kms away from the railway station, 55 kms away from the International Airport and about 4 kms from the Central Bangalore, which makes it a very ideal location for residents. The builder further offers the customers all the basic amenities, like a play area, swimming pool and multiple other basic facilities that one demands from a builder. The builder is claiming to give possession by August 2016, and has further stated that the project is unfurnished and has 3 BHK apartments of 1891 sq-ft.

project_description: OverviewSai Metro City is an ongoing project that offers affordable housing in the city. It is valued at Rs 18 lakhs and extends upto 27.8 lakhs.Project DetailsThe project is located in Chikkanahalli-Kamanahalli village which is in close proximity to Kugur village,Sarjapura.  Spread across 150 acres, it is a township project that offers a wide range of amenities. The modern facilities are amenities are plugged into this project like dedicated water and power supply facility, complete gated community with round the clock security, rainwater harvesting, themed garden, landscape gardens, sewerage water treatment facility, international club houses are available. The project also offer entertainment areas like basketball court, tennis court, badminton court, beach, volleyball court along with a club house to entertain the people to the core. The park spreads across 44 acre and is a lively place that offers peace of mind for people of different age group. Here, the visitors can have a silent morning walk or spend the evening with their kids or let the kids steal the show. The project is a complete package for the buyers who desire for modern lifestyle away from daily din and noise of the city.High PointsWhat makes this project the most sought after is its location.  Kugur Lake which is stretched around 100 acres, surrounded by the reputed schools and colleges, and by Vartur High Tech Area and corporate houses like Infosys SEZ and proposed WIPRO university. Also, it is situated nearby to the international club house located in Peripheral Ring Road and STRR Ring Road. The project is definitely must buy for the customers who really want to convert their home into a dream home. Come, make your dream come true, by owning this house. Enquire the details about the project. Go, ahead!

project_description: Overview:SPA Eco City is a ready for possession residential project by SPA Group located in Sarjapur, Bangalore offering spacious and skilfully designed residential plots. The project consists of 403 units spread over a total project area of 40 acres specifically designed for every individual’s lavish lifestyle. SPA Eco City price rate starts from Rs. 32.4 Lac onward.  Project Details:SPA Eco City is a project strategically developed in the happening locality of Sarjapur, Bangalore by SPA Group offering spacious and skilfully designed residential plots, which can be customised to a certain level. SPA Eco City plot areas for the 403 units of residential space range from 1200 sq. ft. to 5400 sq. ft.SPA Eco City residential plots are customisable to a certain extent but have specifications such as being developed on a earthquake resistant RCC frame structure and designed with interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, designer doors, good quality sanitary fittings, concealed wiring with branded modular switches, designer bathroom with branded CP fittings, and premium quality fixtures etc.SPA Eco City has numerous amenities for its occupants such as a club house, cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, outdoor tennis court, dance studio, power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, banquet hall, indoor games room, kids club, children’s play area, rain water harvesting, RO water system, water storage, air conditioned, canopy walk, multipurpose courts, waste disposal, and event space etc. among others.Highpoints:SPA Eco City is the first resort style gated community designed with a perfect balance of nature and landscaped land. The plot is spread over 40 acres and offering spacious residential plots. SPA Eco City locality is just 20 min from Electronic City and 10 min from the upcoming Infosys Campus at Sarjapur.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Location Advantages:20 Mins drive to Electronic City and Wipro Corporate Office.10 Mins drive to Upcoming Infosys Campus at Sarjapur.10 Mins drive to 18 hole Golf Course, Shopping Malls, Upscale Restaurants and Micro Breweries in the neighborhood.20 Mins drive to renowned Hospitals like Narayana Hrudayala, Columbis Asia and Sparsh, and Schools like TISB, Indus International, Inventure Academy, Greenwood High etcAmenities Grand entry gate and plazaWell engineered cobbled/asphalted roads LED/Solar streetlightsCaptive electric transformers and well-designed panels Minimum power of 3KVA provided to each plotSeparate, concealed, underground electrical, data and telecom cabling Engineered and perfectly modelled storm water drainage systemRainwater harvesting and engineered groundwater recharging pitsExclusive water storage tank and bore wells for 24/7 water supplyFunctional Sewerage Treatment PlantConcealed underground sewerage system with theft proof manholesSeamless wheelchair and pram-friendly pathways, also enabling unhindered walking/joggingStreet furnitureTrash cansBicycle racksExtensive landscaping to provide an attractive and healthy ambiencePlantation of trees and plants with sound and dust absorption propertiesStrategic plantation of aromatic plants and fruit trees for use by community ownersReflective road signage for all roads.

NBR Developers & Builders Pvt. Ltd., is a young, dynamic and vibrant real estate developer from Bangalore formed to fulfil the aspirations of people to have their own house. NBR Property Developer has pledged itself towards fulfilling this aspiration of people and has since 1998 worked in creating residential plots in Hosur, Plots, Villas, Apartments, Houses, Lands, Real Estate, Flats for sale.

The Company is managed by NBR Brothers Mr. Nagabhushan Reddy & Mr. Aswathnarayan Reddy. The Company commenced its operations in Bangalore in the year 1998. Its primary business is creation of residential plots and building residences. In addition, it has also identified infrastructure development as business line for future growth. Its operations span across various aspects of real estate development, such as land identification and acquisition, project planning, designing, marketing and execution.

The Company's vision as a real estate development company is to develop self-reliance in young people and help them to have a home of their own. Wrapped around this vision is the company's mission to deliver unique integrated lifestyle and work place environments and planned developments. One of its main focus areas is developing integrated master planned communities means wherein the developments have one or more community facilities, including hospitals, schools, retail and commercial buildings enabling a "LIVE, WORK and PLAY" theme within the same development.

Casagrand Builder Private Limited
Casagrand Builder Private Limited is one of the leading construction company in India which was incorporated back in 2004. The ISO Certified Chennai based Real Estate Development Company has created skyline in construction sector under the leadership of M. Arun Kumar - Founder and K.R. Anerudan Managing Director. Known for its exceptional skills in the development of premium living space and affordable housing, Casagrand has completed several projects comprising of 1bhk, 2bhk, 3bhk & 4bhk residential apartments with area ranging from 559 sqft at 33.3 Lac price, housing complex and luxury villas in Coimbatore, Bangalore & Chennai. 
Till date, Casagrand Builder Private Limited has developed over 9 million sqft of prime residential real estate buildings in Chennai across 68 landmark properties with more than 4000 happy customers. The realty company works on the philosophy of building superior living spaces with premium amenities, classy designs and tasteful interiors. Some of the projects under the brand name are Casagrand Irene in Chennai, Casa Grande Masseys in Chennai, Casa Grande Monte Carlo in Chennai, Casagrand ECR 14 in Chennai and there are many more.

project_description: Overview:  Dreaming of owning a home in Bangalore, but scared of the rising prices? Well, here is a good news for all those who wish to purchase a home in a good locality of Bangalore.  Sowparnika Flamenco, Sarjapur – Bangalore  presents to you brilliantly constructed 1, 2 and 3 BHK homes. The project is developed by the famous  Sowparnika Projects & Infrastructure, Sarjapur – Bangalore .  Project Details:  The  apartments in Sowparnika Flamenco  are moderately priced between 17.0 Lac and 39.8 Lac. The project has a huge tower that houses 264 units planned to perfection. The  flats in Sowparnika Flamenco  are still under construction and will be delivered for possession between December 2020 and January 2021. Spacious, well ventilated and sunny flats are designed as per the  Sowparnika Flamenco floor plan . The 1 BHK homes are spread over an area range between 425 sqft and 450 sqft, the 2 BHK flats span over an area range of 747 sqft and 778 sqft and the 3 BHK flats are built over an area between 907 sqft and 996 sqft.The  reviews of Sowparnika Flamenco  appreciate the world class amenities offered by the project.- Kids play pool with water slides, CCTV camera, internet, Wi-Fi connectivity, rain water harvesting, kids play area, maintenance staff, intercom facility, reserved parking for members, 24x7 guaranteed security service, lift, swimming pool and power back up, etc. are some of the facilities offered here.  Highpoints:  Along with the affordable homes that it offers,  Sowparnika Flamenco – Bangalore  gives you easy access to other parts of the city with the easily available public transport. The area that it is located is very near to the IT hub and is a fast developing region of the city.This is a one-time opportunity and should not be missed at any cost. You can go through the  updated Sowparnika Flamenco photos  to know what we are trying to say. Get your home today!!!

project_description: Shri Sai Lake Ville brings together the finest that nature and man can provide. Panoramic views of a Varthur Lake well planned 2 & 3 BHK spacious units, exceptional landscaping, stunning clean, sleek architecture design, world-class amenities and luxury-filled residences. Shri Sai Lake Ville standing 5 storey tall, it soars literally and metaphorically over every other building in the suburbs. With a contemporary international façade and design that make it a landmark. Welcome to another landmark in the IT corridor “Shri Sai Lake Ville” Apartments in the green expanse of land. Each apartment is well ventilated with an abundance of nature light and air. With multinational companies in the vicinity, it puts you in the elite company. Proximity to the essentials like schools, colleges, medical facilities, shopping and entertainment Centers make life more convenient. These exclusive 95 units 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments are limited to a select number of premium residencies away from the busy roads and sound of the city. They are soothingly settled right beside and overlooking the iconic Varthur Lake, providing tranquil surroundings and peace of mind.

project_description: Unicca Emporis by Unicca Builders in Varthur, Bangalore is a well designed residential project offering 214 units spread across 5 towers of 16 floors. The apartments are available in the price range of Rs.70.10 lakhs to Rs.2.15 crore. Project Details Unicca Emporis from Unicca Builders is a thoughtfully designed residential project featuring 2BHK and 3BHK apartments at a rate of Rs.5000 and Rs.9800 per sqft. This project provides luxurious and premium residences in area size of 1402 sqft and 2194 sqft. Encompassing an area of 3.25 acres, the residences in this project are beautifully designed and provide a bunch of high-end amenities for residents to enjoy. Some of the well known facilities include gym, tennis court, clubhouse, cycling and jogging track, infinity swimming pool, kids play area etc. Essential amenities such as round the clock security, rainwater harvesting, solar fencing, car parking space and power backup are also included. The apartments are not only well designed, they invite lot of natural light and cross ventilation too and offer spectacular views of the Varthur Lake. The price of Unicca Emporis residences oscillates between affordable and high-end depending on the type of apartment one chooses to invest in. Catering to the elite segment, the apartments are draped in luxurious fittings and fixtures to help residents experience and enjoy a stunning lifestyle. Highpoints Unicca Emporis in Varthur, Bangalore is particularly known for some of its unique features facilities such as spa, infinity edge swimming pool, sky lounge and private plunge pools. According to Unicca Emporis reviews, this RERA certified project leaves no stone unturned in offering all the luxurious facilities and amenities to ensure residents truly enjoy a high-end lifestyle. To reside amid luxury and experience sheer bliss, invest now in Unicca Emporis in Varthur, Bangalore.
about_project_details: From the very first inception of a design, UNICCA is committed to making the completion of each project a reality. The core strength of our commitment is reflected in our projects with focus on our clients and a dedication to deliver. At UNICCA our goal is to create products that improve the way our customers live. At home, at work, and at play. With the future in mind, we are creating livable communities while remaining committed to environmental sustainability. Backed by over a decade of solid experience, our key focus remains on building exceptional properties in some of the most desirable cities across India.As builders, project managers and developers we have formed an experienced team that have the unique ability to control every aspect of a property development project, ensuring that quality remains a constant and common objective and we provide you with the advantage of opulence to create your dream home.

project_description: The only project that matches your innermost desires for your perfect home is Icon Sanctuary villas. This exquisite gated community, a creation by ICON Homz matches your lifestyle as well as everything you have been looking for in a house. Still ongoing with possession slated for 2018, the villas are available in the price range of Rs.75 lakhs and Rs.88 lakhs.Project detailsIcon Sanctuary is coming up with 3 BHK lavish lifestyle habitats of hi-end villas in a tranquil location of Sarjapur, Bangalore. It opens up a world of fun with all ultra modern amenities, infrastructure and unmatched recreation facilities. Icon Sanctuary price list offers 3BHK villas spread across 1750 - 2010 sqft at a budgeted price that varies between Rs.75 Lakhs and 88 Lakhs. The villas are adhering to vaastu principles spreading positive vibes all around.Being strategically located in Sarjapura, these 3 BHK villas are surrounded with international schools like Indus International School, Oakridge International School, Greenwood High, St Patrick Academy etc. The project is located in amidst lush green landscape, but not far from the daily life needs. BMTC bus stop is accessible within short distance, so does the shopping area. Also it just takes 15 mins drive to reach Wipro corporate office and 20 mins to reach Forum value mall, Whitefield.HighpointsIcon Sanctuary gives you that choice to live under the bright blue sky with lush greenery. RERA certified, Icon Sanctuary offers amenities such as indoor games, intercom facility, club house, swimming pool, meditation hall, amphitheater, open lawns, security etc. Also, maintenance staff is available so that services can be accessed with no trouble. You can take for granted; owning a villa in Icon Sanctuary fills your life with joy in most unique and luxurious way. To own a villa all you have to do is book now.
about_project_details: ICON Homz - Live, Grow, Shine The place for villas, apartments and villa plots We are residential real estate developers based in Bangalore offering awe-inspiring villas, apartments, and villa plots at affordable price points. We focus in the emerging and growing areas such as Hosur road, electronic city, and Sarjapur road. With proven track record, we have successfully completed iconic residential projects - villas, apartments and villa plots - in Bangalore. Our focus remains in offering value for our customers and optimizing the functionality of usable space in our projects.

project_description: VAHE PROJECTS PVT LTD., Proudly Presents VAHE IMPERIAL GARDENS Ultra Luxury Apartment's project on White field -Sarjapur Main Road Gunjur,Varthur, Bangalore.Spread over 1.5 acres of land with Double basement and 14 upper floors. The apartment comprises of 166 Exclusive 3bhk and 2bhk apartments in two blocks with the area Starting from 1100 Sft to 1560 Sft.The apartment with 73% of open space with no vehicular driveway and parking slot on the ground floor gives more space and full utilisation of the open space around the building for beautifully landscaped gardens and wide range of amenities such as a swimming pool, Outdoor Community hall with Amphitheatre, Jogging track, Fully equipped gym, Indoor games room and Meditation room makes the project a much sought of place to reside.VAHE IMPERIAL GARDENS is just 4kms away from White field Forum value mall on whitefield - Sarjapur Road and 6.5kms from Wipro corporate office, 8 kms from ITPL, 7 Kms from Outer Ring road. The close proximity and connectivity to prime areas like Outer Ring Road, Wipro Corporate Office(Sarjapur Road), Whitefield, ITPL, Sigma Tech Park, Sarjapur. about_project_details: Incepted in 2005, Vahe has been in the business of Construction Projects, Interiors Designing and Consultancy. In a short span of time, the company earned renown for its inclusive business philosophy and value driven operations. In the area of Construction, be it a Business Park, a residential cluster or even a customized campus, Vahe has an awesomely lined up expertise, economics and engineering abilities to do the project for you. When it is about Interiors, Vahe surpasses the client expectations in creativity, optimized utility, stunning concepts, and efficient economics. The company will design and execute strikingly imaginative contemporary and futuristic interiors to meet any purpose Consultancy is another strong arm of Vahe. The company provides its clients with an unfailing advice on varied ventures. Here again, it is Vahe competence that gravitates clients. The company end to end consultancy process invariably aims at achieving results beyond ordinary perception. In brief, with an incredible combination of technical competence, economic acumen, project management proficiency and commitment to eco friendliness, Vahe stands among the most significant ones in the business. The Bottomline Vahe commitment to its customer goes beyond its business activity and extends to building customer loyalty and ensuring their satisfaction. So, when Vahe says we are inspired by you it is not just a catchphrase, but it is a true to conscience expression.

project_description: Overview Spanning across 1-acre of prime land, Golden Lotus Varthur, Bangalore by Upscale Homes features a wide collection of 108 luxurious units embedded with a single 11 storey building. Spread across 1137, 1391 sqft, these luxurious flats are offered with 2 and 3 BHK configurations and the flat prices of Golden Lotus varies starting from Rs. 52.0 Lacs, 79.9 Lacs. Project details Golden Lotus apartments are tastefully designed with eye-catching interiors, premium rooms, well-fitted kitchen, standard fittings and also offer easy access to all the recreational facilities like shopping malls, restaurants, cinema halls, etc. Upscale Golden Lotus rent option is also available if you have just wish to live in this residence for a limited period of time.  Built by Upscale Homes, one of the reputed builders of Varthur, Bangalore, Upscale Golden Lotus reviews are remarkably positive and all these brand new apartments are offered with freehold rights. In order to offer a world-class living to its residents, this residential society offers a pool of modern amenities like:Swimming pool, clubhouse, gymnasium, kids club, amphitheatre, meditation area, kids play area and many more other leisure amenities are available right at your doorstep.This multi-storey building has been provided with a Schindler lifts, power backup facility, round the clock security and fire fighting equipment.Enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the flower gardens and parks, which ensure a complete peace of mind. Highpoints Varthur is a favourite residential neighbourhood for working professionals as it offers easy access to RMZ EcoSpace, ITPL, Prestige Tech Park and Embassy Tech Village. Columbia Asia Hospital, VIMS Hospital, Oakridge International School, Inventure Academy and Forum Value Mall are some of the prestigious landmarks of this residential development. Golden Lotus photos are available online for more details. Book a flat now and make a safe and lucrative investment.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Rmz Eco Space 8.7 Km.Embassy Tech Vilg.6.8 Km.Sakara Hospital 8.6 Km.Cessana Bus. Park 6.8 Km.Vims Hospital 8.2 Km.Prestige Tech Park 6.8 Km.Forum Value Mall: 3.5 Km.ITPL: 8.7 Km.Colmbia Asia: 3.5 Km.TISB, Inventure Acadamy, Okridege International School, Greenwood High: 4 Km.Project USP:-Architecturally designed for maximum fresh air circulation in to the entire complex and flat. Improved indoor air quality, Go Green.76 percent open area (Building footprint 24 percent), which implies more open space, maximum lighting and ventilation , Go Green.Seismic II zone, IS-1893 compliant RCC framed structure. Superior Safety.State-of-the-art Elevators of Schindler make - Fully automatic with Machine room less and Gearless technology and completely safe with Automatic Rescue Device and Overload detec tion.Design for future: Common services are designed considering the usability, scalability, maintainability, organic growth, future needs of the inhabitants like.Stand by power, back up: Diesel Generator sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.EB power: Transformer sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirementSTP, WTP: Plant sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.Water storage tanks: Sizing done for 120 percent of the todays maximum requirement.Building metering: The use of meters to track the use of utilities (such as water and electricity) per unit to enhance the electricity, water performance of residential dwelling unit(s) and maintenance cost proportionate to the actual consumption.Lightning protection system: use of sophisticated Early Streamer Emission (ESE) Air Terminals for Better Safety. New climate models predicted a 50precent increase in lightning strikes across the world during this century as a result of global warming.Vastu: House plans are developed keeping practical vastu in mind.AAC, CLC, Clay bricks providing excellent thermal insulation, sound insulation and wall dampness proof! A green building material, Go Green.State-of-the-art Swimming pool: This pipe-free Compact Filtration System is extremely sturdy, most energy efficient, and very easy to maintain, Go Green.Use of water-efficient fixtures from GROHE AG and water closets from AMERICAN Standard, Go Green.Wall Mounted European Water Closet with concealed flush valve! Better Hygiene.Single lever hot and cold mixer with overhead showerAdvanced composite plumbing system for joint free bathroom piping- Composite (PE-ALPE) pipes with SS, Brass adaptors, Maintenance free.Granite vanity top, under counter pastel colour washbasins Neat and Clean look.Dual plumbed: The building with two sets of pipes: one for drinking water and one for recycled.Dry and wet area separation in all bathrooms. Better Hygiene.Concealed plumbing lines in ducts: this helps in maintaining the appearance of the area and preserving the aesthetic look of your building.

project_description: Golden Star is located on the fast growing Brookfield's - ITPL Road. It is just a 10 minute drive from the Airport and 5 min to ITPL.Golden Star has apartments that are like independent homes with 5 star facilities like extensive landscaped gardens with fountains, a mini club house, Gym, Swimming pool, capsule lifts, departmental store etc. A new venture of Golden Gate Properties comprising of 148 flats. All the apartments have independent walls (like an independent house) and each excellently ventilated apartment preserves your individuality and yet, blends beautifully with the lush green surroundings. Golden Gate's Philosophy is to make life better. It's how our dream travels; beyond a mere four walls. It wafts into the garden outside the window; peeps into your child's mind, and even peeks into the future. Our dream is not just to better your homes, but to give you a far richer environment, a beautiful new world. Apartment area: 1290 sft (2bhk), 1490 sft (3bhk)
about_project_details: Golden Gate Properties Ltd is a Bangalore based Public Limited Company that started its operations in 1995. In a short period, it has emerged as one of the leading developers in South India with its excellent projects of outstanding quality, reliability, affordability and efficient after-sales service.The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipment's like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc.

project_description: Setting a new trend in the residential apartments segment, Hilife Greens represents Pragna Group & Hilife Ventures' response to the demands of the modem buyer with a unique blend of luxury and style. We see it as our mission to deliver residences that extend beyond the simple proposals of ""high-quality apartments"". Therefore we offer a complete environment in which to make a life.Pragna Group & Hilife Ventures brand is built entirely around customer satisfaction; to satisfy the ever growing demands of the discerning buyers and taking into account the prevailing market trends, our expertise lies in the creation of beautifully designed homes, typified by classic architecture and contemporary internal and external layouts. Our team includes creative architects and designers, experienced planning and technical specialists, efficient construction experts, effective sales and marketing professionals and dedicated customer care executives. We take pride in bringing fresh revolutionary ideas to the property market, on the same proven principles of our previous projects Hilife Magnifique, Pragna Whistlingwoods, Pragna Uptown and Hilife Titre. Thanks to this approach, we are proud to say that ours is a company that is respected, trusted and relied upon by our customers, associates, vendors and employees alike.

project_description: Located in Varthur, Bangalore - Myhna Maple is an ambitious ongoing residential development by Myhna Properties Pvt. Ltd. Situated just off Sarjapur Road, this premium residence offers 2, 2.5 & 3-bedroom apartments spread across 5.5 acres of verdant surroundings. The project features 532 thoughtfully constructed units distributed among 5 towers. The quoted price of Myhna Maple Varthur, Bangalore tagged from Rs. 40.7 Lacs to Rs. 83.3 Lacs is simply irresistible. These flats are available from 1045 sqft to 1600 sqft of area. Project details Offering magnificence with refreshing & tranquil surroundings, Myhna Maple Varthur have been receiving lots of reviews from the on-lookers and investors. Finely crafted with detailed attention to every aspect of the project, this residential oasis promises a harmonious living with your family. Designed as per the modern needs of home-buyers, these enticing homes are undoubtedly a long-term investment asset which simply can not be resisted. Well-placed away from the chaos of the city, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Myhna Maple Varthur are a perfect place to unwind after a hectic day. A galaxy of indoor & outdoor amenities kid’s paly area, coffee lounge, multi-purpose courts, library, swimming pool, clubhouse, gym, skating ring, exclusive landscapes and much more guarantee a wholesome living with a slice of luxury. Highpoints Strategically located in one of the dream destinations of Bangalore – Myhna Maple Varthur is all set to be a favourite residence among home-buyers. Besides, offering good connectivity to public transport facilities, this locality also offers good proximity to KK English High School, Gear International School, Carmelaram Railway Station, Krupanidhi College, Wipro Corporatd Office, Forum Value Mall and many other important places. A home in this RERA certified project is definitely a wise decision which you will be proud of. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Myhna Maple Varthur, Bangalore.

project_description: OverviewDruva Daffodils is a lavish residential project located in Varthur, Bangalore where every units comes with beautiful interior and exterior work. These apartments are designed in a way that it offers wonderful homes with contemporary design and modernised floor plan. Druva Daffodils is well-equipped with modern amenities and developed with exquisite technology which will make your life extremely delightful. In a magnificent area of 1 acres this project feature 80 units, where the residences can choose to own their apartments at an affordable price. Druva Daffodils has been designed with proper attention which ensure to fulfil the expectations and needs of all its residents. Project DetailsDruva Daffodils price is affordable where you can own your living space or invest in property for higher return. The project is offering luxury, warmth and stylish lifestyle where you get a perfect chance to enhance your living standards. This residential project symbolizes architectural excellence, balance of beauty and comforts. It is truly a perfect place to live your precious moments with your loved ones. Druva Daffodils floor plan in its residential apartments is designed by Druva Infratech which offers well-designed 2BHK and 3BHK apartments with ample ventilation and flow of natural light. If you buy your apartment at Druva Daffodils in Bangalore then you will be able to find yourself in an area that is well-connected with public transportation and other important places in the city. Druva Daffodils offers plethora of amenities and facilities for example, club house, jogging and strolling track, cycling and jogging track, power back-up, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, flower gardens, air conditioned, vaastu complaint, intercom facility, gymnasium, banquet hall, fire fighting system and much more. project_description: Overview:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is a project by Ecolife Developers located primly in Varthur, Bangalore offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It consists of 299 units spanned over 4 towers and is currently under construction. Ecolife Elements Of Nature price rate starts from Rs. 52.2 Lac onward.Project Details:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is a currently under construction project offering skilfully crafted and aesthetically designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is being developed by Ecolife Developers in the strategic location of Varthur, Bangalore. Ecolife Elements Of Nature plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 899 sq. ft. to 1129 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1152 sq. ft. Ecolife Elements Of Nature apartments are designed with certain specifications like ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles flooring in every room, teak wood frame doors, concealed conduits with good quality copper wire, black granite kitchen platform, branded fittings etc.Ecolife Elements Of Nature has various basic amenities and features for its residents like lifts, 24*7 security facilities, jogging & strolling track, banquet hall, vaastu compliant, party hall, library, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, flower gardens etc. and many others.Highpoints:Ecolife Elements Of Nature is second largest gated community present on the Panathur-Varthur Main Road. Ecolife Elements Of Nature locality is just 4 km from Sarjapur Marathahalli ORR, 5.7 km from Whitefield and 6 km from IT Tech Parks like Embassy Tech Square, RMZ Eco Space and Prestige Tech Park. The vicinity has various basic civic utilities for the residents like Varthuru Police Station Bus Stop, Chrysalis High Varthur, Vijaya Bank ATM, The Dr's Hospital, MedPlus, Godrej Nature's Basket, The Fat Chef, Petboro Pet Resort and Kennels, HP Petrol Pump, and Whitefield Total Fitness etc.
about_project_details: Ecolife Developers is a group of dynamic professionals from diverse fields of construction, planning and architecture. What we share in common is not just a strong background of domain expertise, but a deep desire to maintain harmony with nature through our work.The Ecolife team is looking to shape the skyline of Bengaluru with meaningful developments that respect the planet, pay attention to every natural element, and create a life of friendly balance for conscious modern citizens.

project_description: Overview Pavani Divine located in Hoodi, Bangalore is one of the beautiful creation by Pavani Group. Theproject comprises of 2 towers with total 165 residential units, which vary from 1200 sqft - 1418 sqft. Offered with 2 and 3BHK configurations, Pavani Divine flat prices cost within Rs. 54.7 Lacs 78.3 Lacs. Check out the photos of Pavani Divine to get the overall visual details of the flats. About the project Marvellously designed with the brilliant concept of no common walls between two flats, these homes are apparently blessed with good ventilation & natural light round the year. Designed to inspire, both the interiors and the exteriors of these abodes have been fantastically crafted that will surely impress any home buyer. Located in the well-known area of Hoodi, Bangalore – Pavani Divine 2BHK flats measure from 1200 sqft 1418 sqft and are priced within Rs. 54.7 Lac Rs 63.8 Lac. The 3BHK apartments are spread across 1382 sqft 1768 sqft, which cost between Rs. 62.3 Lac - Rs 78.3 Lac. Pavani Divine floor plan has been cleverly planned, so as to provide spacious and comfortable homes to every home-buyer. This well-maintained gated community has been bestowed with some of the premium amenities & facilities like swimming pool, gymnasium, kids play area, security, and intercom facility to name a few. Set around soothing environment, this residential haven invites you to discover a whole new living experience with your family. Highpoints Centrally located in the heart of the city with several well-established IT companies namely Accenture, IBM, Wipro, etc., has made this project a perfect living habitat among the professionals working here. Gopalan International Schools and Sri Satya Sai Super Speciality are in the vicinity. An apartment in Pavani Divine, Hoodi, Bangalore is definitely a smart investment. So, hurry up and book a suitable flat now.

about_project:
https://www.magicbricks.com/propertyDetails/otherProjectsByDeveloper.html?psmid=5109801&devId=54801&devName=Pavani Group&cityName=Bangalore&cityId=3327&postingType=C&aboutDeveloper=
Owning a house is a long nurtured dream for many. To have a home, you have to own one. The goal of any home is to see that all the elements in the home add to a homely feeling and utilization of space.
Mr. P.V RAGHAVA RAO founded PAVANI GROUP IN 1995 to promote Apartment construction in Nellore town, at a point of time when Apartment Culture was still new there. He thus become poineers in Apartment Industry within a short span of time, with all his hard-work, foresight and vision the group of companies has completed 37 projects and 4 projects are in progress and many more in the anvil, spreading all over south India, Viz.Hyderabad, Chennai, Nellore and Bangalore. 
PAVANI GROUP, backed up by twenty one years of experience in architectural planning, design and implementation, has come of age, in that, the company has analyzed the demanding choosy requirements of home owners that encompass above parameters and they are determined to a deliver a home tailor made for each owner, snug fitting his or her aesthetics, psychology and ethical Standards.PAVANI GROUP keep in its mind the futuristic requirements. This calls for world-class specifications and high standards of construction practice. Presiding a phenomenal success in these ventures, we identified the potential in the Real Estate market and decided to capitalize it. This marked the beginning of Raja Housing ltd.&developerLogo=https://img.staticmb.com/mbimages/project/Raja-Housing-1394518801696-Developer-Logo.gif&yearOfExp=26
