project_description: Gopalan Grandeur is expertly developed by Gopalan Enterprises which is a renowned name that excelled into prominence over a decade in the real estate sector. Located in Hoodi, Bangalore the project is naturally lit on all the three sides and offers delightful classified and spacious 2 and 3 BHK homes. These homes are reasonably priced as the price list starts from Rs. 90.0 Lakhs.Project DetailsCertified by RERA, Gopalan Grandeur is build on an area of 5 acre encompassing 558 well-ventilated units spread across 8 towers. The floorings of these 2 and 3 BHK abodes are made of vitrified tiles and ceramic tiles.Gopalan Grandeur offers ready to move properties in Hoodi, Bangalore. With unmatched floor plans the area of 2 BHK Flat ranges from 1360 to 1530 sqft with 2 balconies and 2 bathrooms. Whereas the 3 BHK Flats cover an area of 1805 to 2000 sqft with 3 balconies along with 3 bathrooms. Moreover, the project is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, HDFC, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI.A conveniently planned residential extravaganza, Gopalan Grandeur is designed on the principles of vaastu, with all modern amenities and delightful extras that meet the needs of your unique way of life.HighpointsLocated in the prime locality the project enjoys excellent connectivity all over Bangalore. International Airport, hospitals, railway stations, bus stops, metro stations, Whitefield Railway Station, Phoenix Mall, ITPL, Vydehi Hospital and Cinemas are located at an arm's distance. With all these benefits this project is seeks the attention of all home buyers.Experience a unique lifestyle in perfect countryside homes. Book a flat now as Gopalan Grandeur offers some of the most elegantly designed residential homes in Bangalore to choose from. Every flat at Gopalan Grandeur is more than value for money.

Gopalan Enterprises
Since its inception in 1984, Gopalan Enterprises has established itself as a leader in the property segment of Bangalore. The company has completed tremendous projects involving residential flats/apartments, commercial buildings and ventures across SEZ, entertainment & hospitality sector. Through the cutting edge technology and coordination with the finest service providers in infrastructure, Gopalan Enterprises has positioned itself as the prominent Real Estate entity. They have an active presence in the Knowledge City with a portfolio of esteemed clients. The company aims to build healthy customer relationships through their considerate passion towards innovation. With over 3 decades of admirable experience in the realty sector, Gopalan Enterprises have significantly launched several 2bhk & 3bhk residential flats/apartments with area ranging between 1125 - 2825 sqft at 65 Lac to 1.54 Cr. and many commercial projects across Bangalore. These stylishly-developed projects are a perfect combination of urban lifestyle with world-class amenities.
Backed by a team of professionals possessing in-depth knowledge of realty sector, the company is dedicated to providing premium housing solutions. Some of the major projects executed by Gopalan Enterprises are SRK Shivanand Gardens in Pune, SRK Shree Adishakti in Pune, SRK Shriram Krupa in Pune, SRK Vrunda Vinayak in Pune, SRK Suwarnapushpa in Pune, SRK Kanchanjunga in Pune, SRK Ganesh Krupa in Pune, SRK Abhiman Gram in Pune, SRK Sadashanti in Pune, SRK Swarnarekha in Pune, SRK Uma Mahesh in Pune, SRK Harikripa in Pune, SRK Shivtirtha in Pune and many more.

project_description: OverviewSaketh Hillside by 5 Elements Realty is positioned in Banashankari, Bangalore. This project offers 4 towers with 180 elegant units that are perfectly ready to occupy. Saketh Hillside price list begins from Rs.50.0 Lac - 68.0 Lac that are quite affordable.About the projectSaketh Hillside, Bangalore offers well-ventilated 2 and 3BHK apartments spanning over 1120 sqft to 1595 sqft . Additionally, gorgeous interiors and exteriors are eye catching. Saketh Hillside apartments are quite attractive and are perfectly designed as per vaastu rules.  Provision for aqua - guard point and exhaust fan are provided in kitchen.Saketh Hill Side Bengaluru, Karnataka offers world class recreational amenities like club house, bar/lounge, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts, cycling and jogging track, swimming pool and event space and amphitheatre. Other facilities like reserved parking, service/goods lift, water storage, waste disposal, early learning centre and rain water harvesting are available for the residents comfortable lifestyle. After a hectic day, you can feel relax and experience calmness in this meditation area provided.5 Elements Realty,  Bangalore are reputed builders in real estate market offering developed plots, villas, bungalows and premium apartments. They provide best homes with excellent high end amenities. They are well known for their excellent quality of construction and stunning infrastructure. Just glance over the Saketh Hillside reviews and photos to get a brief view of this project. HighpointsSaketh Hillside enjoys awesome connectivity to various infrastructures like KSRTC Pick up point Katriguppe BMTC Bus Stop, National Hill View Public School, Rakshitas, Maharaja Agrasen Hospital, Narayana Swamy – Akshaya, Axis Bank ATM, MedPlus, Chung Wah Hotel, Sri Eshwari Theatre, Ramanjaneyanagar West End Park and Sankalpa Yoga. However, it is well connected to various modes of public transport like autos and taxis. Book a flat now in this Saketh Hillside and enjoy the best.

To own a home is your ultimate dream. 5 Elements Realty understands, and respects your dream and works with a single minded goal of bringing your dream to life - of owning a home, a home which gives you happiness and peace.This goal is driven by the philosophy of the five elements that make up this universe. We believe that it is the harmony of the five elements within us - earth, fire, air, water and akash that bring Happiness and Peace. Wherever these five elements reside in harmony, there resides happiness and peace. Through this beautiful philosophy is reflected the cherished principles of 5 Elements Realty - Work with Integrity, Create Value, Keep Promises, Build Relationships, and above all Develop Trust.

project_description: OverviewDeveloped by Mantri Developers Limited - Mantri Alpyne is a majestic residential society located in Banashankari, Bangalore. Built on 10 acres of land, this project encompasses 11 towers and total 1140 residential units. The society offers 2, 3 and 4BHK flats & 3 bedroom Penthouses. The carpet area of the flats ranges from 975 to 2335 sqft while the area of penthouse varies from 1690 1860 sqft. These affordable residences are best options for those looking to own a home in Bangalore. About the ProjectThe ready-to-move-in & well-ventilated apartments of Mantri Alpyne Banashankari are worth inspecting if you are looking for a luxury home with all the modern amenities. Thoughtfully designed with detailed attention to every nook, the apartments are perfect to dwell in with your family.The towers are well-planned and placed brilliantly in order to provide pleasant and soothing views of the vibrant greenery from all the apartments. All the flats have balconies which not only offer uninterrupted views of the beautiful surroundings but also allow plenty of fresh air & sunlight to seep in.All the rooms are filled with lots of freshness and the natural beauty around will surely leave you enthralled. Clubhouse, swimming pool, gymnasium, jogging and strolling track, outdoor tennis courts and every modern amenity you desired for are readily available at your doorstep. HighpointsStrategic location is the key feature of this reputed township which has made it a favourable residential place. Besides, good connectivity to public transport facilities, the society is also superbly linked with the reputed Bangalore University and the shimmering Uttarahalli Lake. The locality is blessed with the presence of the famous Anjaneya Temple.Grab this opportunity of owning a luxurious flat in Mantri Alpyne Banashankari, if chic lifestyle is what you are looking for!!!
about_project_details: In the supremely dynamic and competitive sphere of property development, one name has consistently been a trail blazer, setting the trends for others to follow. The innovation-led, future-focused Mantri Developers Pvt. Ltd. Established in 1999 by Mr. Sushil Mantri, the company has been the pioneering force behind the rapidly changing skyline of south India, with developments that span the residential, retail, commercial, education and hospitality sectors In just 14 years, the group, with the spirit of innovation at its core, has carved a niche for itself as an industry benchmark for quality, customer focus, robust engineering, in-house research, uncompromising business ethics and the unswerving commitment to timeless values and total transparency in every aspect of its business. These exceptional attributes have made Mantri Developers one of India most preferred real estate brands in south India.

project_description: Overview Brigade Omega, Banashankari, Bangalore belonging to the prestigious Brigade Group offers a selection of lavishly appointed residential apartments in the configuration of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK within the price range of Rs.77.7lakhs and Rs.1.50crore. There are a total of 520 units spread across 3 towers and are priced within Rs.77.7lakhs and Rs.1.50crore. These apartments are available both as a new sale as well as on resale basis. About the Project Brigade Omega in Banashankari, Bangalore offers 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments in varying sizes. 2BHK units are sized between 1270sq.ft. and 1430sq.ft., 3BHK cover an area between 1650sq.ft. and 1800sq.ft. while 4BHK occupies an area ranging between 2230sq.ft. and 2390sq.ft. Each tower features around 13 storeys and offers beautiful views of the surroundings as it boasts an open area of 74%. Located right across the Thurahalli Forest, this resplendent project offers myriad reasons to enjoy a life blessed with natural beauty and lavish comforts. All the residential apartments are extremely well ventilated and constructed to allow plenty of natural light and air. A host of outstanding features further makes it all the worthwhile to invest in this project such as clubhouse, gym, swimming pool, party area, multipurpose hall, badminton court and basketball court. Highpoints Overlooking a wide expanse of green is a major USP of this project, as one is close to all the essential civic amenities and yet tucked away in the midst of verdant green surroundings. The prime location of Brigade Omega is also an added advantage as the upcoming metro station, Metro Cash & Carry and Delhi Public School are only 4km away. To experience a life of complete bliss and tranquillity, book an apartment now in Brigade Omega in Banashankari.

project_description: Overview Prestige Glenwood is a magnificent residential development spread across 15acres of verdant greenery which is inclusive of total 116 luxurious villas. Developed by the popular real estate giant Prestige Group, this residence is located in Budigere, Bangalore and offers 3 & 4 BHK villas ranging from 2,800 - 3,694 sqft. Prestige Glenwood price list starts from the exclusive price of Rs. 2.02 Cr. Project details The premium 3 & 4 BHK villas of Prestige Glenwood are also available with current resale value and can also be accommodated for immediate rent. The 3 BHK villas measuring 2800 sqft cost Rs.2.02 Cr whereas the 4 BHK villas spread across 3694 sqft are available for Rs. 2.66 Cr. Known for delivering quality homes with unmatched amenities & high-end specifications, the makers of this wonderful creation are considered as one of the top property developers of India. These well-ventilated villas have been crafted with superior quality flooring and have also been provided with CCTV & intercom based security, thus ensuring a safe living. Power backup and round the clock facilities are additional benefits. Environmental safety measures like rainwater harvesting pits, water treatment plant and landscaped gardens with abundant greenery make this RERA certified project an eco-friendly development. Cherished with good reviews, Prestige Glenwood Budigere, Bangalore offers an array of world class amenities such as club house, swimming pool, jogging track, gym, fitness club, badminton court and amphitheater to name a few. Highpoints Strategically placed just 25 minutes away from the NH 48, this residence is a fine dwelling place of Budigere, Bangalore. Narayana E-techno School & College lies within close proximity and so is the reputed Swamy Vivekananda College of Pharmacy. Excellent connectivity to public transports all along the day is an add-on benefit. Book a flat now in Prestige Glenwood Budigere, Bangalore and make a smart investment.

project_description: Brigade 7 Gardens is a prestigious 8.5-acre residential township developed by the acclaimed Brigade Group. Located in Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore – this wonderful township boasts 678 units spread across 7 towers. 2 BHKs & 3 BHKs are the available configurations which vary between 71 sqm to 99 sqm. The flat rates of Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore are tagged from Rs. 57 Lacs onwards. Project details Set in the midst of seven beautiful gardens, these residential apartments are a divine place to live a happy, blissful & healthy life with your loved ones. The vibrant atmosphere filled with positive energies of this residential township will certainly enliven you all along the day. All the well-ventilated residential apartments of Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore are meticulously constructed with spacious floor plans to allow adequate flow of fresh air & sunlight across each room. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore and gift your family the joy of living amidst 7 lovely gardens. This luxurious residential township is armed with a number of world-class amenities like a clubhouse, swimming pool, jogging track, tennis court, gym, badminton court, multi-purpose hall, basketball court and is also self-sustained with a convenience store. A home in Brigade 7 Gardens Banashankari Stage 6, Bangalore is truly a lucrative investment deal. So, hurry up and book a flat now. Highpoints This is a wonderfully designed residential project, surrounded by total 7 beautiful gardens. RERA certified, this project offers luxurious 2 & 3-bedroom flats within affordable bracket. Situated in a prime locality like Banashankari, public transport along with other basic infrastructural facilities are easily available. National Public School, Delhi Public School and Dayananda Sagar International School & College are situated at an arm’s distance. An upcoming metro station within just 4 km radius will further boost the connectivity to surrounding areas.

project_description: Overview:Whitestone Veroso is a project by Whitestone Projects. It is located in Kadugodi, Bengaluru offering luxurious residential apartments - 2 BHK and 3 BHK consisting of 60 units and 1 tower spreading across 1 acre of total project area. The price of these apartment start at a rate of Rs. 48 Lac onwards. The developer has equipped this project with all modern amenities and civic utilities to its residents.Project Details:Whitestone Veroso located in Kadugodi, Bengaluru is a project by Whitestone Projects offering luxury residential developed apartments consisting of 2 and 3 BHKs. The 2 BHK areas range from 1000 sq. ft. to 1120 sq. ft.; and the 3 BHK areas range from 1450 sq.ft. to 1510 sq.ft. The apartments have RCC frame structure, designed with vitrified and anti skid tiles, premium sanitary ware, teak word main doors, etc.The project has some major amenities such as lifts, 24*7 water supply, 24*7 power back up,  fire fighting system, intercom, car parking, gymnasium, club house, children’s play area, etc. The lifestyle amenities include CCTV camera security, property staff, RO system, video door security, sports amenities like badminton court, jogging track, multipurpose court, swimming pool, yoga & meditation area, eco-friendly amenities are landscape garden, paved compound, rain water harvesting, sewage treatment, and other services like cafeteria, library and games area.Highpoints:This project is just minutes away from major highways and metro stations. The project is in quite an emerging and booming locality in terms of real estate market. Investing in this project is sure to bring huge returns. This area has been successful in fetching new buyers for various new projects. It also allows great connectivity to various civic utilities. The project is nearby numerous malls, schools, corporate hubs, hospitals, well reputed institutes, etc among others.
about_project_details: One of the most important financial decisions an individual can make isbuilding a new home. We at Whitestone Projects understand this and arecommitted to building your quality home as well as providing superior customersatisfaction. We also know that building a home requires incredible attentionto detail and entails numerous important decisions. As a service-orientedhomebuilder, we want our homeowners to enjoy this exciting time. These are justa few words we use to describe our company, our people and our commitment tobuild homes that move you. We promise to be right there with you every step ofthe way in creating a place you will absolutely love and will be proud to call home.Whether it choosing the floor plan, features, or options, we will help keep thestress out. That is why we have assembled an experienced and knowledgeable teamto help guide you in making the selections that will make your house truly yourhome. We are not like other builders. Sure you hear this all the time, but ourprinciples are built on a foundation of longtime friendships, localinvolvement, and giving back. Whitestone Projects is a Company with heart. Wedo not just build homes; we believe in investing in local and globalcommunities. Thank you for choosing Whitestone Projects.

project_description: Designed to offer affordable housing, the Prestige Tranquility is crafted to perfection to suit your needs, tastes and preferences. Located in the quietest location of Budigere, Bangalore, the society offers you all the comfort, peace and freedom that you need to live your life on your own terms. The project is built by the Prestige Group that was established in 1986 and is a popular name in the real estate world. The group has spread its branches in all directions of Bangalore and has developed around 350 residential and commercial projects. Spread across the huge area of 38 acres, the project features latest architecture, smartly constructed floor plan, 17 towers and 2368 apartments that are available in various sizes.Project detailThe Prestige Tranquility is equipped with amenities like club house, coffee lounge and restaurants, jogging and strolling track, park, indoor games room, aerobics room, indoor squash and badminton courts, aerobics room, meditation area, swimming pool, flower gardens, gym, rain water harvesting, conference room, outdoor tennis courts and a lot to complement your modern lifestyle. The flats in the Prestige Tranquility feature anti0 skid ceramic ties in balcony and toilet, vitrified tiles in kitchen, living/dining room, master bedroom and other bedroom, main door with moulded wooden flush shutter and frame, internal door with wooden frame and flush shutters, concealed wiring in PVC conduits with modular switches, granite counter with stainless steel sink with single bowl and drain board in kitchen, UPVC/aluminum framed windows, cement paint on external walls, distemper paint on internal walls and ceramic tiles dado in kitchen and toilets. Located in Bangalore, the Prestige Tranquility offers easy connectivity to MG Road, Garuda Mall, Hosmat Hospital, Bangalore Cantonment, schools, hospitals, colleges and all the other prime areas.High pointsThe society features helipad in sky tower and offers free club membership.

Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure & Hospitality sectors.

Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.
Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead!

project_description: Located in Vijayanagar, Bangalore - Salarpuria Sattva Altana is an ambitious residential project by Salarpuria Sattva. Covering a huge land parcel of 12 acres, this splendid project features total 1384 residential units spread across 22 eye-catching high-rise towers. 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments are the available configurations to choose from. These units are offered in multiple dimensions ranging from 492 sqft to 1803 sqft. The flat rates of Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 26.6 Lacs to Rs. 84.6 Lacs. Project details Conveniently located off Magadi Road, Salarpuria Sattva Altana is a brand new residential development with possession of flats by June 2019. Designed brilliant with impressive floor plans, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar are blessed with abundant fresh breeze and natural light.  To elevate your lifestyle and offer a high-class living experience, the project offers an array of world-class amenities & facilities like club house, play area, badminton court, swimming pool, 24hour security, broadband internet, Wi-Fi, intercom facility, 100% power backup, indoor games and much more. The society is also self-sufficient with a library, bank/ATM, cafeteria and a beautiful temple. Acknowledged with lots of positive reviews, Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar certified by RERA is definitely one of the best option to look for your dream home. Highpoints The builders have smartly chosen a fantastic location for this project with good connectivity to public transports. The famous National Law School & Ambedkar Engineering College are situated within just 10 minutes of drive. It merely takes 10-15 minutes to reach Vijaynagar/Magadi and Mysore Road Metro Stations. The world-class Columbia Asia Hospital and the popular Orion Mall are also easily accessible within just 15 minutes. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Salarpuria Sattva Altana Vijayanagar and enjoy a smooth & balanced life with your family members.
about_project_details: Built on trust, innovation and knowledge-leadership, the Salarpuria Sattva Group is one of Indias leading Property Development, Management and Consulting organizations.Founded in 1986 with the primary focus of developing high quality constructions, the Group has attained leadership positioning in the field and is one of the most preferred brands in the country today. Having pioneered the early development landscape in Bangalore and literally shaping the citys skyline since the mid-80s, the Group has a diverse portfolio of world-class IT Parks, commercial, residential, hospitality and retail properties.A course of natural evolution and diversification led to the formation of the Salarpuria Sattva Group, which blends the traditional strengths of the Salarpuria Sattva Groups development business and the forward-looking diversification into many verticals such as Aerospace, Hi-tech, Education, Facilities Management and Warehousing.Fuelled by an intense eagerness to innovate, deliver value and build trust, the expanding business footprint has spread across many major Indian cities. The unwavering focus has always been to attain complete client satisfaction resulting in successful deliveries that are now recognized as the hallmark of the Group.

project_description: Overview: NVR Sun Pearl is a residential project being developed by NVR Developers in the happening locality of Kadugodi, Bangalore offering aesthetically crafted and lavishly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project will consist of 144 units spread over 1 meticulously designed tower. NVR Sun Pearl price rate starts at Rs. 30 Lac onward.  Project Details:    NVR Sun Pearl, a project in the locality of Kadugodi, Bangalore is offering aesthetic and spacious 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is being constructed by NVR Developers, with their 8 years of real estate experience. NVR Sun Pearl floor plans for its 2 BHK flat range from 910 sq. ft. to 1160 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1190 sq. ft. to 1375 sq. ft.NVR Sun Pearl Bangalore features modern day amenities for its residents like a club house, jogging & strolling track, power back up, swimming pool, 24 hour security facility, reserved parking, intercom facility, banquet hall, gymnasium, indoor games room, children’s play area, rain water harvesting, and indoor squash & badminton courts etc. NVR Sun Pearl apartments are designed with good quality RCC frame structure for a strong and resistant foundation; interior specifications like powder coated aluminium frame windows, anti skid ceramic tiles in toilet and vitrified tiles flooring in every other room, granite kitchen platform with SS sink, good quality CP fittings and sanitary ware, teak wood frame main door and Sal wood frame internal door, concealed copper wiring with good quality switches, AC points, washing machine point, TV and telephone points, and quality fixtures etc. Highpoints:NVR Sun Pearl Bangalore locality has several basic utilities just a stone’s throw away including Sadaramangala Bus Stop, The Deen's Academy, Narayana Multispeciality Hospital, Canara Bank, More Super Market, Chaithanya Health Park, etc. and many more.
about_project_details: NVR Developers building and developing luxury and super luxury apartments in wide variety of price ranges, affordable to lower and middle income groups as well as the elite people group. All the projects built by us have the benchmark Quality, great aesthetic appeal with strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards.All our projects are certified by leading structural engineers We use the world-class building materials and partners with the best minds in the business. The interiors too with the excellent quality like elegant vitrified flooring, ceramic tiles, and powder-coated aluminum sliding windows are all standard in our projects.

project_description: Sonesta Silver Oak is an imposing edifice located in Thubarahalli, Bangalore. These 2 BHK multistory apartments offer a covered area of 992 Sq ft. In Sonesta Silver Oak by Nirman Sonesta developers a simple address has been taken and converted into a sought after landmark. When life gets stressful you need a haven to escape to from the strain and tension and Sonesta Silver Oak offer just such a haven. The unique design of the residential township of Sonesta Silver Oak is a treat for the heart and mind. At the same time, there is the excellent quality of construction that Nirman Sonesta is well known for. The transparent documentation ensures that you do not get the short end of the stick in the deal. This residential township is located close to many shopping centres. Hospitals and schools are also close by. Moreover, the Railway station is just 4 km away and airport is at a reasonable distance of 35 km. All these civic amenities at a close distance ensure quality of living. On the other hand the amenities within the residential township add to your pleasure. For instance the swimming pool, gym, cycling and jogging track and indoor squash and badminton courts take care of your needs of physical exercise. Flower gardens provide a place where you can rejuvenate your mind. Kids play area is a place where the children can burn off their excess energy.

Shriram Properties 
Shriram Properties are a popular real estate developers & builders exuding fine dedication in building affordable housing & commercial properties across various localities in Chennai, Bangalore, Kolkata and Vizag. The company was established in 1990 and with an experience of over a decade, Shriram Properties aspires to construct projects to satiate needs of the modern lifestyle with world-class amenities. Till now, they have successfully executed 4.8 million sq. ft. of residential & 1.03 million sq. ft. of commercial projects. Shriram Properties in Bangalore is a renowned for their excellent commitment towards the customers, Shriram Properties has elevated its success to new heights. 
With an exceptional proven track record of completing major projects in Tier 1 & Tier 2 cities, Shriram Properties aims to establish their pan-India presence with a portfolio of construction projects comprising of modern integrated townships, residential apartments and commercial, hospitality, SEZs & retail. This construction company offers 1, 2 and 3 BHK apartment ranging between 44 Lakhs and 4.6 Crore. Today, they have partnered with Starwood Capital Group & Sun Apollo and Walton Street Capital for investments. 
Some of the projects by Shriram Properties that are worth mentioning are Shriram Greenfield in Bangalore, Shriram Smrithi in Bangalore, Shriram Sameeksha in Bangalore, Shriram Suhaana in Bangalore, Shriram Chirping Woods in Bangalore, Shriram Summit in Bangalore, Shriram Panorama Hills in Bangalore and much more.

project_description: Oceanus Group presents Oceanus Greendale, a housing destination nestled in the lap of the nature, covered with lush green landscape. The project is strategically located in Banasvadi, Bangalore. The locality is situated at the North East of the Bangalore city and is only 6 km from the city centre. Primarily established as a residential locality, presently Banasvadi has a great demand for residential and commercial plots due to the expansion of the city. Proximity with the international airport and the outer ring road which connects Banasvadito the IT hubs of the region has fuelled the rapid growth in the region. A number of world class hospitals such as, Cenesis, Satya Sai Baba Hospital, Dewans Hospital, and Narayan Maternity Hospital are located close to the project site. The famous Anjaneya Swami Temple is also located in the vicinity. Reputed schools, bank branches, ATMs, shopping complexes all are within short distances from Oceanus Greendale in Banasvadi. The residential township of Oceanus Greendale is now under construction and is planned to encapsulate spacious apartments of different sizes and plans. The residential project will also include all the modern facilities and amenities, like swimming pool, parking, gymnasium, indoor games room, outdoor game courts, power backup, lifts, security and many more in order to provide a privileged life to the residents.
about_project_details: A Group where thought is deliberately integrated into every facet of business. Where every square foot of space exudes maximum utility. Where stereotypes are discarded. Where traditional values seamlessly merge with youthful enthusiasm. Where managerial and administrative prowess go hand in hand with creative skills and sound technical know how, to deliver to every customer, spaces designed on pure Intelligence.Renowned for its choice of locations when planning a project, and the future it promises for the investors. Because, with every home that Oceanus builds, comes that guarantee of not just the best of comforts and conveniences, but of immense value-appreciation. Because Oceanus firmly believes, that a home of ones own is among the most Precious things in life.Steadfast in adherence to statutory requirements. Revered principles of the ancient wisdom of Vaastu followed in letter and spirit. Equally conscious is the Group, to its responsibility towards our environment, needless to mention the numerous water, waste-management, greening and other eco-friendly initiatives. Because, beyond just offering living spaces, is our bigger aim-that of making life much sweeter.A group with a keen eye for detail. Where every aspect of a project, from foundation to finishes, is diligently monitored by trained professionals. Tiles, paints and fittings are handpicked after meticulous scrutiny for performance and durability. Architecture, landscaping and other services are rendered by the best in their respective fields. Because, Oceanus believes in offering living spaces of finest quality. Such is its eye for aesthetics.

project_description: Overview:A new invention by Golden Gate, Chandapura – Bangalore, Commune is still under construction and will be delivered soon. The project offers beautifully crafted 1, 2 and 3 BHK flats in the fastest developing IT city of the country. The project has a total 384 units which are allocated into 5 huge towers. Project Details:The homes in Commune, Bangalore are reasonably priced between 40.0 Lac and 52.0 Lac. The project is spread over a huge area of 5 acres 14 guntas and the surroundings of these apartments is the beautiful greenery that will be a delight for your eyes. The artistically developed Commune floor plans confirm that the homes are bright, well ventilated and are built with the best possible use of space and resources. The 1 BHK flats have an area of 765 sqft, the 2 BHK flats are constructed on an area between 1030 sqft and 1040 sqft and the 3 BHK flats span on an area range of 1560 sqft to 1590 sqft.The reviews of Commune flats enlighten us with the up to date amenities that the project offers.The essential facilities provided by the project are piped gas connection, maintenance staff, waste disposal, internet / Wi-Fi connectivity, fire fighting equipment, water storage, round the clock security, swimming pool, reserved parking for residents, etc.The other amenities include flower gardens, multipurpose courts, conference room, gymnasium, visitor parking service, intercom facility, etc. Highpoints:These vaastu compliant homes have a fully equipped club house and multipurpose courts and tracks to keep you healthy and help you relax after a long day at work. The centrally located society will help you find all the basic necessities such as schools, hospitals and market in the vicinity and will help you lead a cheerful and lovely life with your loved ones.To clear any doubts that you may have, you can check the updated Commune photos and brochures and make a move to book your home right now!!
about_project_details: Golden Gate Properties Ltd is a Bangalore based Public Limited Company that started its operations in 1995. In a short period, it has emerged as one of the leading developers in South India with its excellent projects of outstanding quality, reliability, affordability and efficient after-sales service.The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipments like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc .

The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipments like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc .

Karnataka's largest developers, with more than 18 live projects. Our horizons have now reached cities like Hubli, Hassan, Shimoga, Mysore, Bijapur and Ooty which are soon to be "Smart Cities" and revered holiday destinations.
With this growth our focus has remained on ensuring that every customer is assured a healthy return on their investment whether they’re a senior citizen, first time home buyer or an investor.

As the industry is at cross roads, we would like to be pioneers during this transformation by implementing benchmarked process, through ISO 9001:2008 accreditation across all facets impacting construction of a home, which we believe will continue to boost and sustain our growth milestones.

Management Team
Mr. Keshava K
When the middle and lower middle class of India was dependent on Central government for their employment, Mr. Keshava decided to tread the unbeaten path and become an entrepreneur…

Equipped with a MBA, now a seasoned and successful professional running an organization which is over 500 members strong, his mission continues to be to strengthen the fortitude of the middle class in India.

In today’s India where the rest seem focused on growing their wealth by constructing skyscrapers which are a far outreach of the general populous, he has been strong on his resolve and resolution to continue help realize the dream of the middle classed Indian by catering to their housing needs and generating a healthy return on their initial investment.

A visionary, a through professional, a philanthropist, Mr. Keshava has been bestowed with many awards which defines his contribution to the growth of society and social infrastructure of Karnataka.

project_description: Overview:A new residential plot project has come up in the fastest developing city of Bangalore. The project named as Surya City Phase II, Bangalore offers you residential plots huge enough to build spacious homes or you can invest in the property for future returns. The project has been developed by the famed Kritan Urbane Living, Chandapura – Bangalore. Project Details:The plots in Surya City Phase II are affordably priced from 14.0 Lac onwards and are in a ready to move phase i.e. they are available for sale. Surya City Phase 2 layout plan is designed accurately to give you homes that hold your private moments and will also give you a taste of social life. The residential plots are spread over an area of 1200 sqft and are huge enough for a family looking to build their dream home. The Surya City Phase 2 location on the map can be found by the clicking the link - https://goo.gl/maps/cBeM7YVUSys.The project offers you a range of amenities that will make sure you have a comfortable and stress free life. The friendly neighbourhood and beautiful surroundings definitely make this venture worth investing in. You can be assured that the project will give you guaranteed future returns. The reviews of Surya City Phase II praise the location and the well planned layout of the project. Highpoints:The central location of the project is the main attraction of this project. Having all basic conveniences like schools – Lorven Public School Chandapura, hospitals – Narayana Institute of Cardiac Sciences, bank – Vijaya Bank ATM, etc. within a distance of 3km from the project is a blessing for those investing in this project.The updated Surya City Phase II photos will give you more details of this project. This is an opportunity and should not be missed. Hurry up!!! You and your family deserve an elegant lifestyle in Surya City Phase II, Chandapura – Bangalore.

project_description: Overview: Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria is a project offering state of the art exquisitely crafted 3 BHK, 4 BHK apartments and 4 BHK penthouses. It is ready for possession located in Malleshwaram, Bangalore by Salarpuria Sattva Group. The project consists of 197 units spanned over 2 high rise towers. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria price rate starts at Rs. 2.65 Cr onward.  Project Details:    Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria by Salarpuria Sattva Group is offering luxurious 3 BHK, 4 BHK apartments and 4 BHK penthouses based in the fast growing locality of Malleshwaram, Bangalore.  Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria plot areas for its 3 BHK flat range from 2215 sq. ft. to 2475 sq. ft.; 4 BHK flat areas range approx. 3740 sq. ft. and 4 BHK penthouse areas range from 3740 sq. ft. to 4465 sq. ft. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria features numerous modern day amenities for its residents such as a club house, jogging track, outdoor tennis courts, power backup, swimming pool, 24 hour security facility, ample car parking, maintenance staff, gymnasium, multipurpose hall, indoor games room, DTH television facility, rain water harvesting, etc. to name a few.Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria Bangalore apartments are precisely designed with vitrified tiles flooring, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, electrical wiring with elegant modular switches, premium German made granite counter, white sanitary ware, etc. Highpoints:Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria is an extravagant residential project offering exquisite and premium luxury apartments for making the resident’s lifestyle prestigious yet comfortable.  The infrastructure is well laid out and opens on three sides for complete privacy. Salarpuria Sattva Luxuria Bangalore locality is well connected and has various basic utilities such as Kendriya Vidyalaya Hebbal, Narayana Nethralaya, Sandal Soap Factory Metro Station, Syndicate Bank ATM, ISKCON Bangalore, Sheraton Grand Bangalore Hotel, and Bharat Petroleum etc. all lay in the vicinity just a stone’s throw away.

project_description: Utopia is located in prime residential area, adjacent to KHB Phase II well known as Surya City phase II Chandapura Anekal Road. It is less than 20 minutes drive from Silk Board through elevated expressway. The entire community has been planned to be friendly, secure and complete with all modern amenities. The project in the midst of Surya City makes a great valuable investment in land. A secure haven of harmonious living with warmth that reflects a welcoming and aesthetically designed entrance arch invites residents as well as guests into the warmth of Utopia. The pleasantness continues thought the length and breadth of the setting with colourful plants and trees that add visual interest and aesthetics.Along with our rich and varied industry experience and a well qualified team of professionals will help you find suitable residential properties as per their own liking. We offer residential house plots procurement services to our valued clients. We ensure you residential plot and luxurious homes that are affordable and can be bought within the specific budget specified by the client in a predefined time frame. We also provide appropriate assistance with respect to the legal formalities and proceedings to ensure hassle-free dealing. By keeping a track with the latest market development, we are involved in providing spacious residential plots and luxurious homes.

project_description: The Icon is a project by G Corp located in Thanisandra, Bangalore, offering currently under construction 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. It consists of 1140 units spanned over 12 towers on a total project area of 21 acres. The Icon price rate starts from Rs. 1.05 Cr onward.Project Details:The Icon located in Thanisandra, Bangalore, is a project by G Corp offering spacious, skilfully developed and currently under construction 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments. The Icon plot areas for its 3 BHK flat ranges from 1795 sq. ft. to 2050 sq. ft. and 4 BHK flat areas range from 2695 sq. ft. to 3097 sq. ft.The Icon apartments are designed with RCC frame structure and high quality interiors like vitrified tiles, ceramic tiles flooring in every room, laminated wooden flooring in master bedroom, teak wood frame doors, concealed copper wiring with modular switches, granite kitchen counter top, branded sanitary CP fittings etc.The Icon is a RERA Certified Project. The Icon provides numerous essential amenities for its residents like power backup, swimming pool, lift, security, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, gym, indoor games room, kids play area, DTH television facility, flower gardens, library, rain water harvesting, water storage, multipurpose courts, conference room, activity deck, outdoor tennis court, event space, fire fighting equipment etc.Highpoints:The Icon special amenities includes indoor squash & badminton courts, canopy walk, barbeque pit, dance studio, jogging & strolling track and club house. The project has a well thought infrastructure equipped with all modern amenities and facilities. It is just 1.6 km from Kensri School, 2.2 km from ICICI ATM and 3.1 km from Sri Sai Nursing Home.

project_description: Devanahalli came to prominence after the establishment of the Kempegowda International airport in 2008. Our integrated community is located in close proximity to the International Airport and brings together the elements of deluxe living. A well-appointed club house, lush herbal park and vast expanses of greenery will create a lifetime of joyful memories for you. We have created an ecosystem that is a blend of traditional as well as contemporary designs thereby catering to the tastes of the modern generation. Our luxury apartments in Devanahalli, Bangalore are designed to lend the right ambience.
about_project_details: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. Our aim is to integrate every family into a bigger, more inclusive community. We are cognizant of the fact that we have maneuvered successfully through a turbulent time in this industrys history. As we move forward, we will carry our legacy forward proudly and will persevere to take it to new heights through a committed adherence to the values that we stand for. These values that manifest in our passion for perfection and endless innovation and advancements.

project_description: OverviewHiranandani Upscale Villas in Devanahalli Bangalore is an unsurpassed ready-to-move-in project developed by the renowned House of Hiranandani. This project offers stunning 350 villas of 3 as well as 4 BHK configurations. The spacious accommodations of Hiranandani in Devanahalli prices range between 1.85 Cr - 3.50 Cr and if required Hiranandani offers these villas in Devanahalli on rent also.Project detailsEnjoying highest possible sunlight and abundant ventilation, every domicile of this project is excellently planned by the architects to maintain utmost privacy. Hiranandani Upscale Villas floor plans are thoughtfully done and the area occupied by these 3 BHK and 4 BHK villas ranges between 2850 sqft - 2820 sqft.Here are just a few amenities to name among various amenities offered in this project.- Basic amenities such as swimming pool, power backup, electricity supply and ample parking space are all available.- Jogging and strolling track, aerobics room and meditation area are other amenities, which increases the demand of this project.Hiranandani Upscale Villas address is hardly few kilometers away from Akash International School, Green Park, Sri Munichoodappa Avenue, Akash Hospital, Karnataka Bank, Devanahalli Metro Station and The School of Ancient Wisdom. Also, various public transportation facilities are easily accessible in the vicinity, which has attracted many home buyers to invest in this project.HighpointsHiranandani Upscale is a marvelous gated community offering direct connectivity to the Bangalore - Hyderabad Highway and it just takes 10 minutes drive to reach the New International Airport. An outstanding entry with wide driveway along with lush beautiful greenery is the major plus point of this project.Hiranandani Devanahalli reviews are all positive and you can also browse the photos to obtain a clear idea of this project. Book a beautiful villa now and gift an amazing home to your family.
about_project_details: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. Our aim is to integrate every family into a bigger, more inclusive community. We are cognizant of the fact that we have maneuvered successfully through a turbulent time in this industrys history. As we move forward, we will carry our legacy forward proudly and will persevere to take it to new heights through a committed adherence to the values that we stand for. These values that manifest in our passion for perfection and endless innovation and advancements.

project_description: Sobha City is a project by Sobha Ltd strategically located in Thanisandra Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 36 Acre encompassing 508 units across 3 towers. The floorings are made of Superior Quality Vitrified Tiles, Laminated Wood Flooring and Superior Quality Ceramic Tile Flooring.  Sobha City comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat and Villa.  2BHK Flat has range of area from 1340 Sq-ft to 1703 Sq-ft having 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Villa has range of area from 3735 Sq-ft to 4146 Sq-ft having 1 and 4 balcony and 4 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1478 Sq-ft to 2833 Sq-ft having 2, 3 and 4 balcony and 2, 3 and 4 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 3216 Sq-ft to 3764 Sq-ft having 2 and 3 balcony and 3 and 4 bathroom.  Launched in December 2012, Sobha City offers Ongoing properties. The project is approved by Bangalore Development Authority and Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike. It is approved by various banks like Allahabad Bank, Axis Bank, Corporation Bank, Deutsche Bank, DHFL, HDFC, HSBC, ICICI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank, SBI and Vijaya Bank.
about_project_details: With three decades of experience in creating resplendent interiors of palaces and masterpieces in the Middle-East, Mr. P.N.C. Menon founded Sobha Limited (formerly Sobha Developers Ltd) in 1995 with a clear vision to transform the way people perceive quality. Today, Sobha, a Rs. 25 billion company, is one of the largest and only backward integrated real estate players in the country.Headquartered in Bangalore, Sobha is primarily focused on residential and contractual projects. The Companys residential projects include presidential apartments, villas, row houses, luxury and super luxury apartments, plotted development and aspirational homes replete with world-class amenities. In all its residential projects, the company lays a strong emphasis on environmental management, water harvesting and high safety standards. .The backward integration model is one of the key competitive strengths of Sobha. This literally means that the Company has all the competencies and in-house resources to deliver a project from conceptualisation to completion. Backward integration includes an interiors division, a metal works and glazing factory, and a concrete products factory. Sobha has also diversified into retail business with spring mattresses under the brand name Sobha Restoplus. More than 27 variants of mattresses are produced by the mattress division using cutting-edge machinery of international quality.

project_description: Located in Devanahalli, Bangalore – Brigade Atmosphere by Brigade Group is the best place to book a beautiful accommodation for your family. Spread across 18 acres of blooming greenery, this upcoming project is impressive with total 109 well-designed 4BHK villas ranging from 280 - 317 sqm. The price of luxurious villas of Brigade Atmosphere cost starting from Rs.1.9 Cr onwards. Project details Scheduled for possession by February 2020, Brigade Atmosphere loaded with all the world-class amenities & facilities is set to offer a comfortable and lavish lifestyle to its residents. Coupled with the positive aura of the refreshing greenery, this residence is truly worth investing. Brilliantly designed with spacious floor plans, these abodes promise a pleasant living with unmatched privacy. Studded with branded fittings & fixtures and adorned with premium flooring, these plush villas exude true essence of style & elegance. Blessed with enough fresh air, the well-ventilated villas of Brigade Atmosphere are also favored with plenty of natural light. King-size bedrooms, spacious living rooms, charming balconies and elite kitchens are some of the salient features of these quality homes. The abundance collection of top-notch amenities which include a well-equipped gym, swimming pool, Jacuzzi, tennis court, health club, children’s play area, multi-purpose hall and many more other facilities make this RERA certified residential project an icon for an opulent lifestyle. Highpoints Situated close to an upcoming SEZs, Devanahalli is one of the bustling locality of Bangalore and is definitely a hottest investment destination. Bangalore international airport, Yelahanka railway station and Manyata Tech Park can be reached within just 45minutes of hassle-free drive. Easy connectivity to public transports and close proximity to schools such as Delhi Public, Sterling, Oxford English, etc., make this area a fine dwelling place. Come and book a villa now in Brigade Atmosphere Devanahalli, Bangalore and enjoy a high-end living.
about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

project_description: Aptly named is this beautiful walled community of 40 acres, that is designed around time-tested Vaastu concepts. About a 100 mtrs from NH7 and only 34 kms from MG Road and Vidhana Soudha (a travel time of only forty minutes) is AeroPride. For the devout, the layout is adjacent to the Jain Temple.Each plot allocated is accessible by a planned network of tar roads, supported by storm water drains. Excellent street lighting, parks and landscaped gardens make ‘Aero Pride’ a matter of ownership delight – as it’s meant to do. This project has also been approved by BIAAPA.Residential plots on offer vary in size and Aishwarya Homes has a selection of excellent choices in home and villa design, should you desire.The ubiquitous club house, gymnasium and swimming pool are of course ‘the simple necessities of life’ at this luxurious choice of layout.

about_project_details: Since our inception into Indias urbane terrains, we have upturned the way living spaces are designed. And with that, we have transformed the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. Pillared by a unique approach to designing and planning, we invest heavily in research and development ensuring that each of our developments surpass industry benchmarks and redefine value engineering and design. Our name, since the beginning, has been associated with excellence and we are creating sustainable value for our customers, stakeholders, business associates, employees and society at every step of our development. Through environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, our focus has been on transforming suburban sprawls of land into well-planned urban communities that nourish an outstanding sense of living. And our developments stand as living proof. Apart from residences, we have established numerous schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through affiliates, trusts, clubhouses and community spaces, all of which have earned unmatched international repute. Symbolic to our construction, our developments encompass the ether of the residents lives entirely, by introducing retail outlets, hospitality centers, healthcare and educational institutions etc. within the realms of House of Hiranandani community. Our aim is to integrate every family into a bigger, more inclusive community. We are cognizant of the fact that we have maneuvered successfully through a turbulent time in this industrys history. As we move forward, we will carry our legacy forward proudly and will persevere to take it to new heights through a committed adherence to the values that we stand for. These values that manifest in our passion for perfection and endless innovation and advancements.

project_description: OverviewApproved by Bangalore International Airport Area Planning Authority (BIAAPA), the Gromatic Residency in Devanahalli, Bangalore is a residential project that offers residential plots. Being a gated community villa plotted project, the Gromatic Residency is surrounded by scenic view that helps to rejuvenate your mind, body and soul. Spacious and well- ventilated, these residential plots convert your dream of owning a house into a beautiful reality.  Available for sale at prices starting from Rs. 26.3 lac, these residential plots are 28 in total. Designed to offer affordable housing in Devanahalli, Bangalore, the ready to move- in society offers plots in different sizes.Project detailEnhancing your modern lifestyle, the Gromatic Residency always keeps your spirits high by welcoming ample sunlight and air. Surrounded with lush green gardens, the Gromatic Residency not only keeps you healthy but also offers an open and green place to sit, walk, chat and relax. If you have any doubts, you can visit Magicbricks and can explore Gromatic Residency price, Gromatic Residency photos, residential plot price in Gromatic Residency and all the other important information.The project is constructed by the Gromatic Constructions Pvt Ltd that was established in Bangalore in 2015 and values, transparency, ethical and timely are 4 pillars that keep the company strong and going. The Gromatic Residency is a safe and secure community that is equipped with all the facilities and amenities that complement your modern lifestyle.-          Well planned internal tar roads let you connect within the society.-          Basic facilities like underground drainage system, concrete storm water drain, street lighting, power and underground water connection etc. are available.-          Park and children’s play area let your kids enjoy with the same age group.Situated in one of the best locations of Bangalore, the Gromatic Residency offers easy connectivity to public transport, Brigade Groups Orchards Sports Stadium, Airlines Aquarium, Nandi hills, Green Park, Gowri Shankar and Sangameshwara Theatre, Bettakote Lake Airport View Point, K S Aquarium, GVK Botanical Airport Garden, Kempegowda International Airport, Junction of NH-7, Budihala, Baichapura, Vijayapura, Beguru, Hoskote, Canadian International School, Stone Hill International School, Vidyashilp Acadmey, Vidyaniketan, Akash International School, Gnana Deepa Academy Residential School, Government First Grade college and ITI College Gokare, Aster International Hospital, Art of Living Yoga and Meditation Center, Chinmayee Public School, Govt Higher Primary School Kodagurki, Football stadium etc.
about_project_details: Gromatic Constructions Pvt Ltd was Incorporated in 2015 by a group of successful educationists based out of Bangalore. The company is managed by a dynamic young Managing Director Mr.Shiva Pramod with deep rooted values, culture and transparency. Gromatic Constructions Private Limited, is an integrated, full service land holding development and completed BMRDA, BMICPA, BIAAPA that offers the best real estates in Bengaluru.Our company intention to develop the residential real estate property at the best place in city. Our business strongly emphasize on consistent growth.

about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

project_description: OverviewYour search for the unsurpassed will now come to an end. Brigade Orchards located in Devanahalli, Bangalore offers spacious and well ventilated 2BHK as well as 3BHK flats at an affordable price. Attentively developed by Brigade Group, upcoming Brigade Orchards is situated in close proximity to Bangalore International Airport and it consists of total 905 units spread across 20 towers. The price list of the well-designed flats in this project ranges between Rs. 52.0 Lac 83.0 Lac.About the projectIt is a well-constructed project in the city that is surrounded by lush greenery where you can enjoy the beauty of nature. The area of 2BHK flats ranges from 1080 sqft to 1390 sqft and the area of 3BHK flats vary between 1290 sqft, 1780 sqft.The flats of Brigade Orchards are constructed beautifully that gives you royal feeling. These residential apartments in Devanahalli, Bangalore are wonderfully crafted keeping in mind all your needs. With greatest possible cross ventilation and natural sunlight entering the apartments, this project makes you feel blissful right from the moment you enter.The top class amenities offered here include coffee lounge and restaurants, swimming pool, kids club, kids play area, guest accommodation, visitor parking, gymnasium, indoor games room and so on.HighpointsAkash International School and Akash Medical Hospital are easily accessible within a short distance from the location of this project. Also, it is well connected to all the social infrastructures such as schools, hospitals, shopping destinations and a lot more.You can also refer the reviews and photos for better understanding of this project. At the time of booking, you have to pay only 10 percent amount and the rest amount can be paid after possession hence book a flat now in Brigade Orchards to opt this financial advantage.

about_project_details: Goyal and Co is a part of the larger conglomerate Hariyana Group which is into diversified businesses like Shipping, Industrial Gases, Real Estate and Steel Trading. The Real Estate wing of Hariyana Group operates under the brand name Goyal and Co with Orchid being the first name of many of their projects. Goyal and Co has been creating landmark projects for more than 4 decades making it one of the oldest builders in India. Goyal and Co has footprint in Ahemadabad, Mumbai, Bangalore and slowly spreading to other locations in India. Goyal and co has been delivering quality projects in Bangalore since last few years. Primarily having a strong foot in North Bangalore which is the future of Bangalore. To name a few Orchid Woods Hennur Road, Orchid Footprint - Thanisandra, Orchid Nirvana - IVC Road and Allonaville - Off Hennur Road.

about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

project_description: Overview Offering premium living spaces sprawling across 18 acres, Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix Devanahalli, Bangalore is a residential masterpiece by Salarpuria Sattva Group. The project comprises of total 7 towers and 1620 units, which are basically 1, 2 and 3-bedroom flats spread across 658 – 1498 sqft. Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix flat prices range from Rs. 26.3 Lacs - 79.1 Lacs. Project details Salarpuria Sattva Group is trusted and well-known realty firm who have accomplished various famous commercial and residential projects. Though under-construction, Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix reviews are highly positive and the project is scheduled for completion by March 2022. All these 1620 residential apartments are a great investment deal promising high resale values. The one-bedroom flats measuring 658 sqft cost Rs. 34. 8 Lacs whereas the 2 BHK flats spread across 1009 sqft are priced at Rs. 55.0 Lacs. The 3 BHK flats spanning across 1282 - 1498 sqft cost within Rs. 68.5 Lacs - 79.1 Lacs. Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix apartments are backed by some enormous modern amenities to gift the residents with a premium lifestyle.-Clubhouse, kids play area, outdoor tennis court, swimming pool, modern gymnasium and aerobics room are some striking features.-CCTV cameras, intercom facility and round the clock manned security will let you live in a complete stress and worry-free environment. Highpoints Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix location, two luxurious clubhouses and two swimming pools are the delightful aspects of this project. 14-acres of the total project area is open comprising of verdant greenery, thus creating a refreshing atmosphere. There are several upcoming projects within this locality such as a 1000 crore financial city, a science park and an aerospace, which will further add value this residence. So, hurry up and book a flat today and make a secured investment for your future. To know more about the project, feel free to take a tour of Salarpuria Sattva Park Cubix photos and website.
about_project_details: Salarpuria Sattva is one of the promising builders in the field of Real Estate. All Salarpuria Sattva constructions have the highest standards of quality through the construction process. Green initiatives, advanced engineering ensure the best standards in construction since 1986. The group mainly focuses on delivering high-quality spaces and have been powering the goals of emerging as a leading name.The builder has created unparalleled projects for its customers with all sorts of amenities and services that meet the needs. Backed by the professional team of architects and designers who plan as per the current Real Estate trend, they always seek the betterment of their clients and guide them to the best path in the property related section of matters and affairs. Salarpuria Sattva aims to be a number one Real Estate constructor in India and showcase their talent worldwide.
project_highlights:
Highlights


Close to Nandi Hills.The locality is home to renowned corporates.Close to the BMRDA Nandagudi Township and the SEZ.Situated 30 minutes from the Hoskote Industrial Area.Devanahalli Town - 2 Min | International Airport - 10 Min.Close proximity to Kirloskar Tech Park, Manyata Tech Park.Whitefield - 30 Min.Nandi Hills - 20 Min.Kirloskar Tech Park - 25 Min.Manyata Tech Park - 30 MinLocated close to Kempegowda International Airport, ensuring connectivity and value appreciation Proposed Devanahalli Business Park and two other IT parks are in the vicinity.Other upcoming projects in the locality include an aerospace park, a science park and a 1000 crore financial city New satellite road to connect the neighbourhood to Doddaballapur.Close proximity to upcoming KIADB Industrial AreaProject USP:2 club houses with 2 swimming pools (indoor and outdoor)14 acres of open space out of 18 acres of land areaBeautiful layouts plans for the apartments

project_description: Monarch Serenity is an expansive luxury enclave of magnificent apartments in Bangalore, elevating the contemporary lifestyle. Monarch Serenity in Thanisandra, Bangalore comes with premium 2, 3 and 4 BHK apartments for buyers that are priced Rs. 1.05 Cr onwards on an average. Project details This RERA certified project consist of totally 196 units while average home sizes range between 1226 and 2600 sq ft. Monarch Serenity spreads over an area of 2.50 acres with 14 graceful towers. The smart residences are embellished with charismatic features and will felicitate its dwellers with an extravagant, enriching and luxurious lifestyle. Monarch Serenity is magnificently designed to appeal to the rich taste of contemporary home buyers. Its thoughtfully designed floor plans, layout and pristine surrounding, ensure that you are surrounded by nothing but the best. The amenities in Monarch Serenity comprises of landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gymnasium, play area, intercom, rain water harvesting, lift, waste disposal, club house, health facilities, tennis court, badminton court, car parking, basement car parking, maintenance staff, jogging track, basket ball court, squash court and several others. Highpoints Monarch Serenity stands unique not only because of its quality, architecture and international standards but also because of its prime location to make it very easily reachable. Companies like Kirloskar, Honeywell and famous institutions like BIT, NITTE while hospitals and shopping complex are in close proximity. BMTC buses offer services in the area hence travelling is not at all a major issue. Location of this project offers decent life style and has easy access to malls, schools, hospitals, restaurants and other day to day needs. Utmost care has been taken by the developers to ensure convenience and connectivity. Book an apartment now as Monarch Serenity brings together contemporary and classic, blending them to create signature residences and lifestyle.

project_description: OverviewSurrounded by lavish and green landscapes, the Commanders Galaxy in Thanisandra, Bangalore is a blend of modern and peaceful living. The serene view around rejuvenates your senses and keeps you away from mind away from the daily life stress. These spacious and well- ventilated residential flats are luxurious and elegant and are designed to offer you a comfortable life. Equipped with 1 tower and 43 residential flats, the Commanders Galaxy is a ready to move society that is constructed with a smart floor plan. Designed to offer affordable housing in Thanisandra, Bangalore the Commanders Galaxy offers 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments at prices starting from Rs. 49.0 lac.Project detailThe vaastu compliant residential flats in Commanders Galaxy are built with no common walls to offer ample of space, openness and privacy so that you can spend some quality time with your family. You can visit Magicbricks and can explore Commanders Galaxy price, Commanders Galaxy floor plan, Commanders Galaxy photos, flats, apartments in Commanders Galaxy and a lot more. The lavish society is constructed by the Jupiter Infrastructure (Bangalore) Private Limited that an infrastructure development company that is equipped with high- qualified professionals who work together to offer you the best residential spaces.The residential flats in Commanders Galaxy feature RCC framed structure with concrete block masonry walls, vitrified tiles in living room and bedrooms, anti- skid, rustic tiles with skirting in toilets, dadoing upto 7ft height in toilet, kitchen with polished granite platform and stainless steel sink, water purifier and premium quality tile dadoing upto 2 ft height above platform, main door with teak wood frame, other doors with salwood frames and shutter, UPVC windows, weather shield paint on external walls, OBD on internal walls, melamine polish on main door etc.Strategically located, the Commanders Galaxy offers easy connectivity to public transport, MG road, schools, colleges, hospitals, IT Hubs, malls and all the other prime areas. The Commanders Galaxy is equipped with many modern amenities like swimming pool, banquet hall, health club, gym, children’s play area, garden, space for walkers, 24 hours security, intercom facility, DG backup for lighting and common areas etc.

project_description: Overview Spread across 7-acres, Provident Harmony Thanisandra, Bangalore developed by Provident Housing comprises of total 548 units spread across 15 towers. The project offers 1 and 3 BHK flats measuring between 662, 1262 sqft. The flat prices of Provident Harmony range within Rs. 57.0 Lacs  75.0 Lacs. To get a clear glimpse of these flats, feel free to browse through the attractive floor plans and photos of Provident Harmony. About the project Offering easy access to Manyata Tech Park, Provident Harmony is undoubtedly the right address for your dream. The project offers well-designed apartments that are completely ready for possession. Provident Harmony flat rents are also quite competitive and the reviews are extremely positive, which make this project worthy of your investment. Blessed with good ventilation and ample natural light, the aura of these apartments is simply amazing assuring a healthy living. This well-planned residential project is inclusive of total 54 one-bedroom flats measuring 662 sqft, 36 three-bedroom units spread across 1262 sqft and the remaining 458 apartments measure 1241 sqft and are of 3 BHK configurations. Some of the exclusive amenities provided by the society include a clubhouse, swimming pool, kids play area, multipurpose courts and a well-equipped gym. Waste disposal, reserved parking, rain water harvesting, power backup and round the clock security are some of the other commendable features. Highpoints Well-placed in Chokkanahalli, just off Thanisandra main road, this residence enjoys good proximity to several workplaces of Bangalore, which is prime USP of this project. Supreme connectivity to all means of public transport facilities is yet another plus point. VIBGYOR High School, B G National Public School, Nisarga International Pre-School, Regal Hospital and the world-famous Fortis Hospital are all located within close neighbourhood. Confident reviews and spacious floor plans make Provident Harmony Thanisandra, Bangalore a great investment opportunity. So, hurry up and book a flat now
about_project_details: Provident Housing Limited are the pioneers in making affordable housing out of passion, and caters to the premium affordable housing segment targeting first time home buyers. They have over 38 years of experience in the housing sector; they are present across the country through projects in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mysore, Chennai, Kochi, Coimbatore, Kolkata and Colombo. The Group also has presence in Dubai, UAE and business representatives in the United Kingdom and the United States. The Group has above 20 million sq. ft. of residential and commercial space currently under construction. They are capable in delivering top quality homes on time, with well designed spacious homes and world class amenities; they would make you a proud owner of your premium home.

project_description: OverviewGoyal Footprints is a project located at Thanisandra Main Road, Bangalore. The project is under the possession of Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group. With their relentless efforts and immense dedication, Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group have established a huge reputation is real estate market. The project provides apartments varying between price ranges of 39 lakhs to 65 lakhs. About the ProjectGoyal Footprints consist of 182 units and 4 towers. The project is ready to move and offers 1 BHK and 2 BHK well-ventilated residential apartments.  Location of the place is quite attractive. The Thanisandra Main Road is a central area and places such as hospitals, bus stops, ATMs and shopping malls are situated nearby. You can easily commute via the public transport. Area covered by the Goyal Footprints is approximately 4500 to 5941 per square feet; 1 BHK apartments cover an area of around 663-805 square feet & 2 BHK apartments cover an area of 1092-1094 square feet. Ceramic tiles are used for flooring in the balcony and vitrified tiles are used in areas such as bedroom, living room and kitchen.  Teak wood frames are used for the main door giving it an elegant look. The chromium plated fittings used in the washrooms and the exclusive European Water Closet is also being provided by Goyal and Co and Hariyana Group under this project. HighpointsThere are many unique amenities that are offered under the Goyal Footprints project. Outdoor Tennis Court, Jogging and Strolling Track, Food Court, Lounge, Club House, reserved parking, Swimming Pool and lift are a few to name. Investing in this project not only provides you with the benefits of all such services but you also enjoy a hassle-free life full of luxury and comfort. These affordable apartments can surely make your life a happy place!
