about_project_details: Goyal and Co. and H.N Safal Goyal and co. was founded by the late Mr. Rampurshottam Goyal in 1970 in the city of Ahmedabad. A bachelor in civil engineering from Jodhpur University, he started the company with limited means. With his heart set on a long term vision and years of perseverance, he grew Goyal and Co into one of the leading real estate development companies in Western India, both in terms of residential and commercial. The brand has changed the skyline of Ahmedabad as well as earned the respect of the city with a legacy synonymous with excellence, innovation, and transparency. Choicest locations, perfect planning, and immaculate implementation have ensured value for money for its customers. Known for delivering beyond the call of duty, Goyal and Co has systematically built on its credibility and goodwill with every project it has launched over the years. Each one being a true testament in innovation, design and construction.

project_description: Overview: NR WINDGATES is a residential venture by NR Green Wood Developers located in the happening area of Thanisandra, Bangalore offering aesthetically crafted spacious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is ongoing construction at the moment and will consist of 279 units spread over 4 towers. NR WINDGATES apartment price rate starts at Rs. 46.5 Lac onward.  Project Details:NR WINDGATES Bangalore, a well planned project in the locality of Thanisandra by NR Green Wood Developers is offering aesthetically crafted spacious 1 BHK, 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. NR WINDGATES floor plan for its 1 BHK flat ranges from 497 sq. ft. to 660 sq. ft.; 2 BHK flat areas range from 981 sq. ft. to 1245 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1389 sq. ft. to 1556 sq. ft.NR WINDGATES apartments are being designed with interior features like good quality vitrified tiles flooring in all rooms, designer doors, concealed wiring with modular switches and adequate electrical points, powder coated aluminium windows with glass, granite kitchen platform with stainless steel sink, good quality CP fittings and branded sanitary ware fixtures in bathroom etc.  As the NR WINDGATES photos show, the project is equipped with amenities like club house, jogging & strolling track, cycling track, power back up, swimming pool, lift, 24 hour security facilities, park, reserved parking, service & goods lift, visitor parking, maintenance staff, gymnasium, indoor games room, kids play area, multipurpose courts, rain water harvesting, water storage, meditation area, waste disposal, and fire fighting equipment etc. to name a few. Highpoints: NR WINDGATES aims for the best way of living for all of its residents. NR WINDGATES Bangalore locality is also a key feature and includes various basic civic utilities for the resident’s to fulfil their needs.

project_description: Bhartiya City is a project by Bhartiya City Developers Pvt Ltd. strategically located in Thanisandra Bangalore.  It is build on an area of 126 Acre encompassing 2415 units across 19 towers. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles, Ceramic tiles and Anti Skid tiles.  Bhartiya City comprises of 1BHK, 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Flat.  1BHK Flat has range of area from 620 Sq-ft to 1170 Sq-ft having 1 balcony and 1 and 2 bathroom. 2BHK Flat has range of area from 895 Sq-ft to 1800 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has range of area from 1280 Sq-ft to 3135 Sq-ft having 1, 2 and 3 balcony and 2 and 3 bathroom. 4BHK Flat has range of area from 2259 Sq-ft to 4200 Sq-ft having 3 and 4 balcony and 4 bathroom.  Launched in November 2012, Bhartiya City offers Ongoing properties. The project is approved by Bangalore Development Authority. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, DHFL, HDFC, ICICI, Indiabulls, LIC Housing Finance, Punjab National Bank and SBI.
about_project_details: Bhartiya City Nikoo Homes Phase II in Thanisandra, Bangalore This is a city. But more than that, its an environment. Children here can just be children-climbing up trees and chasing butterflies on the way to kindergarden. Neighbors here arent strangers. People headed to work don't need to account for jams on the way. And the Nikoo home you live in, compares to the very best on earth. From a studio suite to a penthouse, every house has a standardized Italian kitchen, an outdoor deck that seats at least four and access to all the public spaces like link gardens and a clubhouse. Some immensely talented architects, town planners and engineers are working round the clock to bring this vision to life.Well-connected roads to the city where the location is easily accessible by frequent bus and cab services making it a perfect place to live Hazzle Free, Well connected to International Airport, Just 5 km away from Manyatha Tec Park.

Fern Valley Group is a Bangalore based builder as well as a property development company having its operations in Cochin and the Gilchrist besides Bangalore. The Group have an extensive regional presence and marketing network. Since 1993 FERN VALLEY GROUP have provided quality homes built on customer eccentric relation, by providing hallmark Premium Living Environments at affordable prices to thousands of satisfied clients.

Fern Valley Group is being lead by Mr. Paul Fernandez, an MBA in Finance from U.K, who has over two decades of experience in managing the Finance and Administration of the giant oil conglomerate – Arabian American Oil Company (ARAMCO).
The dynamic group, led by Mr. Paul Fernandez, one of the pioneers in industry has witnessed consistent growth over two decades. The group’s projects in Bangalore, Cochin and the Nilgiris include Californian style Villas in gated community Villa Projects and Luxury Apartment Projects. Through personalized service, innovative design and flawless execution, Fern Valley has successfully put a smile on the faces of every one of its clients.

Bangalore! Once known for its salubrious weather and verdant landscapes has often been referred to as the Pensioners Paradise or the Garden City of India and has been subjected to aggressive and unprecedented changes over the last decade. It has been transformed from a relatively tranquil city into a major software hub and Business Center, offering tremendous potential for growth in various fields especially in the field of Property Development. This feel good factor of overall development of Bangalore has prompted the Promoters Mr. Paul Fernandez to incorporate the Flagship Company of the Group, Fern Valley Resorts Pvt. Ltd. in the year 1995 under the Indian Companies Act and start its operation.

project_description: Overview Bhavya Serene, a project by Bhavya Builders on Kasavanahalli, Bangalore, is an upcoming residential development offering thoughtfully designed 2 BHK apartments for those looking at comfort combined with elegance. Project Details Bhavya Builders are one of the most reputed builders in the area with many projects under their belt. The idea behind Bhavya Serene, Bangalore is to create stylish yet carefully-designed living options for urban people. There are many advantages to living in Bhavya Serene because there are a lot of amenities that one can enjoy. There is a clubhouse for leisure activities and socializing. Residents can enjoy a well-maintained cycling and jogging track to keep up with their fitness goals. Lift and Intercom Facility is operational at all times for absolute convenience and comfort. For residents to feel safe, there is 24x7 security. Maintenance Staff takes care of all the building repair work. The construction and design of the apartments in Bhavya Serene has been done keeping in mind urban living requirements. The kitchen comes with a provision for an aqua-guard point and the toilets have a provision for geyser. Flooring is done with high-quality vitrified tiles all over the house. Bhavya Serene area per apartment is different and ranges from 1105 sq ft to 1205 sq ft. High Points Perhaps, the biggest advantage to this is the Bhavya Serene location. It is well connected to all places. Within a 3 km radius, one can find South Indian Bank ATM, Central Shopping Mall, Kaikondrahalli Bus Stop, Apollo Pharmacy, supermarkets, churches, temples, restaurants, parks and even PVR Soul Spirit for movies. In a fast developing area, this building comes as a blessing to those who want to have a comfortable living option. Go ahead and get yourself this unique living option at prices starting from just 59 Lac onwards.

about_project_details: LG Developers, today tops among the trustworthy real estate developers in Bengaluru. From a humble beginning way back in LG has grown into one of the leading township developers with an expansive array of projects in select locale at North Bengaluru. The company today has five prestigious landmark projects, each one reflecting the customer's taste for innovative living. Having achieved astounding growth in developing large townships, LG is now daring the extra-mile, embracing new challenges and embarking on the next phase of its journey redefine success.Every projects of LG conforms to stringent quality standards and is backed by some of the most brilliant minds-architects and engineers who ensure uncompromising execution-right from the approval from authorities,the choice of materials and final execution.LG has a proven track record of execution enormous prestigious projects in North Bangalore, a location that is hunted down by home buyers,multinational majors and leading hotel chains. With swift development with new international Airport giving a fillip, North Bangalore is rightly considered an investment hotspot. With property prices soaring high, investing in an LG project would undoubtedly turn out to be your next big step.

project_description: OverviewGolden Palms Project is developed by Golden Gates Properties, Hennur, Bangalore. This luxurious society provides 490 well designed units which are spread across 8 huge towers. Golden Palms prices range between 70 Lac to 90 Lac which is quite affordable.Project detailsGolden Palms flats include 2 BHK as well as 3 BHK elegantly designed units. The 2 BHK flats are available within the range of 1535 sq ft to 1710 sq ft, whereas the 3 BHK units are available in the size 1835 sq ft. This society is situated amidst lush green surroundings, away from the hustle bustle of the city.Golden Palms floor plans are well designed with the combination of ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles and anti skid ceramic tiles. It features French windows, teak wood door frames, and superior quality sanitary fittings.Golden Palms apartments are equipped with all the basic as well as luxurious amenities required for a lavish lifestyle. Some of the basic facilities are as follows:Power backup, security, ample water supply, lift facility, intercom facility, are some of the basic facilities that are provided.It also provides indoor games room, club house, jogging track, kids play area, internet connectivity, multipurpose courts, flower gardens, park and much more.Golden Palms photos will give you a clear idea of this beautiful society.HighpointsThe main USP of this society is worth mentioning. All the apartments of this society are perfectly crafted as per vaastu principles. One can enjoy the scenic beauty and mesmerizing green vistas view by residing in these apartments.These flats are bright and well ventilated, making it totally worth your investment. Kothanur Bus Stop and Shandong Chinese Restaurant are situated at a distance 1.9kms from this society premises. Hurry up, and book a flat and live a life of happiness and prosperity.
about_project_details: Golden Gate Properties Ltd is a Bangalore based Public Limited Company that started its operations in 1995. In a short period, it has emerged as one of the leading developers in South India with its excellent projects of outstanding quality, reliability, affordability and efficient after-sales service.The Company has 5 on-going projects at strategic locations in Bangalore and Hyderabad. The company engages various national and international architects (like HOK, USA) for its projects. It has its own team of construction with huge and latest equipment including imported shuttering materials for speedy construction and equipments like cranes, batching plants, trucks etc

Humble beging of safco properties in real estate market in partnership with Central Park Developers with a considerable development portfolio in and around Nelamangala. Later we moved into the space of premium budgetary housing in whole of Bangalore.
 THE RISE OF SAFCO PROPERTIES
We started independent premium budgetary housing projects based in Urban and Central Bangalore, under the name of Safco Properties. Since then, we have delivered 4 multi-storey premium budgetary housing projects and 2 commercial projects, across Bangalore.
 SAFCO PROPERTIES TODAY
Today, we have two ongoing housing projects that are in full swing - Safco Bluesky at Hennur Road and Safco Heights at Horamavu Junction. Plans have also been put in place for 2 upcoming projects in North Bangalore.Also to be venturing out into new verticals constantly.

project_description: Citrus Polaris is a project by Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd. located in Hennur, Bangalore, offering luxurious designed currently under construction 4 BHK villas. Citrus Polaris price rate starts from Rs. 1.53 Cr onward. The project is nicely equipped with all high quality amenities and civic utilities within the vicinity.Project Details:Citrus Polaris located in Hennur, Bangalore is a project by Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd., with their 6 years of real estate experience, offers spacious, lavish and currently under construction 4 BHK villas. Citrus Polaris plot areas for its 4 BHK villas range approx. 1880 sq. ft. with 4 balcony and 4 bathrooms.Citrus Polaris villas are designed with good interiors like ceramic tiles, vitrified tiles flooring, teak wood frame doors, granite kitchen counter top, premium CP fittings and fixtures, concealed wiring with high quality modular switches etc.Citrus Polaris is a RERA Certified Project. Citrus Polaris also provides numerous basic amenities for its occupants like security facility, swimming pool, gym, jogging track, play area, tennis court, outdoor games, rain water harvesting, club house, library, table tennis, billiards, security, etc. and many more.Highpoints:Citrus Polaris is well built in a very essential and prime location of Hennur, Bangalore. The locality has a green surrounding and is also well connected to the rest of the city. Citrus Ventures Pvt. Ltd. strives to give its residents their dream home with their amazing infrastructure and aesthetic design, all in very affordable prices. Various utilities like Kaveri Nagar Bus Stop, Patel Public School, Samsung Smart Plaza, Syndicate Bank ATM, Reliance Fresh, Dr Batra’s - Homeopathy Clinic, Adyar Ananda Bhavan, PKN Cinemas, Gold's Gym, Indian Oil Petrol Bunk, etc. all lie in very close proximity of the project.

project_description: Overview Located in Chandapura, Bangalore – Green Acres Phase 2 developed by Sri Srinivasa Developers is truly a green paradise offering affordable residential plots. This project is inclusive of 146 residential plots measuring from 1200 sqft to 2400 sqft. Green Acres Phase 2 plots are priced from Rs. 17.4 Lac to Rs. 26.1 Lacs. Green Acres Phase 2 photos and the site layouts are available online with complete details. About the project Green Acres Chandapura reviews are extremely positive and the developers are one of the reputed names in Bangalore real estate market. The developers always ensured well-planned residential plots that are loaded with all the modern amenities and facilities. Sri Srinivasa Green Acres residential plots hold great future benefits and also fetch good returns in the future. Set in the lap of mother nature, the residential plots of Green Acres Phase 2 are a perfect venue for your dream home. The friendly atmosphere and the rich ambiance of this project will definitely soothe your body, mind and soul. Come and invest in this gated community and take a first step towards fulfilling your dream home. These affordable residential plots are offered with freehold ownership and the prospective buyer can easily avail loans from any well-known banks or other financial institutions. Perfectly outlined as per vaastu rules, these plots come with facilities like security and kids play area. Highpoints The strategic location, just off Chandapura main road is indeed the prime USP of this project. Housing several prestigious residential projects, Chandapura is highly sought-after among investors and property buyers. Good proximity to various IT hubs and excellent public transport connectivity are added advantages. Narayana Hrudayala Hospital and Greendot International School are few well-known landmarks of this project. A residential plot in Green Acres Phase 2, Chandapura, Bangalore is truly worthwhile. So, walk in and book today!!!
about_project_details: Genuinely devoted to maintaining the utmost quality in Residential spacesSri Srinivasa Developers create fully integrated housing communities and residential spaces that enhance the quality of the esteemed customers lifestyle. Harmony with nature , efficient planning, contemporary design aesthetics and absolute transparency are the hallmarks of the company. Additionally better methods of project management and superior customer service are the keystones behind its success. The company also takes pride in its experienced team of Real Estate Professionals.OverviewGated community residential Layout with modern facilities set in serene, natural surroundings. While providing the modern infrastructural facilities, care has been taken to ensure that the pristine environment is left undisturbed.The entire community has been planned to be friendly, secure and complete with all modern amenities. And with all means of comfortable living taken care of in utmost detail, all there is left to the proud plot owners is to plan their dream homes for luxurious living experience that lasts lifetime.A secure haven of harmonious living with warmth that reflects a welcoming and aesthetically designed entrance arch invites residents as well as guests into the warmth of Spring Hills. The pleasantness continues through the length and breadth of the setting with colorful plants and trees that add visual interest and aesthetics.

project_description: Overview: Vensai Icon temple tree is a residential project by ICON Homz primly located in Chandapura, Bangalore offering meticulously designed and spacious residential plots. The project will consist of 135 strategically planned units and is currently ongoing construction. Vensai Icon temple tree price rate for these plots start at Rs. 19.2 Lac onward.Project Details:    Vensai Icon temple tree is strategically located in Chandapura, Bangalore by the quite experienced ICON Homz and is offering spacious and skilfully crafted residential plots. Vensai Icon temple tree Bangalore plots are customisable for the occupants as they can build their own home abode in these spaces. The project is being built on a strong frame structure and has spacious plots up for sale. The plots are equipped with many amenities and facilities for the resident’s needs and is available in several dimensions for fulfilling the potential buyer’s demands. Vensai Icon temple tree plot areas for its residential spaces range from 1200 sq. ft. to 2400 sq. ft. It is offering nicely crafted plot with all basic amenities in reasonable and affordable prices. Vensai Icon temple tree features modern day amenities and facilities for the occupants such as power supply, water supply, security facilities, paved internal roads with street lights, children’s play area, car parking space, landscape garden, and special ones like a club house, outdoor tennis court, swimming pool, banquet hall, gymnasium, multipurpose courts, etc. among several others.Highpoints:Vensai Icon temple tree has residential plots meeting several demands and expectations of potential buyers or investors. The project is surrounded with greenery and peaceful environment, away from the hustle of the city. Vensai Icon temple tree Bangalore locality has utilities like Green dot international school, Vemana Hospital, HDFC Bank ATM, GR Farm Fresh, Bharat Petroleum etc. and many more.

project_description: Subha 9 SKY VUE is a premium residential building situated at Chandapura-Anekal Road, which is about 2.5 Kms from Alliance University. The architecture of this project creatively blends contemporary style with the combination of luxurious lifestyle amenities. It is an ideal dwelling for newlyweds and bachelor's as it is well-connected to the city of Bangalore. The site is located only four kms away from Electronic City making it easy for IT professionals to commute. The property offers best in space, comfort and quality in living for people who want more than just a home.The property offers a choice of 1, 2 & 3 spacious bedrooms that are well ventilated and have ample natural light sources to brighten up all the rooms. The property is open from 3 sides allowing residents to take advantage of maximum sunlight, better ventilation, beautiful views and open spaces. The property is spread over 9 floors with stilt parking, with a total of 180 Units currently available. All the Flats are Vaastu Compliant and facilitate Natural Lighting.

project_description: Krishvi Projects Private Limited brings to you Krishvi Gavakshi, a distinguished project located in Kadubeesanahalli, Bangalore. Krishvi Gavakshi features 2BHK and 3BHK apartments which are ready to move. These residential apartments are available in the affordable price starting from Rs. 95.0 Lakhs.Project detailsOffering row houses Krishvi Gavakshi is a recently launched project in Kadubeesanahalli, Bangalore East. The floor plan of this project includes 2 BHK apartments spread across 1257 sqft and also 3 BHK apartments covering an area that ranges between 1911 to 2399 sqft.Krishvi Gavakshi brings in some of the basic as well as premium specifications such as 24x7 water supply and power backup, firefighting systems, car parking, gym, club house, children's play area, landscape garden, paved compound, rainwater harvesting units, sewage treatment plants, multipurpose court and swimming pool, among others. One of the best advantages of this project is that it is legally approved by BBMP, BESCOM, BWSSB and is even registered under RERA Act.HighpointsThe location of this unsurpassed project that is Bellandur is located in the South East of Bangalore city and is well-known all over the country for the presence of several high-end residential apartments. It is also famous for being home to the Lake, the largest lake in Bangalore. The passing through Bellandur connects with KR Puram. Further, the ITPL main road branching out from ORR connects this area with Whitefield. Leading technology parks are located within close proximity to Bellandur such as the Technology Park. A number of reputed hospitals, schools, markets and other facilities are also in close proximity. These all conveniences are exactly what make Krishvi Gavakshi so special.Krishvi Gavakshi is exclusively designed to make you feel the magnificence of your lifestyle. By booking now, don't be surprised to feel totally royal and important once you enter Krishvi Gavakshi.
about_project_details: Krishvi, largely recognized as single handedly changing the landscape of Bangalore's residential architecture, is the builder of choice by the working individuals and their families in Bangalore who need the true relaxation and comfort of a home after a hectic day. Along with the state of the art infrastructural facilities, Krishvi emphasizes on in-built and natural ventilation. With a focus on natural ventilation, Krishvi projects itself as a "green builder" by aiming to preserve and conserve nature to its optimum best and provides a stress free and relaxed home for its customers.Over the last 13 years, Krishvi has firmly established itself as one of the leading developers of housing projects meeting the requirements of masses in the Silicon Valley of India - Bangalore. The company also has received the prestigious accreditation from CREDAI formerly known as KOAPA.Krishvi Projects (P) Ltd., with a professional and dedicated team of experienced, technical and financial experts, has successfully completed several projects till date to the complete satisfaction of the customers and aims to continue to strive for excellence.

project_description: Legacy Dimora is a residential enterprise by the prominent Legacy Global Projects Pvt. Ltd. that is constructed in Jakkur that is an integral part of the suburbs of Bangalore. This aesthetically designed project is spread out in 3 blocks all having 3 BHK apartments of a standard size i.e. 2700 sq-ft. There are 40 units in all and is loaded with a host of world class amenities like a club house with health facilities, gymnasium, swimming pool, multipurpose hall, kids play zone, intercom, tight security armed with fire fighting equipments, power back up, 24 hours water supply, elevators with ample parking space, beautiful landscaped garden and so on.Legacy Dimora is linked to the city well as it is strategically located with close proximity to facilities like educational institutes like Vibgyor High at a distance of 4.4 km and Manipal Institute at 3.4 km are perfect examples. Even hospitals like GKVK and Ashwini hospitals are at 2.8 km and 2.5 km respectively. The closest bank is Indian bank at 2.6 km. There is no dearth of shopping centres and entertainment zone that include fine dining. The closest eatery is Dominos Pizza at 3.5 km.Detailed planning and constructed in the original style of villas, this project spells opulence amidst nature.

project_description: The Skyline Beverley Park is one of the super luxurious and lavish residential project with Skyline Construction. This project has all the state of the art, and luxurious amenities installed in it for the people. Skyline Construction is one of the top most and leading builder and developer in the field of real estate of Bangalore. They are well known for their luxurious and super luxurious facilities and projects for the people. They have undertaken many projects and completed them in a given period. They have their design and own method of building projects. One of the ongoing projects of Skyline Construction is the Skyline Beverly Park. This project has all the luxurious and lavish amenities installed in it for the people such as a Well spacious garden with sitting arrangement is also available in this project. Rainwater Harvesting with big elevated tanks is also available in this project. All in one Community hall for meeting parties and other function of the people and many more things available for the people.Project features: All the rooms are Vaastu Compliant as per the builder. The project offers 2 and 3 BHK apartments for the people. The area of the flats starts from 1030sq ft to 1865 sq ft to the people. The structure is made up of RCC Frame Structure for safety. The floors are covered with white, vitrified tiles in all the flats.Highlights:  It is only 1.2 km away from the Sea Sharada Vidyalaya. It is only 1.9 km away from Poddar Jumbo Kids. It is only 2.5 km away from B G National Public High School.It is only 2.8 km away from Trio World School.
about_project_details: Leaders in all areas of our operations from providing High Quality Value Added Buildings and Services to our customers to fulfilling the aspirations of our employees.Humble beginnings marked with a resolve and dedication leads to incredible results. 125 years back Skyline started off as a family owned enterprise with holdings in coffee plantations, later branching out to property development. In just over two decades since its inception Skyline Constructions has become one of the most trusted builders in Karnataka and recognized by CREDAI - KARNATAKA.Skyline recognized the impending opportunities in the property development industry. With a well dedicated team of architects and engineers under the able leadership of its Managing Director, Avinash Prabhu Skyline started its success story by building world-class quality spaces as well as making concrete relationships that form the framework of its construction process. Skyline earned its clients' confidence with over 60 successfully completed projects, adding up to over four million square feet in industrial, commercial and residential space. The company's dedication to quality and its integrity was soon recognized with the ISO 9001 certification.

project_description: Sprawling across 5.70 acres, Century Breeze is a glorious residential development by Century Real Estate. The project is located in Jakkur, Bangalore and offers well-planned 2, 3 & 3.5 BHK apartments varying from 1279 sqft to 1798 sqft. The flat rates of Century Breeze Jakkur, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 72.84 Lacs. The project is spectacular with 3 high-rise towers holding 322 residential units. Project details Besides, A Khata & BDA approved, this residence is also RERA certified with possession by December 2019. Situated just 300m away from Bellary Road and located within close proximity of Manyata Tech Park & Galleria Mall, this ambitious residential project is worth consideration. Convenient location, fantastic floor plans and unbeatable price range of Century Breeze, Jakkur, Bangalore have been applauded with lots of positive reviews. The well-ventilated residential apartments of Century Breeze, Jakkur, Bangalore are blessed with adequate breeze & sunlight, keeping the rooms lively. All these abodes are complemented with spacious bedrooms & living rooms, charming balconies, wonderful kitchens and are also armed with an array of modern amenities. The intelligent master plan with 80% open space assure a rejuvenating atmosphere where you are bound to live a healthy & balanced life with your loving family. The project offers a variety of recreational & sporting facilities to keep you entertained in your spare time like squash court, swimming pool and a huge party lawn to name a few. Highpoints With easy reach to Manyata Tech Park, this residence is indeed a dream destination for professionals working here. Reliable connectivity to public transport facilities, Vidyashilp School, Columbia Asia Hospital and Galleria Mall make this project more desirable. Fringed by vibrant greenery, this residence is an ideal place to look for your dream home. So, walk in and book a flat now in Century Breeze Jakkur, Bangalore.
about_project_details: Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalores urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore's landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asias fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated townships spread across South India.

project_description: Overview:Machani Ananda is a new project developed by the famous Machani Group, Basavanagudi – Bangalore. The project presents to you attractively built 4 BHK flats priced from 4.5 Cr onwards. Machani Ananda apartments are still under construction with the proposed time of delivery by December 2018. Project Details:Machani Ananda construction update states that the project is ongoing with a proposed time of delivery by December 2018. These flats give an aura of serenity and liveliness and the project consists of 132 considerately built units in 2 expansive towers. As per the Machani Ananda floor plan the 4 BHK flats in the project are constructed over an area range between 2602 sqft and 2777 sqft. These huge homes are well ventilated and have bright and sunny interiors that give you a healthy atmosphere.Along with the flawless technology used for developing, the project also offers you a range of top class amenities that will reduce your stress.The modern amenities present in the society include rainwater harvesting, intercom facility, CCTV camera, gymnasium, kids play area, RO water system, etc.These vaastu compliant homes also offer you many basic facilities such as waste disposal, lift, waste disposal, maintenance staff, indoor games room, power back up, reserved parking spaces, etc. Highpoints:Machani Ananda reviews praise the fully functional club house in the society. This will help you to spend some relaxing moments after you are back from a hard and stressful day of work. The project is sure to give you a living experience like no other enhancing the balanced approach to lead a happy life. The location of this project also plays a very important role for those who are looking to purchase a home.Dont lose this perfect opportunity to embrace a quiet life with your family. Go through the updated Machani Ananda photos and book your flat soon.
about_project_details: At Machani Group, we strive to find the juncture where engineering, design, and business meet. project_description: Overview Offering spacious 2 & 3 BHK apartments for both resale & rent - Pride Springfields is one of the finest creation of Pride Group located in Uttarahalli, Bangalore. Planned across 5 acres of beautiful land parcel, this project consists of 5 elegant towers containing 456 residential units. The apartments range from 929 - 1278 sqft of carpet area and the price list of Pride Springfields start from Rs. 46.12 Lacs. Project details Located just off Kanakapura Road, Pride Springfields is a prime residential pin code that has been welcomed with positive reviews. Offering 360 degree views of the luxuriant greenery, these 2 & 3 BHK abodes invite you live a breathtaking lifestyle. Well-built with spacious floor plans, the 2BHK flats measuring 929 sqft are priced from Rs. 46.12 Lacs onwards while the 3BHK apartments are valued from Rs. 62.70 Lacs onwards. Well-ventilated, the residential apartments of Pride Springfields are blessed with enough fresh air & natural light promising a contented life. Children's play area, swimming pool, gym and jogging track are some of the noteworthy attributes of this RERA certified project. These earthquake resistant structures have been studded with all the prime facilities like 24x7 manned security, round the clock power supply and substantial water supply. Highpoints The makers of Pride Springfields Uttarahalli, Bangalore have wisely chosen an upcoming locality which holds great future benefits in terms of price appreciation and rental values. Easy connectivity to all the forms of public transport facilities has been the major driving force of this area. Top-rated schools & hospitals such as Deccan International School, National Public School, Ring Road Hospital and Metro Hospital are located within just 5km radius. If you been aspiring to live in the beautiful locality of Uttarahalli, Bangalore – then Pride Springfields is an ultimate choice. So, hurry up and book a flat now.

project_description: Overview Brigade Northridge by the prestigious Brigade Group in Jakkur, Bangalore is a well conceptualized residential project boasting 600 units occupying 7 elegantly designed towers. 2BHK and 3BHK residential apartments covering carpet area between 80 and 118sq.m is up for sale. About the Project Brigade Northridge situated in Jakkur, Bangalore is splendidly designed to offer all the comforts and facilities one expects from a premium accommodation. Spread across verdant green 7.5acres and overlooking Kogilur Cross Lake, this beautiful project offers every conceivable need and comfort required to experience a blissful life. Priced at Rs.72lakh onwards, 2BHK and 3BHK luxuriously appointed residential apartments are a perfect choice of accommodation for either investment purpose or buying and transforming it into a perfect little dream home. An interesting bunch of facilities further add to the charming appeal of Brigade Northridge in Jakkur that allows one to indulge and enjoy a variety of recreational and leisure activities. Some of these include a gym, swimming pool, kids play area, sports area, indoor games room, multipurpose hall and meditation deck. In order to invest in a 2BHK or 3BHK apartment in Brigade Northridge, one can also choose to take a loan from State Bank of India, Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and PNB Housing Finance.  HighpointsLocation plays a pivotal role in determining how good a particular residential project and Brigade Northridge, Jakkur doesn’t disappoint at all as it enjoys proximity to various key areas. Schools and hospitals such as Delhi Public School, Canadian International School, Columbia Asia Hospital and Baptist Hospital can be accessed within the range of 4km to 12km. Manyata Tech Park is about 6.8km away while International Airport is 18km away. Excellent connectivity combined fabulous residential apartments loaded with top-notch amenities are reasons enough to invest in this magnificent project.
about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

With 2 and 3 BHK apartments in their list Exotica offers a neat and comfortable living with wide open spaces and panoramic view of the manicured landscapes around. Located off the Devanahalli road this place is close to Bagmane and Manyatha tech parks and also the residential town Banaswadi. With many malls and retails around this place is well connected to the Bengaluru city through flyovers. The luxury features that enthrall the residents at Exotica are the long walking stretch and benches for elders to relax. Elevators facility, 24 hours security with power back up and water supply is also present. Kids play area constructed with structures is an additional feature of Renaissance Exotica

project_description: Overview Radiance Iris is a property that is constructed by Radiane Realty. The projected is located near Jakkur Lake, and surrounded by greenery and is a living space for those who love to be with the nature. The property features 3BHK, 4BHK & 5BHK townhouses that signify style and spaciousness with a touch of the French Riviera, a French Connection in Bengaluru. With sizes that range between 1620 and 2902 sq. ft., each townhouse offers ample space for the entire family.Project Details:Radiance Iris is located at Jakkur Lake Bangalore, and is a property constructed by Radiane Realty. These Townhouses are designed with bespoke green spaces that separate one from each other, so that you wake up on an island of peace, and have a pleasant morning. The property is well planned with 60% open space providing a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of city life.Radiance Iris are designed with features of Mediterranean style Townhouses that breathe luxury inside and out, perfect for those looking to live in the lap of luxury. Radiance Iris offers a location that is peaceful yet conveniently located close to some of the best schools, colleges and hospitals of the city. Just 17 km away from the CBD and the airport only 30 minutes away, this is the perfect location for your dream home. Redefine your luxury living with a home at Radiance Iris.Radiance Iris offers individuals with one of the best amenities like Club House, Power Back Up, Swimming Pool, Lift, Park, Intercom Facility, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Indoor Games Room, Kids Play Area, Aerobics room, Rain Water Harvesting, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts, Fire Fighting Equipment etc.Highlights:Radiance Iris has 77 Town Houses, Ground + 2 Structure with Adequate Green Cover, 10 Feet Clear Floor to Ceiling Heights etc. The project has a closer connectivity close to some of the best schools, colleges and hospitals of the city. Just 17 km away from the CBD and the airport only 30 minutes away, this is the perfect location for your dream home.

project_description: Overview Prestige Group launches yet another remarkable project called Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli, Bangalore. This impressively designed project situated close to Thurahalli Forest offers 12 towers, which is occupied by 1119 residential apartments in the configuration of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK units. The price of these apartments are well within the affordable bracket that ranges between Rs.30.40 lakhs and Rs.80.50 lakhs. About the Project Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli is a thoughtfully conceptualized project spread across 15.94 acres, which is dotted with 12 towers of 2B+18 floors. The size of the apartments ranges between 661sq.ft. and 1750sq.ft. and rate per sq.ft. is around Rs.4675. Each of the apartments are extremely spacious and contain a separate servant room as well. Prestige Lake Ridge is not only splendidly designed but also offers a plethora of amenities to ensure residents experience a holistic lifestyle. Some of these top-of-the-line amenities include swimming pool, playground, gym, community hall, badminton court, jogging track, clubhouse, landscaped gardens etc. Besides, these amenities there is even a Bank and ATM, cafeteria and temple situated within the premise. Prestige Lake Ridge in Uttarahalli, Bangalore also enjoys a prime location as it is only 2.4km from Outer Ring Road and 2.8km from NICE Peripheral Ring Road. Most of the basic social amenities such as hospitals, malls, banks, schools, restaurants etc. are also easily accessible.   Highpoints Enjoying an abundance of verdant greens, Prestige Lake Ridge gives the residents an amazing opportunity of residing away from the chaos of hectic city life yet being minutes away from all the major neighbourhoods and infrastructural facilities. Great connectivity along with the option of investing in affordable housing without compromising on high-end facilities ensures that it is a must to invest in this project.

Century Real Estate, with its headquarters in Bangalore, India was founded by Dr.P.Dayananda Pai and Mr.P.Satish Pai in the year 1973 with the primary objective of transacting in the simple buying and selling of land. More than 35 years later, the Company has evolved into an integrated, full service real estate development company that has transformed Bangalore’s urban landscape and is credited with several of Bangalore’s landmark developments such as Manipal Centre, Taj Residency, Vijaya Bank Head Quarters and Diamond District to mention only a few. Century Real Estate has the unique distinction of having purchased land on M.G.Road at INR 5 per square feet way back in 1973 where today the quoted prices are in the range of INR 20,000 per square feet.

Regarded as one of the oldest and most respected companies in the Real Estate space in India, the growth of Century Real Estate has practically mirrored the growth of Bangalore as one of Asia’s fastest growing cities. Today, we are the largest owners of real estate in Bangalore with a land bank in excess of 3000 Acres representing more than USD 2 billion in asset value and a development portfolio of over 10 million square feet comprising hotels, office buildings, residences, educational institutions and integrated township.

project_description: OverviewSobha HRC Pristine is a remarkable residential project that is situated in Jakkur, Bangalore-North. Offering affordable housing in Jakkur, Bangalore, the Sobha HRC Pristine features high- rise towers that are designed with modern architecture. Spread across 8.49 acres, the project not only offers a lot of open space and a smarty constructed floor plan but also features 5 towers that gives enough space to 381 residential apartments. The apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine falls in the price range of Rs. 1.01 Cr. to Rs. 4.52 Cr. About the projectThe residential apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine are surrounded by well- planned open spaces with beautiful landscapes and water bodies. The Sobha HRC Pristine is constructed by the Sobha Limited that was founded in 1995 and has developed 95 real estate projects and 253 contractual projects, which includes 50 ongoing residential projects and 31 ongoing contractual projects.The well- ventilated apartments in Sobha HRC Pristine feature earthquake resistant structure, main entrance door with natural teal polish finished, windows with UPVC frames with clear float glass, skid proof tiling in key areas, premium quality vitrified tiles in kitchen and toilets, CP and sanitary fittings form Duravit or equivalent make, rainwater harvesting drain pipes, modular switches, copper electrical wiring through concealed conduits and 100% power backup. If you book a flat in Sobha HRC Pristine then you get standard elevators in each tower, 3 tier security system and CCTV cameras at all vantage points. Apart from offering 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK luxurious apartments, the Sobha HRC Pristine is loaded with amenities to complement your modern lifestyle. These amenities include garden, library, club house, community hall, swimming pool, gym, tennis court, play area, table tennis, billiards, skating rink, aerobics room, kids club, kids play area, meditation area, multipurpose court, conference room and a lot more.Sobha HRC Pristine offers easy connectivity to public transports and is situated near to Kensri School National College of Journalism, Jain Heritage School Presidency College, Mallya Aditi School Kristu Jayanti College, VIBGYOR International School Reva University, Colombia Asia Manyata Business Park, Hospitals Corporate Parks, Aster CMC Kirloskar Tech Park, Baptist Hospital  Mantri Manyata Energia, Motherhood Karle Special Economic Zone etc.

project_description: Definer Serene Drive is one of one of the popular residential project developed by Definer Group.All the efforts that went into the planning and developing of Serene Drive was centered around one proposition – to deliver genuine value for your hard earned money.Serene Drive Offers you a beautifully designed spaces of 132 aesthetically built, self contained homes in two blocks, with it’s own amenities and Facilities spread Over 2 Acres of Land.Every Apartment is skillfully planned and designed in a way such that maximum space is utilized.The apartments are well well-equipped with all modern day amenities to cater the need of its residents. Serene Drive is just 10 minutes drive from ITPL (the biggest IT Park in South India) With many IT campuses, Whitefield is the biggest hub of IT companies in the country and is the actual silicon valley of India. Whitefield has the required social infrastructure in place like schools, hospitals & restaurants etc . With the upcoming malls , many five star hotels, it will be an independent city by itself. Integrated townships (containing software parks, industries & residential) are expected in the vicinity of Whitefield NH4, under the special economic zone (SEZ) scheme. And this area is well connected to the new international Airport which is just an half an hour’s drive from DeFINER Serene Drive.

project_description: OverviewSairam Constructions has launched a splendid project named Abhi Sai Santrupthi located in Nagarbhavi, Bangalore. This project shelters 2 towers with 70 residential apartments.      Project details Abhi Sai Santrupthi floor plan features 2BHK and 3BHK flats that are spanning over 1084 sqft to 1665 sqft. Offered with freehold ownership rights, this project is BBMP approved.  This project has clear tile and completion certificate as well. Everything is elegantly designed right from the living room to the kitchen. Abhi Sai Santrupthi flats are highly advantageous as they are airy and receive plenty of sunlight. Apartment for sale in Nagarbhavi Bangalore  are certainly worth your investment. The entire flooring is vitrified that  fosters a posh look. Also, the exteriors and interiors are quite striking and sums up to the beauty of the entire flat. The kitchen is set up with granite counter top and stainless steel sink that is a necessary requirement of every kitchen. Abhi Sai Santrupthi reviews are  on the positive side and you can have a look through it.Glance through Abhi Sai Santrupthi  photos  and you will realize how decent , elegant every nook and corner of this apartments is. This project is well facilitated with high end amenities such as:-Recreational amenities include jogging and strolling track, cycling & jogging track, kids play area,       gymnasium, indoor squash & badminton courts and early learning centre are provided to uplift your style   of living.-Other essential facilities offered are maintenance staff, fire fighting equipment, intercom facility,       reserved parking, visitor parking and so on. HighpointsSai Ram Constructions, Bangalore are reputed builders in real estate market that are well known for   their excellent quality of construction. Also, good connectivity to various means of public transport is an added advantage. Almost all the social infrastructure are in close vicinity for you to access.      Book now in Abhi Sai Santrupthi and enjoy the best.

project_description: Mornings at Bangalore are about a nip in the air, a light mist swirling about you and a cool wind sending pleasurable shivers down your spine. Wake up to a home where you can get your day off to just such an invigorating start. CMRS Misty Winds is a verdant, well laid out enclave of exquisite Apartments situated on OMR. With a superb elevation, top of the line amenities, a refreshing landscape and a view to fall in love with, every quality in fact that you have come to take for granted from Prestige. Misty Winds is close to all essential conveniences and yet comfortably insulated from the bustle and bother. Just the way you prefer your home to be. Browse through this micro-site and discover a home where you will wake up to each new day with a renewed vigour to take on the world. Misty Winds is located on one of the fastest growing locality in Bangalore off Old Madras Road. It's a Township places itself in close proximity to the 'Knowledge Industrial Corridor comprising of SEZ's and Industrial area'. Making it an ideal choice for those seeking a home midst one of the most happening part of Bangalore.

project_description: Lakshh Exotica is a luxurious residential project by the Lakshh Infrastructures that is a known name in the world of real estate and aims to offer the best quality houses. The ready to move project is spread across the total area of 0.57 acres and features 30 percent open area. The society offers 1 tower, 5 floors and huge 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that are 16 in total. The Lakshh Exotica is made with high quality materials and that too only using superior construction standards to ensure durability and comfort. Strategically located at the Nagara Bhavi - Mallathahalli road, West Bangalore, the Lakshh Exotica offers easy connectivity to areas like D Group, railway station, Annapoorneshwari, NGF, Upakar, Visweshwaraiah, Mallathalli RTO office, Parvathamma Ramaiah Convention hall, Bangalore University, schools, colleges, hospitals and all the other important areas of Bangalore.Why buy?The Lakshh Exotica offers various amenities to complement your modern lifestyle. about_project_details: A Collective dream, grit and foresight was all that laid the firm foundation of Koncept Group in Bangalore. Since inception, Koncept Group has created a niche for themselves by developing some premium housing projects in Bangalore.It takes more than a great idea to start an organization. It takes the right market focus, a good management team, an extensive network of resources, and a great vision to build it, and deliver the products on schedule, thus growing to become one of the trusted names in real estate. Although in a short time, the Koncept Group has come a long way and is already a name identified by many. We work on the reality that the spaces we live and work in, have a direct impact on the quality of life we lead. At Koncept, it is our mission to leverage the power of creativity to build spaces that make for a superlative quality of life.

The society is built by the Eternity Structures Pvt Ltd that is one of the largest growing group in the world of realty sector with the unique point that it offers high quality homes at reasonable price. Designed in between the lush green environment along with beautifully designed landscapes, the project covers the total area of 1 acres and features G+3 floors and 36 units in total. These 36 flats are a mix of 2BHK and 3BHK flats and vary in size to meet your diverse housing needs.The quality houses at Eternity Epic are made with seismic II zone compliant RCC framed structure, concealed plumbing lines with ISI quality CPVC fitting and fixtures, concealed Conduit wiring with copper and fire resistant electrical wire of Anchor or ISI equivalent and all the other best quality raw material. Located in Hulimavu, Bangalore, the project offers easy connectivity to places like cinema theaters, hospitals like Apollo, Fortis, Jayadeva, Nimhans, IT Hubs, schools, colleges etc.Why buy?The luxurious Eternity Epic is loaded with amenities so that you get all the comfort and entertainment within the boundaries of the society. These amenities include well equipped gym, indoor games room, landscaped garden, power back up, 24/7 security service, intercom facility, rain water harvesting, multi- purpose hall etc.

project_description: OverviewBM Pristine is a well planned and well built residential project by BM Developers located in Gunjur in Indias Silicon Valley i.e Bangalore. BM Pristine is offering a wide range of pocket-friendly yet lavishly crafted  2BHK and 3BHK flats with 70 percent open Area in a soothing, serene and developed area with IT Cluster. The project is currently under construction and it consists of 225 units spanned over 7 towers. BM Pristine price range starts at Rs. 42.4 Lac onwards.Project DetailsBM Pristine, a graceful residential project with 2.50 Acres land by Arvind group nested in Gunjur in Electronic City Bangalore is providing ideally designed 2BHK and 3BHk apartments with effective connectivity to IT majors and Entertainment facilities.BM Pristine floor plans for its 2BHK flat is 1095 - 1365 sqft and 3BHK flat area ranges from 1390 -1635sqft.BM Pristine luxury apartments promise an international lifestyle with specifications that  have Earthquake resistant  RCC framed structure, vitrified tiles and Anti-Skid ceramic tiles flooring of Kajaria or equivalent make, Decorative main door with Teak frame with Moulded Masonite Skin Flush Shutters 3-Track  Powder coated aluminum windows, Granite Platform Kitchen with SS Sink, Concealed copper wiring, Branded Sanitary wares of reputed make, Interior walls with Tractor Emulsion and Exterior walls with branded Ace Emulsion paint etc.BM Pristines amenities include a Power supply with backup, Gymnasium, Intercom facility, 24 hours security system, lift, Fire Fighting equipment etc.To give you an extra-luxurious Lifestyle BM Pristine is encompassed with utilities like Badminton, Basketball and Squash Court, Indoor Games room, Toddler Pool, Swimming Pool, Jogging Track etc. You can check out BM Pristine photos to check out the beautiful open areas that the apartment has.High PointsBM Pristine is offering apartments with Scenic and Serene aura in a pocket-friendly budget at just 5 minutes drive to Greenwood High School, Inventure Academy and 10 minutes drive to Sigma Tech Park, Wipro, ITPL, CISCO Outer Ring Road and Varthur Bus Stand.BM Pristine is also very close to all Social facilities like schools, Banks, Hospitals, malls etc.

project_description: Overview:Prestige Group, Kammanahalli – Bangalore has come up with a new project called Prestige North Point that offers beautifully constructed 2 and 3 BHK homes in Bangalore. The project consists of 184 entities in a single tower. The project is still under construction and the possession of the apartments will be given before long. Project Details:Prestige North Point apartments are built with the age old tradition of creation with a variance. The homes here are a different and unique and overlook the surrounding areas that include the commercial area of Kammanahalli. The floor plan of Prestige North Point states that the tower is of 25 floors, with the ground and 1st floors reserved for retail units and the residual 23 floors reserved for residential units. The 2 BHK flats are spread over an area between 1252 sqft and 1437 sqft, while the 3 BHK flats in Prestige North Point are built over an area range between 1758 sqft and 1971 sqft.The project offers you vast open land around the property and a host of world class amenities that will definitely capture your senses.-  Gymnasium, reserved and visitor parking space, swimming pool, rainwater harvesting, water storage, waste disposal, round the clock security, etc. are some facilities that are available in these vaastu compliant homes.- The other features include lift, indoor games room, multipurpose courts, conference room, meditation area, RO water system, DTH television facility, recreational pool, etc. Highpoints:The main USP of this project is the amenities that have been provided. These will help you de-stress at the end of the day. The reviews for Prestige North Point will tell you that this project is like a breath of fresh air in the concrete jungle of the city.You can check the updated Prestige North Point photos on the website and book your flat once you are satisfied with what you see.
about_project_details: The Prestige Group owes its origin to Mr. Razack Sattar, who envisioned a success story waiting to take shape in the Retail Business in 1956 itself. Since its formation in 1986, Prestige Estates Projects has grown swiftly to become one of South India's leading Property Developers, helping shape the skyline across the Residential, Commercial, Retail, Leisure and Hospitality sectors.Prestige Court on K.H. Road in Bangalore set the pace for the Groups rapid growth which now stands at over 191 Completed Projects spanning a total developed area of over 64.06 million sqft. It also has another 64 ongoing projects comprising around 65.45 million sqft, which include Apartment Enclaves, Shopping Malls and Corporate Structures, spread across all asset classes.Prestige Constructions, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company is the only Real Estate Developer in Bangalore to have won the reputed FIABCI Award for its software and residential facilities. Prestige was also recently awarded the Crisil DA1 Developer Rating in recognition of the quality of their projects and the ability to deliver completed projects in a timely manner, making them the ONLY Property Developer across India to have received this distinction.Today, Prestige stands as a giant and with aggressive growth plans across the Residential, Commercial, Retail and Hospitality Sectors in Bangalore, Goa, Hyderabad, Mangalore, Cochin and Chennai, lies a bright future ahead.

Value & Budget Housing Corporation Pvt. Ltd. (VBHC) is a professionally managed real estate company which believes that good quality living should be within everyone’s reach. The company was co-founded by former MphasiS Chairman, Mr. Jaithirth (Jerry) Rao and former Citibank Consumer Banking Head, Mr.P. S. Jayakumar. VBHC homes are meticulously planned and designed to give one’s family the true experience of modern living. VBHC’s objective is to provide housing that meets high quality standards, ensure speedy completion and deliver at low cost. These objectives are best met through the application of contemporary building technology and the adoption of ingenious industrial engineering processes. The company commissioned a detailed research to evaluate various Form Systems, their comparison with traditional brick-and-mortar building methods and then chose the optimum solution in the Indian context which delivers tremendous time and cost savings. 
 
VBHC has been able to transform real estate development into a lean industrial process with the use of 'form' technology for construction. At present, VBHC has projects in Bangalore, Chennai, NCR & Mumbai.

project_description: Developed by Mantri Developers - Mantri Lithos is an under-construction residential development located in Nagavara, Bangalore. Sprawling across 6-acres of lush greenery, this venture contains 528 well-planned residential units spread among total 8 towers. These units are available with 2 & 3 bedroom flats and penthouse configurations. The area size of these units vary from 1420 sqft - 1920 sqft and the flat rates of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore are priced starting from Rs. 93.73 Lacs. Project details The builders have of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore have guaranteed the possession of flats by 2018. Well-crafted with attractive floor plans, the well-ventilated residential apartments of Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore are available for both sale & rent. The pool of modern amenities like clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, amphitheatre, jogging track, etc., make this project worthwhile. Mantri Lithos Nagavara also offers several resale flats to choose from. RERA certified, this residential development boasts spacious 2 & 3 BHK homes which are crafted as brilliantly to provide utmost comfort & unmatched privacy. The fresh breeze and sunlight swaying across all the rooms will enliven you all along the day. The 2BHK homes measuring 1420 sqft are priced Rs. 93.73 Lacs whereas the 3BHK homes with 1920 sqft area are available for Rs. 1.15 Cr. Highpoints Conveniently located in the prime neighborhood of Nagavara, Bangalore is definitely one of the big advantage of this project to invest your money. Besides, offering good connectivity to public transport facilities, this residential society is also well-connected to Govindapura, The Cherry Cart and Columbia Asia Hospital. Embassy Manyata Business & Kirloskar Tech Parks are situated within close proximity.  Schools and malls are available in good numbers in this area. So, hurry up and book a flat now in Mantri Lithos Nagavara, Bangalore and live a blissful life with near & dear ones.

project_description: Overview: DS MAX Silver Wood is an under construction project by DS MAX Properties Private Limited offering elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is thoughtfully located in Bommasandra, Bangalore and consists of 85 skilfully crafted units spanned over 1 tower. DS MAX Silver Wood price rate starts from Rs. 26.2 Lac onward.Project Details:DS MAX Silver Wood is a project offering elegantly designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK spacious apartments. It is located in Bommasandra, Bangalore by the quite experienced DS MAX Properties Private Limited. DS MAX Silver Wood plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1050 sq. ft. to 1127 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1276 sq. ft. to 1745 sq. ft.DS MAX Silver Wood apartments are designed with high quality interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, attractive wooden doors, modular kitchen with SS sink and granite counter, concealed wiring with branded  modular switches, high quality CP fittings, sanitary ware fixtures etc.DS MAX Silver Wood amenities and facilities for its residents includes a cafeteria, bar & lounge, jogging & strolling track, private terrace & garden, dance studio, power back up, swimming pool, lift, park, intercom facility, gym, children’s play area, flower gardens, multipurpose courts, sky deck, large open space, multipurpose hall, etc.Highpoints:DS MAX Silver Wood is a perfect opportunity for potential buyers to acquire their dream house with modern equipments and standard specifications. It is located in the industrial suburban of Bangalore booming with residential projects. The project is just 2 km from National Highway 44, 5 km from Ebenezer International School, 5 km from Bommasandra ESI Hospital and 5 km from Azim Premji University. This infrastructure is one of the most prominent projects in Bommasandra to invest in.

Being one of the known and preferred real estate developer in Bangalore, the group has made continues efforts towards quality management, innovation and equal attention to even minor details. The company’s strength is its customer- centric approach and this approach has always helped the group in receiving positive and overwhelming response from its valued customers.  The group offers lavish and huge 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK apartments that are available in various sizes and vary from 765 sq.ft. to 1456 sq.ft.
Successfully expanding its presence beyond Karnataka, the group focuses on offering high quality homes at competitive pricing and that also in sought- after locations. The aim of the company is to offer best quality homes with latest amenities and excellent architecture. Having the passion to serve, the company is truly dedicated in understanding the needs of customers and then implementing those needs.

project_description: Overview: DS Max Stonescape is a project by DS Max Properties located in AnjanaPura, Bangalore offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. The project is currently under construction and consists of 141 units spanned over 1 skilfully crafted tower. DS Max Stonescape rate starts from Rs. 23.2 Lac onward.  Project Details:DS Max Stonescape is a residential project by DS Max Properties offering luxurious and spaciously designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. It is currently under construction and located in AnjanaPura, Bangalore. DS Max Stonescape plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 830 sq. ft. to 1076 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1228 sq. ft. to 1456 sq. ft.DS Max Stonescape luxurious apartments are designed with interiors like vitrified tiles flooring, attractive natural wooden doors, black granite kitchen platform with SS sink, concealed electrical wiring with PVC conduits, designer bathroom with branded fittings, and premium quality fixtures etc.        DS Max Stonescape has numerous amenities for its residents such as club house, swimming pool, cycling & jogging track, security, park, power backup, reserved parking, visitor parking, intercom facility, gym, children’s play area, DTH television facility, flower gardens, water storage, meditation area, internet & Wi-Fi connectivity, landscaped garden, paved compound, and fire fighting equipments etc. along with several others.Highpoints:DS Max Stonescape is strategically developed project in AnjanaPura, Bangalore, one of the finest spots. DS Max Stonescape locality is in close proximity to several facilities and basic civic utilities. Several facilities like Balaji Layout Bus Stop, Sri Kumaran Children's Home, Sai Surakshaa Health Care, ICICI Bank & ATM, Guru Siddeshwara Cinema Theatre, Sri Sai Ram Medicals, Fish Mart, Capital Club Resort, Art of Living Yoga and Meditation Centre etc. are all part of the vicinity.

The planned layout will translate into orderly development and serene environs. BDA's mini forest in the neighborhood will further enhance the lush greenery both within the projects and outside. project_description: RERA Numbers  Cluster 1- PR000313 Cluster 2- PR000337 Cluster 3- PR000353 Janaadhar Shubha is promoted by Janaadhar India Pvt.Ltd., a company dedicated to providing well-designed, high-quality homes on a budget. The company is part of the Jana group of companies and headed by Mr.Ramesh Ramanathan, a very well-known social entrepreneur. Planned as a budget housing solution, Janaadhar Shubha is being developed on an 11.5 acres plot on the Attibele-Anekal Road, on the outskirts of Bangalore city. Located close to several of the citys major industrial belts, the township consists of 1128 apartments. The apartments, which are open from 3 sides, are a true testament to design efficiency and superior planning, applied for the first time in the area of budget housing. Nearby Government Infrastructures: Narayan Hrudayalaya Hospital, Anekal Government Hospital, Anekal Railway Station
about_project_details: Janaadhar (India) Pvt. Ltd. is a unique budget housing development company that seeks to blend market principles with a not-for-profit spirit. With a systematic, focused and professional effort, Janaadhar aims to build well designed, high-quality homes - to create an inclusive society, and a better quality of life.Janaadhar has been floated by Jana Urban Foundation (JUF) - a Section 25 not-for-profit company - for implementing the budget housing projects. Janaadhar brings together the expertise of Jana Urban Foundation, Sterling Developers Private Limited and Venkataramanan Associates - in this breakthrough venture.Janaadhar Shubha is a complete housing solution that offers budget homes in a well-planned, secure, self- contained township, where everyone can raise a family and senior citizens can live safely and independently.

Everyone dreams of owning a home, a place to come back to, and a place that is truly a reflection of one’s personality!

We are pioneers in the concept of building quality homes that are great on design and easy on the wallet. Our vision is to build meticulously planned and well designed homes that give you value for your money. To achieve this vision, we are setting up an expansive network of integrated housing projects across the country that will apply the best engineering and construction technologies.

There is a strong unmet demand for affordable housing in India, which will continue to increase steadily as a result of urbanization, increasing number of nuclear families, rising income levels and strong desire for home ownership. To cater to this large demand, we are working on various residential projects that focus on cost efficient, quick and high quality construction.

Our residential projects are in the urban periphery and are well-connected to the city's central transportation system. We understand that a residential community is never complete without amenities, and we have ensured that our residential projects have 24x7 security, primary health care centre besides landscaped gardens and a walking track. To ensure a great quality of life while remaining environment friendly, we also have a water treatment plant, a bio gas plant, solar water heating system and solar-powered street lights.

Our flagship project, Vaibhava Bangalore, has been able to transform real estate development into a lean industrial process amenable to mass production with the use of 'form' technology for construction.

about_project_details: For the last three decades, the Hiranandanis have been single-handedly altering the ethos and aesthetics of real estate in India. The group has built multi-use developments in India on a large scale and have introduced retail, hospitality, healthcare, education and entertainment into their developments. With a unique approach to engineering, planning and design, the Hiranandanis invest heavily in research and development to ensure they remain at the forefront of value engineering and design.Through the environmentally friendly concepts of New Urbanism, their focus has been on converting suburban sprawls into well-planned urban communities such as the Powai and Thane townships which have won several awards for outstanding urban development. These self-sufficient, integrated communities have become aspirational addresses for Mumbaiites. The group has established various schools, colleges, institutions and hospitals through trusts. Their clubhouses and community spaces have earned international repute and success.All these experiences and expertise are encompassed under the House of Hiranandani, a conglomerate that is set to create new benchmarks for the real estate industry by continuing to break new ground and incorporate path-breaking technology into their design, to create future-ready and intelligent spaces. The House of Hiranandani brings to its customers and stakeholders the benefit of years of experience under one roof, thereby creating a platform from which it will continue its pioneering innovations and set the standard for real estate development in India.

project_description: Overview:Rohan Iksha, a project developed by the famed Rohan Builders, Bhoganhalli, Bangalore, offer 2, 3 and 4 BHK premium flats situated amidst lush greenery and state of the art amenities have been provided to make the lives of the consumers comfortable and stress free. Priced moderately between 72.2 Lac and 1.18 Cr, Rohan Iksha consists of a total 550 units in 13 expansive towers. About the Project:Rohan Iksha apartments is still an under construction project with the estimated time of possession being between March 2018 and January 2020. All 2 BHK flats in Rohan Iksha are built on a space of 1317 sqft, the 3 BHK have a space of 1623 sqft and the 4 BHK apartments have a huge area of 2119 sqft. Offering freehold ownership to the buyers, Rohan Iksha is an excessive mixture of technology, innovation and comfort.Spread over an area of 9 acres, each apartment in Rohan Iksha, Bangalore gives you an all-round view of the area, which is only for those who choose to live in these luxurious homes. With superior quality raw materials, considerately designed interiors and fire resistant high quality wiring make this project one of its kind. All modern amenities such as lift, swimming pool, round the clock security, reserved parking, etc. are available in the society. Highpoints:Bhoganahalli Bus Stop is just 0.5km away from the society with Sakra World Hospital and Carmelaram Railway Station being within 3.5km. The best location in Bangalore, a fully functional club house, jogging, cycling and strolling track and door tennis courts are the best things about Rohan Iksha.You can get more details of the project by checking the updated Rohan Iksha photos on the website. Make sure to grab your dream house soon to lead a convenient life full of comfort and happiness.
about_project_details: Rohan Group is a construction and a real estate company with innovation at its core. Founded in 1993, it aimed at building a healthier lifestyle for the city-dwellers and greater sustainability for the ecosystem. The years that followed saw the company making several firsts in the industry - all directed towards achieving this single-minded goal.Rohan Group has diverse interests in real estate, industrial contracting, infrastructure development, and logistics. It has been awarded the prestigious DA2 plus rating consistently for the last 9 years by CRISIL, Indias leading credit rating institution. Its residential projects in Pune and Bangalore continue to earn the coveted 7-star rating for excellence in design and safety.

project_description: Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza in Kudlu Gate Junction, Bangalore is an aesthetically rich project offering a spectacular design surrounded with beautiful landscapes and water bodies. Spread across 5.8 acres, this project offers 513 apartments of 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK configuration. The towers contain 22 floors housing apartments in the area size ranging between 703 sqft and 1850 sqft. Project Details Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza is a RERA certified project situated on the main Hosur Road in Kudlu Junction Gate and offers vaastu compliant 1BHK, 2BHK and 3BHK apartments. The 1BHK apartments are sized at 703 sqft and 714 sqft while 2BHK cover an area size of 1183 sqft. 3BHK apartments are available in the sizes of 1564 sqft and 1850 sqft. All the apartments are fairly large and spacious and receive plenty of natural light too. These well ventilated apartments are ideal for anyone looking to invest in a 1, 2 or 3BHK apartment. Prospective homebuyers have the option to buy on resale apartments in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza or even invest in a new property. Alternately, there is also an option to rent an apartment in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza. A variety of recreational amenities are also included as an integral part of this project such as basketball court, kids pool, kids play area, skating rink, indoor games room, squash court, swimming pool, sauna and steam and billiards room. An abundance of recreational facilities ensures residents get to enjoy an excellent lifestyle. Highpoints Some of the major highpoints on why it is a good idea to invest in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza include the well defined positioning of this project enjoying access to CBD and proximity to prominent localities such as HSR Layout, Koramangala and Sarjapur Road. It is truly worthwhile to invest in Salarpuria Sattva Cadenza, which offers an excellent opportunity to reside in a premium gated community.
about_project_details: Salarpuria Sattva is one of the promising builders in the field of Real Estate. The floorings are made of Vitrified Tiles and Matt Finished Anti Skid Vitrified Tiles.  Mittal Elanza comprises of 2BHK and 3BHK Flat.  2BHK Flat has a range of area from 1130 Sq-ft to 1915 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 2 bathroom. 3BHK Flat has a range of area from 1740 Sq-ft to 1915 Sq-ft having 2 balcony and 3 bathroom.  Launched in January 2015, Mittal Elanza offers Under Construction properties. It is approved by various banks like Axis Bank, SBI, IDBI, HDFC, ICICI and Punjab National Bank.
