project_description: Overview:5 Elements Realty, Electronic City Bangalore has come up with a new project called Ajantha Prime, which is offering spacious 2 and 3 BHK flats for sale in bustling city of Bangalore. The price range of the flats in 5 Elements Ajantha Prime is between 40.6 Lac and 45.5 Lac. The project has a total of 115 units in 2 huge towers. About the Project:An unmatched housing property in a gated community Ajantha Prime Electronic City Phase I, Bangalore is waiting for you. The project provides a  variety of benefits such a great location, wonderful lifestyle, beautiful surroundings and higher return on investment. 5 Elements Realty review tells us that this builder is particularly known for its excellent quality of construction and on time delivery of the projects created keeping in mind the needs and requirements of modern day home buyers.  The 2 BHK flats in Ajantha Prime apartments are built on a space between 970 sqft and 1645 sqft, while the 3 BHK flats have an area between 1425 sqft and 1645 sqft. The amenities provided by Ajantha Prime are 24 hour backup electricity, Rain Water Harvesting, Multipurpose Hall, Reserved Parking, lift, kids play area, jogging and strolling track, gymnasium, kids play pool with water slides, etc. Apart from the above security devices are installed throughout the project to ensure safety to the people living in the society. Highpoints:The main USP of Ajantha Prime is that it is meticulously designed with fabulous indoor and outdoor amenities, having easy access to ITPL, electronic city and international airport and can be bought with easy instalment options. The project also has many famous schools, hospitals and shopping centres in the vicinity for your convenience.For more details you can check the updated Ajantha Prime photos on the website. Make sure to book your dream home today
about_project_details: 5 Elements Realty is a Bangalore based company that offers developed plots, custom built villas and bungalows and premium apartments. To own a home is your ultimate dream. 5 Elements Realty understands, and respects your dream and works with a single minded goal of bringing your dream to life - of owning a home, a home which gives you happiness and peace.This goal is driven by the philosophy of the five elements that make up this universe. We believe that it is the harmony of the five elements within us - earth, fire, air, water and akash that bring Happiness and Peace. Wherever these five elements reside in harmony, there resides happiness and peace. Through this beautiful philosophy is reflected the cherished principles of 5 Elements Realty - Work with Integrity, Create Value, Keep Promises, Build Relationships, and above all Develop Trust.

project_description: Suraksha Landmark is a famous residential project that comes with all the amenities and facilities. The residential project is located in Bannerghatta Main Road, Bangalore and very known for its beautiful and lavish lifestyle. The entire project area is around 1.32 acres and every apartment features exclusive and well-planned layout at Suraksha Landmark. This residential project comes with hi-end amenities and facilities for its residents and located in an ideal location where you will be easily connected with the outer world. The project has easy connectivity with public transportation facilities and other civic utilities like schools, office places, market, shopping malls, entertainment hub and much more. Suraksha Landmark is offering 126 units with beautiful interior work.Project DetailsSuraksha Landmark, Bangalore is brilliantly designed residential project which caters its residents with spacious living space and every apartment in Suraksha Landmark is offering ample cross ventilation and the open space. You will find smooth flow of natural light and fresh breeze in every corner of your dream home. Suraksha Landmark price is very affordable and the floor plan is designed with utmost care to ensure that the homes offer privacy and comfort. It is located in an ideal location which is very close to all the civic utilities like school, hospitals, malls, major office places and many other places. Suraksha Landmark is surrounded by natural beauty that offers chirping of birds every morning, rustling leaves and whispering meadows. The project is well-equipped with the best of modern facilities, where you can go ahead and take possession of your own living space. Suraksha Landmark floor plan is beautifully crafted for which you will always receive compliments. The society is fully equipped with facilities like club house, bar/ lounge, cycling track, jogging track, power back up, park, kids play area, gymnasium, banquet hall, flower garden, water storage, multipurpose courts,  gymnasium, indoor games room, visitor parking, security, lift, swimming pool and much more.
about_project_details: As one of the pioneers in the Bengalurus real- estate market, we have been known for changing the landscape of the city since 1998. To us, what matters the most is the smile of satisfaction on our customers lips when they are home. This has gained us the reputation of a quality developer who constantly seeks excellence in the industry. Sai Suraksha properties was founded by V. Ramesh Kumar B.Sc, BE (Civil) from Bangalore University, as Chairman and Managing Partner, Mr. Ramesh Kumar and his brother, another Managing Partner, V. Kameswara Chowdary. M.Sc., have shown farsightedness and the diligence in establishing quality and workmanship in construction.Mr.Prakash (brother-in-law of Mr. Ramesh), the Managing Partner, has shaped the companys reputation for excellence in creating value for its customers.Being a family firm with professional outlook, decisions are quick, timely and qualified. Some of Bengalurus luxury flats, premium apartments and commercial complexes built by the company are a testimony to its commitment to customer-specific needs.Our mission is to build homes that compromise on nothing. Our satisfied residents are our best spokespersons.There is no greater testament to this than the fact that 80 percent of our apartments are sold by word-of-mouth recommendation. 95 percent of our customers choose to live in them themselves.When it comes to standard ratios like common and built-up areas, open spaces, etc., we are known to be strict sticklers to building codes.

project_description: Overview:Platina Exotica is a project developed by Platina Venture with their 7 years of real estate experience. The project is currently undergoing construction and is located in Mysore Road, Bangalore. Platina Exotica consists of 188 units spanned over 7 towers offering 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments.Project Details:Platina Exotica, a residential project by Platina Venture offering skilfully designed 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments. Platina Exotica plot areas for its 2 BHK flat range from 1084 sq. ft. to 1263 sq. ft. and 3 BHK flat areas range from 1346 sq. ft. to 1692 sq. ft. The apartments are thoughtfully designed with a lavish and spacious look with help from high quality interiors as well as exteriors.Platina Exotica is being developed with a strong structure and interiors like vitrified tiles flooring in every room, concealed copper wiring with standard switches, modular kitchen with granite platform, branded fittings and fixtures etc. Platina Exotica provides numerous amenities and facilities like club house, swimming pool, park, gymnasium, kids’ play area, health club with steam & Jacuzzi, event space & amphitheatre, coffee lounge and jogging & strolling track etc. can all be enjoyed by the residents.Highpoints:Platina Exotica is an excellent infrastructure based in Mysore Road, Bangalore. It is well connected to ring road on all sides. Platina Exotica locality is close to Global Village and well connected to Nice Road and Mysore Road. Various civic utilities like RV College of Engineering, Berthesda High School, Bangalore University Campus, Raja Rajeswari Medical College and Hospital, National Hill View Public School, Sai Plaza, HDFC Bank ATM, Nayandahalli Railway Station, Good Way Organic Pvt. Ltd., MedPlus, Gopalan Cinemas, Domino's Pizza, PESU Gym, IOC - Sri Rajarajeswari Filling Station, Radhakrishna Multispeciality Hospital and IVF Centre etc. are in the vicinity.

project_description: Located in Whitefield Bangalore Thousand Lights is township that enhances the concept of community living. The township is spread in a wide expanse of land covered with greenery that provides refreshment to the body and mind. Thousand lights by Northgate properties is the epitome of modern urban living with its world class amenities. The exterior of the residential township of Thousand lights is sturdy while the interiors are well designed conducive for modern living. Thousand lights offers an opportunity to lead a nature friendly lifestyle surrounded by natural beauty. This concept of nature friendliness has been enhanced by the use of methods like rain water harvesting which replenish the ground water.The best part about Thousand Lights is that it is located within minutes of a hospital and school while the railway station and airport are also close by. Among the amenities provided within the township there is a banquet hall for parties and social gatherings and a separate kids play area where the little ones can play. The apartments of Thousand Lights are Vaastu compliant and as we know, Vaastu is fast becoming popular as a way of enhancing the well being and happiness in your life. There is a park where you can take refreshing morning walks and leisurely evening strolls.
about_project_details: THOUSAND LIGHTS is promoted and developed by NORTHGATE PROPERTIES a firm with an impeccable reputation for quality, integrity and on schedule delivery. For most people a home is the important investment they will ever make.Understanding the magnitude of the tasks of creating a lifetime dream for customers, we at Northgate Properties have developed every residential project as if it were our own. For us, it is not just a business, but also a pleasure to delight and deliver the dreams of our customers. And our commitment does not end there and shines us.

project_description: Located in Whitefield, Bangalore, Ozone Promenade by Ozone Group is an ongoing residential development boasting luxurious abodes loaded with all the top-notch amenities. The project features total 549 residential units distributed among 8 towers. The flat rates of Ozone Promenade Whitefield, Bangalore are priced between Rs 85.85 Lacs – Rs. 1.31 Cr. Project details With possession by December-2019, Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments are designed with modern construction standards to provide extremely blissful living to its occupants. The impressive floor plans of of Ozone Promenade Whitefield apartments will certainly impress you. Drawing lots of fresh air & light, all the well-ventilated residential apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield assure you a happy & healthy life. The apartments of Ozone Promenade Whitefield are also available for rent. This is a RERA certified residential project and is one of the best project to invest your money. Some of the exclusive amenities provided include swimming pool, club house, table-tennis, gym, jogging track, cricket, kid’s play area and much more. Highpoints Situated bang on Mahadevpura main road, Ozone Promenade Whitefield enjoys all the advantageous of a good location. project_description: Positioned on Whitefield-Sarjapur Road, Prestige Lakeside Habitat is a luxury residential building spread over 102 acres. This project by Prestige group consists of 3426 luxury apartments with 271 villas having their own private gardens. Nothing be more satisfying than owning your house in such a wonderful location. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat, Whitfield is specially designed around the Disney theme to present you the exquisite habitat in Bangalore at affordable prices. From striking flooring to the kitchen with high-quality tiles, spacious rooms and what not makes this an ideal apartment in Bangalore. Each and every little detail has been carefully designed for you to experience a luxurious lifestyle. The Prestige Lakeside Habitat comprises of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK Luxurious Apartments choice in the Varthur of Whitefield that is encircled with a stunning & magical atmosphere. Enjoy calm living at a home which is away from the chaos and full of serenity. The luxurious development of Prestige Lakeside Habitat offers exceptional chances to relive the relaxed and easy-going lifestyle without giving up the pleasures of urban life. The project is estimated to be completed by May 2018, let’s have a look at the details of this habitat.Project DetailsThe Prestige Lakeside Habitat features with amenities like Intercom, Indoor Games, Aerobics & Meditation Room, Play Area, Swimming Pool, Yoga, Landscaped Garden, Tennis Court, Health Facilities, Gymnasium, Basket Ball Court, Badminton Court, Club House and excellent Security. This project is the result of development through premium quality raw materials. There are 80 acres of open space available that allows you to breathe in fresh & pollution free air. It is also close to many corporate giants such as Wipro, HLL, ITPL, etc. Price range and unit details, the project covers an area of around 1195 to 4934 sqft per unit and consist of 3697 units build across 24 towers. The 2 BHK flats are available in area range of 1195-1346 sqft per unit and price range start from around 61 lacs. The 3 BHK flats and villas are available at a price range starting from approximately 2.5 cr. and 4 BHK flats are available in price range starting from approximately 1.5 cr. You can consider these price range and unit details prior to investing in the property.Highpoints: Why buy Prestige Lakeside Habitat? The price of Prestige Lake Side Habitat, Bangalore is reasonable for those looking for both luxurious & affordable Villas in Whitfield. Also, the project enjoys the location advantage of being the nearby location to many colleges, schools, recreational areas, hospitals, parks and other facilities close to Varthur. Many international schools are situated within 2-3 km and Hospitals like Sai Baba Hospital and Vydehi Hospitals are also quite close to it.

project_description: OverviewBrigade Lakefront by the Brigade Group is a gated community of charming lakefront of 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK residential apartments at an affordable price starting from Rs.77lakh onwards. With a super built up area varying between 109 to 312sq.m., these homes offer a seamless blend of serenity, bliss, utmost luxury & comfort.  About the ProjectBrigade Group has been instrumental in developing some of the finest edifices in the country and their ethos of building yet another residential landmark is evident in Brigade Lakefront, a spectacular residential development in the heart of Whitefield, Bangalore.  These well-ventilated residential apartments are available in the configuration of 2, 3 and 4BHK units in the size ranging between 124 and 312 square meters. Each apartment is meticulously designed offering thoughtfully designed layouts and spacious living spaces. The flat rates in Brigade Lakefront range between Rs.73 lakhs to Rs.2.20crore. Adding to the charm of these gracefully designed residences are an exclusive array of amenities for the residents to enjoy and experience a holistic lifestyle. 2,787 square meter of space has been reserved for leisure and recreational facilities such as a rooftop swimming pool, children’s play area, mini theatre, tennis court, basketball court, cricket pitch, senior citizen court & large open green spaces. Brigade Lakefront is suitably positioned in terms of location too, as it enjoys proximity to various social infrastructural facilities. Areas such as EPIP Zone, ITPL & Brookefields are easily accessible within a short distance of 3 to 4km. Malls, hospitals & schools are also situated within easy reach of Brigade Lakefront. HighpointsWhat sets Brigade Lakefront apart is the amount of open space residents get to enjoy. Spacious interiors combined with vast open spaces help one to rejuvenate & revive amid natural greens despite being situated in the heart of the city. To breathe in fresh air every morning, book a flat in this project offering premium lifestyle & plenty of lung space.
about_project_details: Brigade Group was established in 1986, with property development as its main focus. Today, Brigade Group is one of South India's leading property developers. We are headquartered in Bangalore, with branch offices in several cities in South India, a representative office in Dubai and an accredited agent in the USA. We have a uniquely diverse multi-domain portfolio that covers property development, property management services, hospitality and education. Our projects extend across several major cities in South India: Chennai, Chikmagalur, Hyderabad, Kochi, Mangalore and Mysore.

project_description: Whitefield is in Banglore in the state of Karnataka. Mayur Group has developed Mayur Signature in Whitefield. It is a popular project of Mayur Group. The project has luxurious and everlasting appealing features.  The building is located on 60 feet main road. There are 2 BHK, 3 BHK and 4 BHK apartments available in Mayur Signature. The area of 1 BHK is 893 square feet and an area of 2 BHK ranges from 1096-1134 square feet. The area of 3 BHK ranges from 1421-1801 square feet and an area of 4 BHK ranges from 2366-2400 square feet. The price per square feet is Rs. 3700. The price of the flats starts from Rs. 33.04 lakhs. Range of prices depends on the size of the area. The interior of the hall, bedroom and kitchen area are of high-class quality. Amenities: - All the basic and other desired facilities are provided by Mayur Group. This facility includes garden, swimming pool, play area, room for indoor games, and club house with all modern facilities and community halls. There is a practice area for tennis and basketball.Highlight: - The best thing about this locality is that it is well-connected to the city of Banglore.  The residents of the locality get easy access to markets, school and colleges.

There's no luxury for luxury's sake! Everything is woven around the concept of harmonious living.SN FEN BREEZE is complete home, where luxury blends in perfectly with greenery. Not much, only 70 luxury apartments are waiting for your arrival in a close-knit community located in Whitefield, the IT Hub of Bangalore. In fact, close to ITPL, Whitefield Metro Station and Peripheral Ring Road.Vastu brings in harmony into living spaces and life of its residents. At SN FEN BREEZE, every home is designed as per vastu norms. Care is taken to ensure harmonious living with natural elements such as air, light and ventilation being in sync with living spaces. There's complete privacy.
about_project_details: The name 'Sai Nirmaanika' is significant with a deeper meaning. Nirmaanika in Sanskrit means construction / architectonic / architecture. Sai means saint / divine. As the name, so the work. At SN Developers every part of work is worship.The core team of SN Developers comprises highly qualified and vastly experienced professionals who bring an ocean of knowledge and expertise to the table. There is complete harmony between every thought and every action.Quality of work takes the centre stage at every juncture. There is no luxury or greenery for sake of it. Design is such that there is complete harmony between luxury and greenery to give not just high quality of living spaces, but also improve quality of living of our customers. The concern for environment is heart and soul of our all endeavors. Therefore we aim to provide lots of green spaces with pockets of water bodies in all our projects. Thereby, we wish to gift a cleaner, greener world for our future generations.Design-wise, our every project is contemporary, yet adheres strictly to Vastu principles. The organization is completely transparent in all its dealings, with complete orientation towards customer satisfaction.Our vision"To become one of the premier real estate developers in South India by building trustworthy relationships with our esteemed customers through trust, transparency and commitment."Our Mission"To provide our clients

The name 'Sai Nirmaanika' is significant with a deeper meaning. Nirmaanika in Sanskrit means construction / architectonic / architecture. Sai means saint / divine. As the name, so the work. At SN Developers every part of work is worship.

The core team of SN Developers comprises highly qualified and vastly experienced professionals who bring an ocean of knowledge and expertise to the table. There is complete harmony between every thought and every action.

Quality of work takes the centre stage at every juncture. There is no luxury or greenery for sake of it. Design is such that there is complete harmony between luxury and greenery to give not just high quality of living spaces, but also improve quality of living of our customers. The concern for environment is heart and soul of our all endeavors. Therefore we aim to provide lots of green spaces with pockets of water bodies in all our projects. Thereby, we wish to gift a cleaner, greener world for our future generations.

Design-wise, our every project is contemporary, yet adheres strictly to Vastu principles. The organization is completely transparent in all its dealings, with complete orientation towards customer satisfaction.

Our vision
"To become one of the premier real estate developers in South India by building trustworthy relationships with our esteemed customers through trust, transparency and commitment."

Our Mission
"To provide our clients & customers with the kind of service that's unparalleled and envied by many in the industry. Also give them a kind of experience that's heart warming."

project_description: Lifestyle finds yet another destination at Kumari Woods and Winds located at Whitefield, Bangalore sprawling across 2 acres. Kumari Woods and Winds consist of 120 units spread across 1 well-designed tower. These individual living spaces developed by Kumari Builders and Developers are available in 2 and 3 BHK configurations. Project details Kumari Woods and Winds provide a place to celebrate the lighter moments in life and a place to experience the true happiness. The 2 BHK apartments are spanning across 1070 to 1240 sqft whereas the 3 BHK apartments cover an area of 1350 to 1640 sqft. The price list of these apartments varies from 49.7 Lac to 75.1 Lac. Bank and legal approvals of Kumari Woods and Winds comprises of all leading banks, BBMP, BESCOM and BWSSB. The amenities in Kumari Woods And Winds comprises of landscaped garden, indoor games, swimming pool, gymnasium, play area, club house, car parking, jogging track, cricket court, basket ball court, senior citizen park, day care center, rock climbing, toddlers pool, skating rink, volley ball, security, yoga, etc. Spacious interiors, friendly budget and a sort after location add value to this project. Highpoints The address of Kumari Woods and Winds is a major plus point for buyers looking to invest in property in Bangalore. Whitefield is an important IT hub of Bangalore and is near to areas like Marathahalli and KR Puram. The locality is known for its good connectivity to the rest of the city, owing a house here will satisfy your housing needs. From health to nature to entertainment, it offers a complete package to satisfy everyone in your family. In short, Kumari Woods and Winds is the best value that you will get for your money. Book an apartment now and gift a deluxe home to your family.
about_project_details: Kumari Builders and Developers is the fastest growing real estate company in Bangalore committed to build homes for life. Superior Quality Detail and Perfection are the standards that KBD demands throughout its project. With each project, KBD continue to raise the bar of affordable luxury living consistently, providing unparalleled customer experience and setting landmark in affordable luxury living.

project_description: The suburbs of Bangalore are a great place to stay with the open spaces that suburbs usually offer along with all the necessary amenities within reach. The area of Whitefield which is the IT hub of Bangalore is where Nitesh Forest Hills is located. These apartments are ideal for the upcoming families who will not settle for less. They are built to international standards be it external sturdiness or interior design. There are 2-3 bedroom apartments with a covered area of 1310 sq-ft to 1628 sq-ft. These apartments are semi furnished which will save you a lot of money and hassle.Along with the superior construction and interiors you will also find many high end amenities here. These amenities include a swimming pool, gym, skating rink, meditation center, jogging track etc. Apart from these there is also a special play area for kids. Your conveniences have been taken care of with a convenience store and ATM within the complex. Nitesh Estates
Nitesh Estates, founded in 2004 and headquartered in Bangalore is one of the real estate divisions of the renowned Nitesh Group. The company is a leading builder of luxury projects famous for its premium designs, elegant interiors, innovative ideas and urbane landscaping with fine attention to detail across its construction projects. This Bangalore-based group is the first generation entrepreneur having its presence across four asset classes i.e. residences, shopping malls, office buildings and hotels. The group believes in offering affordable housing to its esteemed customers and that is why offers 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK apartments starting from 99 lacks. The huge houses offered by this group range from 1318 sq.ft. to 6428 sq.ft.. 
Till date, Nitesh Estates has successfully completed over 20 million sqft of lavish projects. The group has also successful in executing the well-known ITC Limited Corporate Housing Project, significantly attracting FDI in real estate Citigroup and Och Ziff and has also brought The Ritz Carlton Hotel which is the famous luxury chain to India. Their state-of-art-construction, matchless edge over its services and skilled team has helped them in gaining many iconic properties projects. Some of the projects completed by the group are Nitesh Hyde Park- Bangalore, Nitesh Columbus Square- - Bangalore, Nitesh Forest Hills- - Bangalore, Nitesh Cape Cod- - Bangalore, Nitesh Central Park- - Bangalore, Nitesh Mayfair- Bangalore, Nitesh Hub- Bangalore, Nitesh Caesars Palace- Bangalore, Nitesh Hub- Bangalore and much more.

project_description: BM Magnolia Park is a residential project by BM Developers. This prestigious project is located at Whitefield, Bangalore. It has 525 Units of 2 Towers offering a wide range of 2 BHK and 3 BHK apartments.Project Details:BM Magnolia Park is poised to be one of the most attractive residential gated societies in   India. It has 2 towers, Cedar and Aspen built on 5 acres of landscaped area, so that your family can live in an open environment. The project offers 2 BHK apartments with many range options of 1080 sqft, 1155 sqft, 1175 sqft, 1185 sqft, 1190 sqft, 1215 sqft, 1220 sqft,1225 sqft, 1230 sqft, 1235 sqft, 1240 sqft, 1250 sqft, 1260 sqft, 1270 sqft, 1275 sqft, 1280 sqft, 1285 sqft, 1290 sqft, 1300 sqft, 1305 sqft, 1320 sqft, 1325 sqft, 1350 sqft, 1385 sqft, 1410 sqft and 3 BHK apartments range from 1450 sqft, 1455 sqft, 1480 sqft, 1515 sqft, 1570 sqft, 1590 sqft, 1620 sqft, 1920 sqft etc. BM Magnolia Park is a RERA Certified Project. Special Amenities of this project are Jogging and Strolling Track, Swimming Pool, Banquet Hall, Gymnasium, Kids Play Area, Library and Business Centre, Indoor Squash & Badminton Courts. Book with us today to fulfil your desire of a dream home.Highpoints: The project is 200 Meters from proposed 270 feet Peripheral Ring Road (PRR) Whitefield, Bangalore which is 3 KM from Proposed Metro rail station and also Whitefield railway station. It has three way connectivity to ITPL SEZ, Whitefield Main Road and Forum Value Mall and Ascendas Park square Mall. Unique features include Easy approachability to Multiple super specialty hospitals, International schools (CBSE and ICSE), and Multiple Shopping Malls with multiplex screens. 700+ IT companies are present within 5 KM Radius. BM Magnolia Park has easy accessibility to famous restaurants including BMTC bus facility from the project main gate onwards.
about_project_details: At BM Dvelopers, we create comfortable, well-planned urban spaces for both residential and commercial purposes. As one of the foremost builders in Bangalore, our team of professionals ensure that your property is among the best of real estate in Bangalore. Founded by Mr. Gajendra Naidu in the year of 1996, BM Developers brings alive the creativity, integrity and versatility encompassed within each of its projects, with the sole aim of providing superior contemporary living spaces envisioned with a traditional approach, to bring every customer close to nature. Our customer-centric approach focuses on creating harmonious energy and positivity for quality living and lasting relationships with our customers.With an experience over 20 project in past 8 years. Has proven track record on deliver, quality and timeline. Currently we have over 8 ongoing project ranging from 20.5 lakhs onwards. Project are spread across South and East Bangalore.
project_highlights:
Highlights


200 Meters from proposed 270 feet Peripheral Ring Road (PRR) Whitefield, Bangalore (connecting Tumkur to Electronic City via Bellary Road, Hennur Road, Whitefield Road and Sarjapur Road).3 KM from Proposed Metro rail station and also Whitefield railway station.Three way connectivity to ITPL SEZ, Whitefield Main Road and Forum Value Mall and Ascendas Parksquare Mall.Easy accessibility to Multiple super specialty hospitals, International schools (CBSE and ICSE), and Multiple Shopping Malls with multiplex screens.700+ IT companies within 5 KM Radius including IT SEZ's like I.T.P.L, Brigade IRV center, Sigma Technology Park, GR Tech Park, H M Tech Park, Brigade Tech Park and many more.Easy accessibility to famous Restaurants, PUB's, Micro Breweries and leading 3 and 5 star hotels (Biere Street, Windmill Craftworks, Taj Vivanta, Barbique Nation as a sample and many more within 2 to 4 KM radius).BMTC bus facility from the project main gate onwards.USPBBMP Approved Vaastu Compliant appartments in a prime locality
